Summary: Grounds are gorgeous, rooms are spacious, but could use some updating in places.  Service is excellent, including the shuttle to nearby restaurants.  We’re not golfers, but totally enjoyed the resort and how quiet it was.

The ambiance was not only beautiful, but the staff were all very attentive and they all smiled and greeted us during our stay. The pool was amazing, and we will definitely return soon to enjoy another weekend here.
Manager Response: Looks like we are your first ever review.  Thank you for recognizing the amazing team that I work with every day (as well as our Coliseum pool).    Glad to hear that you will be returning. Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Excellent Resort. The property is extremely beautiful with magnificent views and world class golf, pool and spa. The staff is extremely polite professional and attentive to all of your needs and requests. The vast spaces make one feel like they are the only guests. The resort makes one feel like royalty.
Manager Response: Raminy,  Thank you for making the long trip from Irvine!  Kidding of course.  Sounds like a nice little staycation.  We made you feel like royalty?  Mission accomplished!  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Our stay at Pelican Hill was magical.  The views from everywhere on property, as well as our Villa, were Breathtaking. The staff throughout our stay were so friendly, welcoming and helpful.   Wonderful in-room dining experience. The service and food at the Coliseum Pool and Grill was excellent.  We can’t wait to visit the Resort again!!!
Manager Response: You'll hear us refer to Pelican Hill as "a place like no other" and it sounds as if you concur.  Staying in one of our Villas is really elevates the experience and it's nice to see that you ventured to the Coliseum Pool and Grill for some more incredible views.  We can't wait for your return visit either.  Thank you, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: 10 Star Experience.  I felt pampered and special every moment of the stay beginning even before we arrived by being sent a survey of our preferences, then greeted at our car on arrival, wonderful check-in process, breath-taking ocean and golf course view, chocolate covered strawberries in our room with a personalized birthday note, comfortable bed, grounds were spectacular, and fantastic housekeeping and turn down service.  Every employee went out of their way to make our stay the very BEST.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday, Birthday Girl!!  Wow.  What a wonderful headline to read.  The team strives each and every day to recognize what we describe as "Moments that Matter."  I'm thrilled that we were able demonstrate that to you. Thank you for the review.  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Possibly the best hotel in America - like being in Maui
Summary: My wife and I  travel a lot - all over the world, and we both agree that The Resort At Pelican Hill is a 6 star hotel on a 1-5 rating. The Villa/Suites are top notch with beautiful views. The staff is highly trained to tend to the guests and they anticipate my needs before I am even aware. We find Pelican to be just as nice as the nicest hotel in Maui - and the view is the same. Great gym, great food, great pool! Room service was  prompt and the food was warm and fresh.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a favorable rating Shep!  We appreciate the recognition very much.  Hope you experienced a spectacular sunset or two while you were here as well.  Think about all the travel time we save you flying to California instead of Maui!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: The service was amazing. They really go out of their way to ensure every detail is done to perfection. The beds are incredible and even the coffee maker grinds the beans before the brew. I love that. They have an incredible circular pool with an incredible spa second to none.
Manager Response: We agree that it's all in the "details" and I appreciate you recognizing this incredible team of professionals.  Thank you, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: I'm still smiling from my weekend at Pelican Hill.  I'm a San Diego resident and had driven by Pelican Hill on Newport Coast hundreds of times.  I saw the name on the sign but had never been before.  Having been invited to a weekend business seminar, I had the chance to finally visit.    What immediately struck me was the stunning location up the hill from the Pacific Ocean.  The views are incredible.  But, as I drove into the property the next thing that struck me was the resort itself, the Italian architecture, the manicured lawns and landscaping, and the relaxed use of space.    Then, however, things accelerated even further.  What stuck out to me was the absolute flawless and consistent interaction and service I received from every single employee.  We all expect luxury
Manager Response: I've read this review multiple times in an attempt to formulate an appropriate response.  Most simply, THANK YOU!  It's such a joy to receive feedback such as this.  It takes a village to curate such thoughtful, anticipatory service and the team here is stellar.  I like to think we're a humble group, but it's so rewarding to have discerning guests appreciate the team's flawless delivery of our service standards.  Pelican Hill truly is a gem and we're delighted that you FINALLY made that turn up our front drive.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Excellent experience for my family. Beautiful setting and wonderful service. Rented a four bedroom Villa. Food was excellent. Management excellent. Coliseum pool was a hit with grandkids. Easy access and short walk to beaches.
Manager Response: Glad the family enjoyed making memories here at Pelican Hill and our Coliseum Pool-  the largest installation of a glass tile pool that we're aware of in the world.  We'll await your return.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder and team The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: First-class stay at a first-class resort.
Summary: This resort is truly special. It is first-class all the way, from the bungalow appointments to the grounds to the lobby/sitting areas. And the service was fantastic. The Mediterranean architecture is gorgeous as are the vistas of the Pacific Ocean. I booked a garden-view room with guaranteed upgrade to ocean view. The patio was spacious, and I loved having a fireplace.  Having said all that, I did run into a problem with street noise. While I requested a quiet location, I was placed in a bungalow located at the base of a hill overlooking a main road, which seemed to be a favorite location for folks to rev their high-horsepower engines. When I informed the front desk of the issue the next day, I was relocated to a quieter room. They were very pleasant and apologetic for the
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback Weezie and thank you for giving us an opportunity to relocate you to a another beautiful bungalow.  First time I'm hearing about an electric shock to headphones on our treadmills but we will certainly look into!  Glad to hear that you'll return.  In the interim, Happy New Year!  Gerard Widder Managing Director The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The pictures are spot on, and the entire resort is beautiful.   The staff treat customers like gold, and I can't say enough good things about this place.  The pool is huge.  The grounds are impeccable.  Food was good, but there were so many quality local options that we rarely ate at the resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize our resort, this incredible destination, and our amazing team of professionals.  We look forward to your return.  Gerard

Summary: The best resort experience in SoCal! The facilities are great, but the staff makes such a difference! Most genuine and caring staff! And the grounds are just breathtaking! Favorite spot for bringing the family!
Manager Response: When asked "what makes Pelican Hill different from other resorts?", my answer is "the team of incredible professionals that genuinely care."  It is incredibly rewarding to have you recognize them.  Thank you, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Truly enjoyed my stay here. Even for a non golfer there are plenty of activities. The Villas are extremely spacious, food is absolutely delicious. Highly recommended. Also met some celebrities during breakfast. To be repeated.
Manager Response: We await your repeat visit!  Glad you enjoyed our extraordinary Villa product.

Summary: Stunning in almost all respects - yes, it's very expensive but the service model they adopt is just so good - it's a little like 1st class air travel, everyone should try & experience it at least once.   Why haven't we scored it a 5? Well, we didn't think the standard of the dining experience was to the same standard, the Colosseum was seriously mediocre/poor & the Grill restaurant whilst being top quality in respect of food, was way over priced and lacking in atmosphere- it was more like an up market sports bar. It was a shame the Italian restaurant was closed during our visit.  The bungalow rooms were simply stunning - magnificent outlook, comfortable, spacious, stylishly kitted out, lovely balcony, luxurious bathroom  - a real wow factor.    Really loved the huge pool area,

We are regular visitors to Pelican Hill.   Hands down, best service, value, and atmosphere.   The latest was for my wifes 45th.   They treated her and her friends like royalty.     All 4 of them raved about the spa treatments.

Summary Heading: Now this is a real 5 STAR property!
Summary: Exquisite property, always well-maintained grounds, superb service, and first-rate amenities! The views are spectacular and the there are many top-rate activities, especially the golf! Will be visiting more frequently now that we have a Chapman U student.

Returning for our 1 year wedding anniversary Pam made everything possible and so easy! She helped me arrange our pregnancy photoshoot on the beautiful Pelican Hill property. Absolute highest level of professionalism and service as always!

The property, pool, rooms, dining, golf and staff are the best. Plenty of stuff to do or just relax. Over the years, we have stayed at the “other OC resorts”. They are fine, but cannot compare to Pelican Hill. Don’t bother staying anywhere else.

Amazing personal touches, outstanding service and delicious cuisine.  I gave to my 92 old mother and her best friends a couple nights in Pelican Villa.  They could not stop raving about the resort. TY

The absolute professionalism of every team member was on full display our entire stay. Very attentive and courteous made for an incredible experience. The restaurants were outstanding and the Coliseum pool made for a great getaway from the hot desert weather. The pool servers always made sure our needs were met and made us feel so welcome. We will definitely return and also recommend this outstanding hotel to everyone.  Thank you Pelican Hill.

Incomparable setting overlooking Pacific. Staff all excellent, attentive and professional. Grounds especially enjoyable at night. Housekeeping thorough and punctual. Unfortunately, our bungalow had not been updated or renovated in many years. Carpets were visibly worn, stain on sofa arm and refrigerator door did not close  making it useless. I’d return once bungalows have been completely  renovated.

Summary Heading: Service is non existent - NOT A LUXURY RESORT. Zero amenities
Summary: I am writing this as Iay in bed in my bungalow. Let’s start with the positive: Amazing check in experience with Amanda at Front desk. So kind Room- gorgeous, spacious, clean- no complaints Room service/Hospitality- total disaster - so bad we actually started laughing. This morning I ordered breakfast at 10:15- it came at noon. They told me it would be 1.5 hours for room service. Ok- LUXURY RESORT. That’s a joke. Who takes almost 2 hours for room service??? I offered to go pick it up myself. Nope! Finally came- food was OK.  An hour or two later- Robert, head of hospitality calls me apologizing profusely and says “we look forward to making it up to you tonight” here’s where it gets funny. So my husband orders room service at 5:05. They say and I quote “it will be there at 5:50 AT
Manager Response: Mrs. S,  The extreme heat this Labor Day Weekend did prompt many of guests to stay in and use In-Room-Dining.  As you appropriately note, our delivery times were severely impacted which we regret (and need to address).  I'm happy to discuss your experience further and hope that you will contact me at gwidder@pelicanhill.com.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Gorgeous luxurious resort in Orange County
Summary: We stayed here for three nights in a Oceanview bungalow. We originally considered upgrading to a suite for extra space to work remotely, but the bungalow had more than enough room to spread out. Our bungalow was 10/10 great. Some of the other reviews mention the rooms feeling tired and outdated, we do not agree. Our room was clean and very comfortable, had endless storage, a gas fireplace, and a beautiful terrace. We had stunningly lush views of Mediterranean Cyprus and olive trees and the ocean in the distance. The bathroom was very large with a soaking tub with a window that opened up into the bedroom area, a large shower, and double vanity. All thoughtfully designed and very functional.  The hotel has a California-meets-Tuscany vibe that doesn't feel contrived. Truly a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such a thorough review of your experience.  I am remiss that you weren't made aware of our "adult pool" located behind the South cabanas of the Coliseum pool!  I am confident that you would have found tranquility there.    We will look forward to seeing you again.  I will personally show you to the adult pool!  Warmly, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: This was my tenth stay at the resort and it was fantastic! The bungalows, grounds, pool and restaurants are all fabulous!  The entire property is gorgeous with beautiful views. The Coliseum is a wonderful place for breakfast. The staff at the resort is friendly and professional.   This resort deserves 6 stars!  Looking forward to going back next summer!
Manager Response: Glad that you enjoyed #10 Sheryl!  We look forward to visit #11!  Perhaps you will return before next summer.  Thank you, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: This hotel is not only beautiful, the customer service is impeccable. Everyone was super friendly and eager to help. The ocean views are amazing. The beds are heavenly. The pool is the perfect temperature to swim all day if you wish. There is a spa on site and the food is excellent.

Not sure if you are allowed to make two posts on here for the same hotel, but here goes anyway! We spent Christmas last year at Pelican Hill which we really enjoyed  - I wrote a review on here back then. The weather while we were there then was wet and cold (I know… California cold!). We vowed than to come back in the summer when we could enjoy the pool area and eating on the balcony at The Coliseum.  We just got home after our August two nights stay and it was everything we hoped it would be, if not better. We hit lucky with the weather which was basically perfect, if not a little humid (again, I know… California humid!).  We ate breakfast at The Coliseum both mornings and dinner there the first night, and again were taken care of by multiple staff. Last night we ate at The
Manager Response: It hardly ever rains here Robert!  Give Christmas some consideration.  It's really a beautiful time of the year here (coming from a guy who spent 44 years in NYC!).  Trust me.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: We are locals and haven't really had the urge for a staycation, but we stayed at Pelican Hill for our 25th wedding anniversary and it is definitely worth the hype! I cannot imagine a more perfect experience - breathtaking beauty, unbelievable service, extravagant accommodations. Every detail is thoughtfully taken care of - this resort is ultimate luxe!

Summary Heading: Unbelievable place. Simply the best place I have ever stayed.
Summary: Attended my sons wedding 8/4/22 at Pelican and it was a world class affair. The resort itself is spectacular, in a great location overlooking the Pacific.  Particular thanks goes to Deanna Jones who helped us with our booking throughout the covid shutdown.  It is truly a resort in every sense, and the pool area is sensational, and whilst not a golfer. the 18 holes look world class to.  Thanks everyone for our brilliant stay with you.
Manager Response: I think we agreed that all future anniversaries are celebrated at Pelican Hill, correct?  Glad everyone enjoyed.  We did too.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Just been there for the third time in a two bedroom Villa but this time we are very disappointed . The Villa is nice even if maybe it would be good make some renovations , it’s the same as it was 10 years ago ! But the worst is all about service . We arrived at 10 pm and we went to the Villa club to check-in but it close at 7 !!! Then when we arrive went to check-in at the hotel and when we arrived  at our Villa we tried to order dinner but …. ROOM SERVICE STOPS AT 10 pm …. In a 5 star resort ?!? Even if you want drink or have a snack at the Coliseum pool AFTER 5pm YOU CAN’T because service ends at 5 !!!  Then let’s talk about the pillows … after 3 days I called and asked for foam pillows because the ones that we had made me and my husband get a bad neck pain . They told me that
Manager Response: Mrs. P, We've discussed your feedback amongst the team here and agree that there are some missed opportunities that we will learn from and address.  In one case it's a simple matter of more training for new associates, in another situation that you describe it's a matter of implementing a creative solution to an unexpected supply chain issue.  I apologize.  We appreciate your candid review and we hope that you will visit us a fourth time. Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Best hotel anywhere on the West Coast
Summary: Five star hotel to the max. The experience at Pelican Hill in terms of service is second to none. Order room service and you will feel like a king or queen. Wonderful ocean views and golf course. There is nothing that comes close to this resort.
Manager Response: Thank you Patrick! We look forward to having you visit again soon.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Quick Summer Stay with my Son.
Summary: We stayed in 146 a QQ villa with amazing views of the ocean. Great outdoor patio area with two huge chaise lounges. Room was large by typical standards my guess about 500 SQ Ft very high end.  Highlight was the pool area, was greeted by Ryan young guy do summer hours while on leave of University of Arizona, got us set up was very friendly and professional, also huge kudos to young gal dark hair who was doing the pool serving, incredibly happy, saw her run to help a couple get their umbrella situated really great customer service. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing a few of the team and the fine young adults that we have here for the summer. Oh, and our bungalow rooms are 835 sq ft on average (that's without the terrace sq ft!).

Summary: This was not my first time at Pelican Hill and it won't be my last.  In fact, thanks to this latest exposure to the Villas, I am going to work on getting my leadership team back for a retreat.    I have to admit that my expectations post pandemic were mixed and that while there was some bumpiness with regard to my stay, the staff at the Pelican managed it impeccably.   What they have not forgotten is how to provide a true guest experience.  They have a mastery in knowing just how to leave their guests wanting more and they know how keep us looking forward to returning with fondness.    I am thoroughly impressed with this property's resiliency and its ability to execute past the mixed outlook in patronage and staffing that the pandemic bestowed upon much of the hospitality

This is the most perfect resort we've ever been to.  From booking, to dining, to being shuttled around the beautiful grounds.....perfection.   If EVERY resort and their employees were as wonderful as this, we would stay local more often.
Manager Response: Thank you!  Our formula is simple.  Exceptional people, delivering extraordinary experiences, in an unforgettable setting.    Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: SPECTACULAR! THIS PLACE DOES NOT DISAPPOINT!
Summary: Still one of my favorites year after year!  We couldn't wait to leave the Ritz (except for 180Blu) to head to The Resort at Pelican Hill!  We initially stayed in a villa with our teen kids July 2019 and recently revisited during a trip to preview ChapmanU. This place is spectacular in every way from the accommodations, the service, the splendid grounds, and the spectacular ocean views from the immaculate golf course greens. The expansive coliseum pool and cabanas offered fun for the entire family, and the clubhouse pool provided a relaxing respite for the adult couples!
Manager Response: Hope that you enjoyed the preview of Chapman University.  It's a highly regarded university in our backyard.  And if your child goes there we expect that you will visit us more often!  Thank you for the favorable review.  All of us appreciate the positive feedback.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Amazing property, great staff.  Good people serving but the if you are looking for any kind of late night activity, not your place.  We had a work group of 30 looking for a drink at 10:15 and literally no bar open and no room service available.  Great views and amazing pool.

Summary Heading: Friends's Special Reunion after 2-yr Covid Lockdown
Summary: We (9 longtime friends) decided it was time for a reunion after two long years of covid lockdown, and the venue had to be truly special. We chose The Resort at Pelican Hill, a 5-star resort that welcomed us with world-class service in a beautiful Italian Renaissance-style setting. Our spacious 4-bedroom, 2-story villa had a panoramic view of the Pacific Ocean, the golf course, and the lush landscape. We have traveled to many scenic places, but this resort had a charm of its own. We think part of its secret is the pleasant service given by the staff. Free shuttles took us to places up to three miles away; our requests were met quickly; and supplies were delivered promptly. For five days, we were transported from hustle and bustle and landed in a  place that was magical and
Manager Response: The secret to what makes Pelican Hill so special is no longer a secret thanks to this review Dreamer!  The "pleasant service given by the staff" who I celebrate as highly engaged and passionate about the experiences we deliver are truly what make the Resort at Pelican Hill unique.  I'm thrilled that you recognized them and their smiles.  We will be looking forward to your return. Thank you, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Outstandingly Gorgeous- 4.5 out of 5 due to….
Summary: This place is outstandingly gorgeous. No doubt about it. The staff outside the doors to greet and help you and drive you/shuttle you around were ALL very personable and genuine and professional. The food we had at the Coliseum Grill was well presented and tasty. Our room was beautiful- see my photos. Lovely huge clean bed, fireplace, huge bathroom with deep tub and separate glass enclosed shower, Pelican embroidered towels, robes, slippers. Great coffee in the room machine, and a great hot water pot for tea, which I enjoyed. Huge balcony with views down upon golf course and then the ocean. We loved it UNTIL we sat for a few minutes out there and wow, the traffic noise is not minimal but quite substantial and loud. THAT is the reason I would give this rating 4.5 out of 5, but
Manager Response: Aimee, Thank you for providing a thorough, well rounded review of your visit.  We appreciate all of the favorable mentions but regret the noise that you experienced.  There are plenty of options that would provide the serene/quiet environment that you are accustomed to and we would be happy to assist with coordinating the next time you visit. Hope you have a wonderful North East summer and enjoy Candlewood Lake. Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Beautiful grounds, opulent rooms, 5 diamond service and experience. Would highly recommend to all. Coliseum pool and grill is an excellent place to enjoy a drink and hang out poolside or have an amazing meal. Can't wait to come back.

This resort opened in 2008. We have lived in this area for 21 years. We’ve dined here many times and the food is good. The rooms have not been updated. They need a facelift. They are dark and the furnishings are old and tired. The bathrooms have an automatic light which is ridiculous since every time you walk in the light go on. If someone is sleeping it will surely wake them up. There are no refreshments available for purchase or snacks in the room. The bungalows are squeezed next to each other so there is no privacy. Don’t stay here if your expecting a 5 star stay. There is no value for your money here. Paying in excess of $1500 per night for a room worth half that amount. You’ll be much happier staying at a true 5 star resort like the Montage.
Manager Response: Mr. Perlman,  I understand that you were in the middle of a relocation and busy, but we did attempt to connect with you multiple times while you were here.  I'm sorry that you weren't pleased with your bungalow accommodation.  The unit you occupied is in a quiet, fairly secluded area of the resort that guests typically enjoy.   The motion sensor that you reference is being remedied to provide enough light but less than what you experienced.  We agree it's too much in the middle of the night.  All of our Villas and Bungalows recently completed a light touch refresh and we are preparing  phase II of that work as part of our commitment to maintaining a first class product and resort.  I hope that we will have an opportunity to change your current perception.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Casual Elegance. Lovely property. Spacious accommodations. Private patio for lounging and dining.  Short walk to Crystal Cove. Concierge will also transport to and from beach if you're not up for the walk. We dined at the Coliseum Restaurant for breakfast, lunch and dinner over the course of our stay. Every meal was delicious and the staff was consistently pleasant and on the ball. Gorgeous views from various points of the property. Housekeeping snuck in and out keeping our room in tip top shape and replenishing water and other necessities.  Bike rentals available which I highly recommend for a fun day of exploring. Lovely property!

Hubby and I stayed in the Villas for this trip and I have to say it was amazing!  We stayed in villa 343 which was a perfect location and a short walk to the main entrance, Spa or the Coliseum Pool Restaurant.   Our view from our patio was breathtaking, overlooking the beautiful landscape of red roses and the ocean from a distance. The patio was very private. We also had 24 hour car service just by pressing "0" and asking the front desk to have a car pick us up at our villa or where ever we were on the property  if we didn't want to walk.  I had a hot stone massage at the spa and I actually fell asleep it was that relaxing. I also ordered room service a couple of times because I loved being on the private patio and just unwinding looking at the amazing views while hubby played
Manager Response: Dee,  On behalf of the entire team here at Pelican Hill, THANK YOU for sharing the details of our enchanting retreat on Tripadvisor.  We recognize that travelers are influenced by the reviews posted and appreciate the positive feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Warmly, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: The Best Place for Any Occasions!
Summary: We love The Resort and everyone here. At The Resort, you get to relax and enjoy the resort life while getting to experience home away from home. Our family never wants to leave when we come here. After every stay, our daughter is always asking us when are we coming back.  We've stayed at both the bungalows and the villas, and they are both amazing! Bedding is very comfortable, and they do a great job with cleaning especially during this time. I like that at both the villas and the bungalows, you can drive up to your room rather than having to park in a parking structural or valet like at other hotels or resorts. The ceilings are very high and open, which makes it very inviting. At the main building is the Coliseum Pool, and the views are expansive! The pool is heated, so no
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and for highlighting the various options available to guests visiting the Resort!  And what can we say about Danielle that you and others haven't already acknowledged.  She's a rock star and truly does define attentive, thoughtful, personalized hospitality.  We hope you return again soon, Gerard and team  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Stayed in Jan as part of a medical conference.   Just me - but I will bring someone with me next time.   It's too special not to share.    Transportation:   Quick $25 Uber from John Wayne airport (great little airport).    Walked to / from while on property, but I saw shuttles.   Looked like they had a beach shuttle as well.  Accommodations:   Stayed in bungalow 344 and LOVED it.   Fireplace, balcony, easy walk to lobby, pool, etc..    Fun:   It's a great place to be alone - or with someone.   I walked and enjoyed sunrises and sunsets.  When the conference was over, I rented an e-bike and rode for hours - to the beach, historic Crystal Cove, Corona Del Mar, around the amazing ritzy coastal neighborhoods.   The pool is spectacular.        Food:   The food I had at the conference
Manager Response: Sherry,  I would certainly encourage you to share the Pelican Hill experience with someone next time!  Sounds like you logged a few miles on the e-bike and saw much of the beautiful Pacific coastline of beautiful beaches.  It's 72 degrees and sunny as I write this...on February 8th (I do that for my friends back in the North East).  Thank you for your feedback.  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Always The Best For A Special Occasion!!!
Summary: I am actually reluctant to share how above-and-beyond Pelican Hill is compared to the other 5-star resorts in the area, but must confess… I keep checking out the Montage, Ritz-Carlton and now, the Waldorf-Astoria…Pelican Hill still reigns supreme! Food service is wonderful & varied! Poolside: love the chicken tenders & Berry Collins Coliseum: great salads & pizza Pelican Grill: service at either the bar or patio is my preference…love the short ribs and crab cakes there! Market Caffe…easy for breakfast, lunch, snacks or that bottle of wine for your patio…all reasonably priced. Always have to make sure that we visit for a scoop of pistachio gelato…while enjoying that view!!! Also: don’t miss out on the resort’s stellar room service brought out to your patio…We love to split an
Manager Response: We are so thankful that you overcame your "reluctance" to share such wonderful feedback about your visit.  Danielle certainly is a rock star and an incredible ambassador of Pelican Hill AND of our industry.  Thank you too for recognizing all of the hard working people (around the world) that have come to serve each day through this pandemic.  All of us appreciate the kindness.  Happy Anniversary and we look forward to seeing you again for your birthday in October (if not sooner!).  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: WOW. The grounds of this property are amazing. Beautifully landscaped with lemon trees and flowers and botanicals everywhere. We stayed in a villa and it was huge! Loved walking daily through the resort and beyond. Breakfast everyday was excellent. Definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Glad that you enjoyed the 504 beautiful acres of open space with over 100 different types of trees on property.  Our landscape maintenance crew takes great pride in their work and it's nice to have you appreciate it.  Thank you, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: We spent Christmas Eve and Day at the resort as first time visitors. Splurged a bit on one of the better rooms and were not disappointed. The layout of the resort is somewhat unusual, and almost has the feel of a residential complex, with individual parking spots, winding lanes and sidewalks. Not sure if you call it a room or is it a villa, but being single story, thick walls and private patios with views of the on-site golf course, the ocean and if you are lucky Catalina, we felt very isolated and loved the quiet.   Room was in excellent condition and spacious, with a minimalistic design. I’m no interior designer, so not sure what the theme is. I guessed at California coastal with some Scandinavian touches due to the colors and light wood. Great bathroom with double sinks, tub

Just spent a week at The Resort at Pelican Hill, for a much anticipated golf holiday with friends. It was our first vacation since the beginning of the pandemic.   The resort staff (front desk, waiters, house keepers) were very friendly and the concierge team was exceptionally helpful. Our garden view room was comfortable, but dated and ordinary- not worth the hefty daily price of $1200!  The resort is vast and we felt like we were vacationing in the suburbs.  We were disappointed to learn, just days before arriving that the main restaurant  (Andrea's) was closed for the week, as was the South Golf Course for much of the week. It would have been nice to know this prior to booking.  Breakfast service in the hotel restaurant does not open until 8 am which doesn't work for early

We have stayed here a couple times for special occasions and have always had great experiences and that's why I chose here to do something really special which was proposing to the my girlfriend.  I cant thank Danielle and Andrew enough for their help with planning and helping me order arrangements and helping with the actual proposal.  Their attention to detail and willingness to go above and beyond to make this day perfect was so appreciated.   We had breakfast at the pool the next morning which was great.  Service was fast and our waitress was friendly and attentive. We had the lobster Frittata and the blueberry pancakes both of which were delicious In the afternoon we laid by the pool and once again the service was great.  Every time we needed a new drink the waiter was
Manager Response: Congratulations and Thank You Bobby!  We're delighted to have been part of such a special occasion.   I appreciate the recognition of this special group of associates that make Pelican Hill such a wonderful place to visit. Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Not usually one to write reviews (unless it is just an outstanding experience).  That said, we stayed the weekend at Pelican Hill and I was really disappointed.  First off, I think our nightly rate was approximately $1,800.  The breakfast was not served warm, the service at both the pool-side restaurant and at the pool was really, really slow.  The hotel just appears to be way under staffed.  Also, what is the deal with no late check out?  Just ridiculous.  After our stay (and we have family in OC so we often do little staycations from LA) I told my wife that we should just stay at little boutique hotels, get much better service & value, and not be so disappointed afterwards.
Manager Response: Thomas, I'm sorry that we didn't receive a more favorable review about your stay.  I've asked the team to connect with you to discuss in more detail.   We take feedback such as yours seriously. Thank you, Gerard

Summary: We stayed in a bungalow as a family of 3. We booked an ocean view room and were allocated room 151. I would say this is more of a partial ocean view as it looked over the main lobby roof and gardens. The ocean view is on the right once you walk outside.   We absolutely loved our stay though and wished we had a longer stay but it just means we’ll have to come back again later!   The staff were polite, always friendly helpful.   The room and grounds were clean and beautifully landscaped.   We enjoyed dining at Pelican Grill and at the Coliseum Pool.   We also utilised the free shuttle within the property and to Crystal Cove. They packed us some beach toys for our toddler which came in handy for the remainder of our holiday.   Perhaps next time my husband can enjoy a round of golf!
Manager Response: Justine from Australia, We will be here to welcome you back!  And I would be more than happy to secure a tee-time for your husband. Thank you for your review, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: This place is magical.  It's a true getaway destination!   Very peaceful and very private.   We stayed in a 3-bedroom villa and it surpassed our expectations.  It was simply impeccable!  Special thanks to Hunter Warkentien who helped me so much in so many ways both before and during my stay!   Thanks to all the Concierge team as well!  Special thanks to Rachel, Jason, and Andre for all your help with reservations,  villa needs,  and local information.  Our Housekeeping Angels Juana and Anabel were just amazing - providing personalized service with excellence!!  We so appreciate all you did for us to keep our villa clean and supplied!!!  Gracias!!!  The room service team were delightful and we enjoyed their warm smiles every day!!!  Thank you Chris,  Eddie, Grace, Aubrey, Ashley,
Manager Response: Rosa, Thank YOU...for recognizing so many of our dedicated associates BY NAME.  Wow.  We appreciate you taking the time to learn the names of our team.  It means the world.  Further, we celebrate these name mentions internally. Well done and most appreciated, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Almost to the day two years later I have found again visiting heaven on Earth this time in the United States. Two years ago my wife and I enjoyed a visit to Les Pres d'Eugenie Maison Gerard near Pau in the south of France.  Without a doubt in France chef Gerard's food and hospitality is second to none. Today as I sit drinking my coffee looking at the Pacific Ocean from my Terrace at the resort at Pelican Hill in Newport Beach California I cannot help but recognize that my stay here has been again another stop in Paradise. The Resort At Pelican Hill is exceptional. It is another place where service is practiced at its highest level. Staff though young are highly trained and dedicated to Five Star customer experiences. Everywhere on the resort we were treated with the highest

Spacious rooms, every staff member says hello and is eager to help, excellent food, phenomenal views. Good food, excellent service. We will continue to return. The golf courses are exceptional in terms of the topography and views. The driving range is grass and is free for unlimited use in the afternoons.
Manager Response: Thank you Denny!  We're glad that you enjoyed your experience here at Pelican Hill and will we look forward to your return.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Top notch resort with exceptional service
Summary: We rented a four bedroom villa for 4 adult couples for a week.  The architecture, furnishings and grounds throughout the resort are exceptional.  The villa was spacious and beautifully appointed with a lovely L shaped patio with a dining table and chairs and chaise lounges, all overlooking the golf course and Pacific ocean.  If there was anything we wanted; additional bottled water, more towels, a spatula - they were cheerfully delivered within minutes.  We cooked a few meals, ate at both the Coliseum restaurant and the Villa Clubhouse, and utilized Room Service.  The staff is professional, warm and gracious.  As a group of 8, we utilized the on-resort transportation numerous times and they were prompt and friendly,  Housekeeping services were wonderful as well.  We utilized the
Manager Response: Roberta, I appreciate you recognizing the incredible group of associates who are passionate about delivering exceptional service.   They've been asked to do extraordinary things these last 18 months and I'm very grateful to every one of our wonderful team. Thank you for recognizing them, Gerard

Summary: The entire grounds are breathtaking and the service in incredible.  Our room was spacious with a king bed, sitting area, gas fireplace, along with a nice sized patio with two chaise chairs and a small table with two chairs. The bathroom is oversized with a large soaking tub, walk-in shower, two sinks, and a toilet closet with spray bidet.  Our room had a lovely view of the ocean.  There is a nice coffee shop off the lobby that also sells sandwiches, ice cream, bakery items, with lovely tables that over look the ocean and the golf course.   The spa was very nice with a sauna, steam room, and oversized jacuzzi. It also had a very nice sitting room with hot tea and snacks, and the dressing rooms were well appointed with showers and all amenities you need to freshen up. The pool is

It a great place to relax and eat.we went to coliseum bar and grill. The place has the biggest pool in the world. We took a 4 hour nap at the pool. Next, we went to PELICAN bar and grill and have  a Gratiot dinner. I love the hot,tender grill chicken salad and hot ,sweet grill steak. The place has a great ocean view. It so gorgeous watching the sunset
Manager Response: Chauster B, Sounds like a lovely little nap!  Glad that you were able to relax and that you enjoyed both the Coliseum and Pelican Grill. Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: This is my first time visiting the pelican hill and it was amazing! All the staff are super friendly and they go above and beyond to make your stay feel wonderful.  We booked the garden view and the view is beautiful.  We travel with a 7 months baby so we didn’t dine in at the restaurant and instead we ordered room services and tried their market and cafe.  The room service is very convenient as you can download their app and order the room service in advance.  The filet mignon is a bit over cooked but the cheesecake is to die for.  They will set up your meal for you and you can choose to eat in the room or in the balcony.  When you are done you can also use the app to request tray pick up.  The resort is very quiet and you can just walk around and enjoy the amazing view.
Manager Response: Thank you Linda and congratulations on the birth of your child!  I'm glad that you experienced and enjoyed using our new app.  The team put a lot of work into creating a user friendly experience when using it.    Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Pelican Hill is a 5 star resort with spacious and well appointed rooms, excellent food and two spectacular golf courses.  The back nine of the South Course has several holes that overlook the ocean with great views.
Manager Response: Bill,  Hole #13 on the South Course certainly provides for an incredible photo op.  You can't get much closer to the Pacific Ocean!  And a little fun fact perhaps....every hole on the North Course has ocean views.   Glad you enjoyed your visit and thank you for the feedback.  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Best of the best.  Stayed at multiple 5 diamond resorts and this is the best in terms of service, location, quality.  Got champagne and chocolates for our anniversary. Enjoyed the coliseum pool which is a massive circular pool and probably the nicest I’ve seen.  Villa pool feels like you are on the ocean. You can take a shuttle/trolley to beach, shopping center, pretty much anywhere. You feel like you are the only one at the resort. Every request is granted. Golf resort also the nicest in terms of ocean views and canyons.
Manager Response: Erich, Thank you for sharing your experience at Pelican Hill.  The team here recognizes the nobility in service to others and our ability to create memorable moments for guests who visit.  Happy Anniversary and we will look forward to your next stay. Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: This resort truly beats them all. Between the incredible service, the exquisite food, and stunning rooms, we could not recommend the Resort enough. I am already planning my next visit. Villas were so nice instead of rooms. Felt like your own private house!!
Manager Response: Meg,  Having you recognize Pelican Hill as the "Best resort in America" is a great honor and we're thrilled with the recognition. Our Villa product is really "one of a kind" and I'm glad that you experienced "home away from home."  We look forard to your return!  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: This is Orange County so we don’t have to wear masks inside…
Summary: We were surprised that when we checked in the crew behind the front desk were not wearing masks. When we mentioned our concern they said that your in Orange County and we don’t have to wear masks inside…Just because their not mandated to wear a mask inside which is ludicrous to us you would think they would take it upon themselves to protect their customers as most people were wearing masks inside…We will stay at Terranea next time…
Manager Response: Dear TravelingFools,  We are following CAL/OSHA's guidelines strictly which have evolved and changed over the course of the last year.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: The Resort at Pelican Hill is Wonderful!
Summary: This was my ninth stay at the resort and it never disappoints! It is the best! The bungalows, grounds, pool and restaurants are all fabulous! . The views are beautiful. The Coliseum is a wonderful place for breakfast. The Pelican Grill is a great choice for dinner. The staff at the resort is friendly and professional. The resort took all the proper Covid precautions which was very reassuring. Looking forward to going back next summer!

This was our second visit to Pelican Hill. The property and spa are still spectacular as our first visit. The round gigantic pool is a highlight (this is why we came), the grounds, the incredible service (every staff member treated us like gold). Also loved the adult pool. Pelican Hill KNOWS how to do luxury right. We booked massages at the spa for my entire family of 4. My therapist John was incredible. He worked out knots and kinks I did not know I had. Everyone is covid safe as well which is a plus. My two minor complaints are the location of the dresser and wardrobe in the bungalows is so dark and poorly lit. They need to do better lighting in the entryway so it's easy to see in that very dark spot. And we had breakfast in the Coliseum restaurant and their avocados were raw.
Manager Response: We will be looking forward to your THIRD visit "mwells"!  Thank you for recognizing our incredible staff who show up every day ready to serve.  They've been heroes this past year and I'm so thankful for their dedication.  I'll have chef inspect our avocados based upon your feedback as well.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Absolutely amazing time at the resort. Our Bungalow was huge, well decorated,  and spotless. Everything you can think of was provided in the room. Great fireplace and patio area. Quite rooms. Poll was very large and big enough that you can choose how close you want to be to little kids. Great and friendly service. Ice water provided. Beautiful ocean view, gardens are very well maintained and cleaned. Food served at the pool in more or less the same as at the Colosseum restaurant. Lunch and Dinner menu almost identical. Pelican Grill menu is also similar. Food is great for pool menu, but it would be nice to have more variety at the restaurants especially for guests who are staying longer that 2-3 days and prefer not to leave facility to eat out.   Hotel and valet service is
Manager Response: Thank you for the "amazing" review Malishka!  We look forward to having you experience Pelican Grill again next time you visit.  Our Chef continues to make changes to the menu that I'm certain you will enjoy.

Summary: We recently had our very first family reunion here.   Party of 21.   A trip none of us will forget.   We booked 3 different villas and they were all beautiful, clean, and spacious.   I must say the 4 bedroom ocean view was to die for.  Because I planned the trip, I got first dip, the upstairs  master…  It was oh so dreamy!  Everyone we encountered, from employees to guests,  were all nice and friendly.  We enjoyed the pools, the cocktails, the beautiful morning and afternoon walks around the resort.   Service was top notch.  We enjoyed it so much, we never made it to the beach.   This is definitely at the top of our list!   Expensive but highly recommended.  Whoever is planning our next family reunion is in trouble.   Hard to compete!
Manager Response: Sounds like you will be returning to the Resort at Pelican Hill for your next family reunion!  I appreciate you recognizing the incredible group of hospitality professionals that make the resort so special.  Thank you, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Got to experience this great resort for our 15th wedding anniversary. First class all around. The pool was awesome,  Our room was amazing. Team members were so attentive and caring. We wished We could have stayed longer, we hope to be back soon !

This was our first time visiting California. We chose this resort for the views and amenities. It did not disappoint! We had an ocean view bungalow and the views were stunning. Pool was great and food and drinks were awesome. It was definitely a relaxing vacation for the 2 of us!

Had a nice time here for our 5th visit (4th birthday celebration) to the Resort at Pelican Hill. We always book through Amex Fine Hotels & Resorts and the hotel does a good job of honoring the benefits.  As always, we love the great views and spacious rooms (especially when they can upgrade us to one of the ocean view suites - this time they couldn’t as the property was fully booked). Most hotels we’ve stayed in had some sort of noise that prevented us from truly getting a good night’s rest. There’s always noise from the city, cars passing, neighbors (outside/upstairs/next door), or housekeeping. Here we almost always get an undisturbed nice quiet rest. Great covid protocols and clean rooms can be counted on as well as plenty of towels and bottled water. We were missing in room

I paid for an ocean view room and from the pictures you can see was non existent just a bunch of overgrown trees. For $900 a night you would think you would get a beautiful view. Also was charged a $55 a night resort fee not sure for what because the spa is closed, no gym and no daily housekeeping. We were also promised a $100 dining credit at check in but was only given $43 at check out. The explanation was that it’s before taxes, gratuities and service fees which our dining bill was much more than that. I’ve stayed at the Ritz, the Ranch at Laguna, Montage and all have been excellent! This place was subpar to say the least.
Manager Response: Ady, We're sorry that the room that you occupied didn't have the view that you had expected.  We've continued to groom our trees by raising their canopies and trimming them responsibly.  We also continue to offer more amenities as the state of California allows.  Last week another  another restaurant opened (Pelicah Grill), our gyms are open,  and our spa is scheduled to open on June 15.  Regardless, we regret that we didn't deliver upon your expectations and our Director of Rooms has reached out to you via private message to address with you. Sincerely, Gerard Widder

Summary: This was our first stay at a hotel since COVID began, and it was fantastic in every way. They take all the right precautions to make you feel safe. Outside of that, the property is beautiful, views amazing, every staff member we encountered was so friendly... they have it all put together. We were disappointed the nicer restaurants are still closed for dinner, but had a great breakfast and lunch at the Coliseum Grill. Can't wait to come back!

Long overdue review - came here for 4 nights  - it was so wonderful my wife and I tried to extend our stay (couldn't due to work issues) but we will be back. Have recommended this hotel to several friends, every one of them tell me how amazing it is. Definitely will be back!
Manager Response: We don't mind waiting for a review like this one 81ash.   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate you telling your friends about this very special resort (along with a reminder that it's a short drive from LA!).  I look forward to your return.  Gerard

Summary: We had a wonderful, relaxing stay at Pelican Hill. We had an ocean view bungalow that was nicely furnished and super clean. The property is beautiful and well maintained. We dined both in room and at the Coliseum Grill - both provided delicious meals and were efficient. Service was attentive and gracious. I can't think of anything that could have been better!

Staff were exceptional from concierge to service. Golf staff and club; perfect. Special details I wanted were better than I had anticipated. Already booked our next stay. Can’t wait to enjoy the luxury accommodation all over again.
Manager Response: All of us take great pride in the resort.  We take tremendous pride in the exceptional staff and the dedication that they all demonstrate to delivering highly attentive, personalized service.    Thank you for recognizing how exceptional the asssociates here at Pelican Hill are!  Gerard

Summary Heading: Michael at the front desk gave us our dream vacation
Summary: Pelican Hill is amazing! The villas are amazing! Michael from the front desk is amazing!   The entire staff of Pelican Hill are so kind and helpful, from the gardeners to housekeeping. They didn’t just hand me a map and said “have a nice day”, they helped me find where I needed to go and offered to personally show me where to go.    Michael is very kind and knows how to give guests that 5-star resort feeling! I felt very welcomed from the moment I walked in and Michael greeting us right away and offering my sister and I a bottle of water. The checking in process was such a breeze. The fact that there was no line, Michael made sure we were taken care of with our requests for our room. I had booked an ocean view room and Michael MADE SURE we were satisfied with our view by showing
Manager Response: Thank you "yaysandra" for recognizing Michael and the incredible team that "make sure" we exceed expectations whenever we can.  It's what makes what we "do" so enjoyable and rewarding.  We look forward to having you visit again soon.   Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Staying at Pelican Hill is a wonderful experience. The grounds and amenities are immaculate and only outshined by the wonderful staff.  I can't say enough good things about how helpful and friendly everyone was.  Specifically Kevin Yoches was polite, engaging and a wealth of local knowledge.  Mario who delivered us ice to our bungalow, and even offered to drive (and pick up!) us to dinner off property made us feel like family. I would highly recommend a stay at Pelican Hill, and hope to return soon.
Manager Response: Lugol760, I'm delighted that you had the opportunity to meet Kevin and Mario - two of the many highly attentive and engaging members of this team.  The grounds are quite spectacular and we're proud stewards of the property.  But what makes us uniquely different is the group of professionals that are commited to delivering personal, attentive, and genuine "hospitality" to guests like yourself. Thank you, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Great hotel stay, beautiful property with great restaurants
Summary: The hotel property is one of the most beautiful properties in the Orange County. It's vast compound consists of a golf course, restaurants and a view to die for. We were able to get a villa and the rooms are quite spacious. The rooms are clean and the service at this hotel great. This resort makes you feel like you're not in California, but on an island somewhere. The most amazing thing about staying at this resort are its amenities. The swimming pool is set up like the Roman coliseum and the pool is probably double or triple the size of any standard hotel pool. We loved staying at this hotel and would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear OCTraveler777,  "A world away" is what we like to describe as your experience.  And while not on an "island," the views from "the hill" are spectacular.  We look forward to opening more amenities soon and as the state lessens restrictions.  We anticipate opening another one of our dining venues for resort guests and golfers (Pelican Gill) as well as our Spa and Fitness Centers when allowed.  Come visit again soon, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Feels a world-away (in a good way)!
Summary: This was my second stay at Pelican Hill in one month. Pandemic-life (working from home, kids in distance learning, etc.) was wearing on me, and I desperately needed a vacation. I chose Pelican Hill, because I liked the open-air layout of the property and it checked all the boxes for me (great pool, close to the beach, golf, and it was within an hour drive for me). The property is beautifully-maintained, the bungalows were beautiful and felt very private, and the service was fantastic. On my first weekend, it rained, so I enjoyed a cozy weekend filled with in-room dining, wine, and simply relaxing by the in-room fireplace. This past weekend, the weather was beautiful, so we golfed, walked down to the beach, swam in the perfectly heated, spectacular pool, and enjoyed food +
Manager Response: Thank you Hanna!  Perhaps you'll return again THIS weekend?  We would love to welcome you back. Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: I surprised my wife with a stay at The Resort at Pelican Hill for our 25th wedding anniversary.    I had reach out to the GM Gerard Widder in advance of our stay to let him know that it was a special occasion.  He immediately responded to my outreach and put me in contact with one of the Concierge Supervisors from the hotel, Andrew Bennett.    Spectacular is the word that best captures our experience.  We can’t possibly thank Gerard, Andrew, and the rest of the exemplary staff enough for their exceptional service and care.  Andrew  Bennett in particular went above and beyond in helping to plan and execute our stay.  And Pelican Hill was overly generous in so many ways – none the least of which was an upgrade to a king bungalow suite with an ocean view. A memory that my wife
Manager Response: You're more than welcome Phil.    It's a joy to help make these special occasssions just a little more memorable.  It's why we "do" what we do!  Congratulations again on your silver anniversary.  Gerard, Bennett and team.

Summary: I have stayed in hotels only twice since Covid started last March and both of those stays were at Pelican. My girlfriend and I are pretty careful and don’t go out frequently but both trips we felt very comfortable. The check in process is great.  I love the bag that guests receive with masks and other goodies. This is a great way to start a stay especially for someone that takes a lot of precautions.  The front desk agent was super friendly and knowledgeable and I love how we are given a map and shown where we are and where our room is without even asking. Next driving to our room the gentleman at the gate welcomed us and was extremely friendly with a big smile and again assisted us on where to go to get to our room. Walking up to the room I love how the door and lock had the
Manager Response: Bobby,  I learned today that we've been recognized by US News & World Report's "Best Hotel Awards" and that they identify the best hotels using a comprehensive methodology centered on three components: reputation among professional travel experts, guest reviews and hotel class ratings.  Point being, reviews on Tripadvisor are considered in this ranking and all of us appreciate your very thorough (and complimentary) review.    In particular, I am thrilled that our attentive staff is being recognized for delivering the "best service" you have ever come across.  I've recognized Bryce personally.  He too is passionate about the work we do and we're glad to have him on our team.  Thank you again for sharing your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again.  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: We stayed in the two bedroom villa and celebrated Christmas with our family - it was a beautiful stay and met all of our needs and expectations. Looking forward to more staycations in the future. Thank you Pelican staff for being so pleasant!
Manager Response: Dear Altbgh2020,  Thank YOU for being so pleasant.  The team enjoyed helping make your Christmas at Pelican Hill memorable.  Time to start planning your next 'staycation!'  See you soon,  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: My husband and I decided to splurge by spending a weekend at this incredible resort to celebrate our 23rd wedding anniversary. We were treated like royalty by every staff member we encountered from the front desk check-in to poolside employees to room service delivery person to the young lady who finalized our check-out bill. We even stopped while taking a walk to ask one of the housekeepers a question and she spent 5 minutes with us to make sure we had all our answers and shared interesting trivia about the property. Perhaps the jewel of the resort is the front office supervisor, Michael, who ensured we were happy with our room and sent us a nice bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries to celebrate our special day. The hotel oozes with top notch, best in class
Manager Response: Dear terrih421,  We appreciate you choosing the Resort at Pelican Hill to celebrate your anniversary.  Thank you! And I'm thrilled that you had an opportunity to enage with the various associates here who make this resort more than an incredible destination.  Each of them have continued to exude kindness, patience, and care during this pandemic and I celebrate all of our team members for their commitment to the safety of our guests and of one another.  We all look forward to welcoming more travelers to the resort in the coming months and we are busy preparing for your return.  Thank you again for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor.  We read all of this feedback and celebrate associates that are mentioned by name.    Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Overall a lovely resort with lots of charm.  The Director of Sales, Mr Zarko Lucic is exceptionally friendly and professional..  We had an issue during our stay and he handled it like a true professional satisfying all parties involved.  Overall this is one of if not the nicest resort in South Cal.
Manager Response: Dear ahukshiv, Thank you for recognizing the resort and the hospitality professionals that are the key to making your stay memorable.  Associates like Zarko are examples of the passion and commitment we make to being exceptional.  I'm thankful for the dedication of our team, especially during these difficult times and appreciate the distinction of "nicest resort in South Cal!" We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Very pleased with our stay at Pelican Hill Resort. While we have stayed here many times before, we were a bit weary about coming during Covid. While somethings have changed, their service is still impeccable. We came during Halloween and their manager Kevin surprised my kids with bags of treats and snacks! Charmagne at breakfast and Sarah Astrologo at the front desk also helped make this a wonderful stay. Very impressed.  Resort is very serene and even tho its COVID they are clearly making an effort to cater to their guests at a 5 star level.   It’s those little touches that make you want to come back again and again.

I get it we’re in the middle of a pandemic....BUT although the room price has not gone down the amenities have.   2 restaurants closed, I get it!   Spa closed, I get it!  No housekeeping until 3rd day of stay, I get it!  Room service dinner delivered in plastic containers, I get it!  No breakfast besides room service available until 8AM, I don’t get it!   Room service had almost an hour delivery time for a bagel and coffee at 7:30. Maybe this would let management know their guest are hungry BEFORE 8am.   There is a mask rule in all public indoor areas there is not one at the pool or outdoor restaurants. How can a guest be allowed to vape and blow smoke in the direction of other guests after finishing  his meal and not one employee asked him not to?  The grounds are lovely. The
Manager Response: Lisa,  We get it!  And as a result we are making changes within In-Room Dining to better serve the needs of our guests.  Thank you for the feedback.  Truly.  Gerard Widder Managing Director The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Venetian marble and Italian Cyprus trees welcome you into the resort. Long, quiet roads wrap through the 500 acres and provide amazing vistas of Newport Beach’s coastline.  The Colosseum pool alongside it’s restaurant is the most popular spot on the resort and provides a lively scene to socialize. Escaping back into your room, whether it be a bungalow or villa, is like finding a private oasis: upscale bathroom with full-size tub, quality robe and slippers, lush bedding, and sliding doors to a shaded terrace. This glimpse into the glamour of Southern California will not soon be forgotten.
Manager Response: Dear ROBandVEE,  Glad that you appreciate the grandeur of the Resort at Pelican Hill.  It truly is like no other.  All of us are proud of the quality of the product, the maintenance of the entire resort including our landscaping, and the attention to every detail that discerning guests recognize.  "A place like no other" is how we describe this incredible resort destination.    We hope that you will choose to return again in the near future.  Warm regards and thank you for the feedback.  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: We had a great time, and rented in the North villas. Plenty of room to stretch and relax. Note: if you stay in the North Villas, stay on the third floor for a view. We were on the second floor with no view. The staff was very friendly and attentive. In the pool area, they need some work on their speed. It took forever to get food and beverages. However, I would allow for Covid-19, since the staffing was probably yet to get up to par. We did have dinner there only one night, and with a limited menu, they did an excellent job. The service people really kept us laughing. The only real minus that I would give them, was the furniture was very warn and needs updating. Our golfing experience was top notch, except for some slow players in front of us. We would recommend the resort, but
Manager Response: FIResdnt, Our North Villa 2 Bedroom units are a wonderful option for guests looking for extra space, a large living room, and plenty of privacy.  I apologize that, while you found our staff friendly and attentive, we weren't as "speedy" as you anticipated.  We continue to increase our staffing levels because of travelers like yourself who have round Pelican Hill a safe place during these difficult times. Thank you for visiting the Resort at Pelican Hill. Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: I wanted to end our summer vacation with a relaxing beachfront stay in a luxury setting. This was just it. Location is unbeatable, the beach and ocean are beautiful, probably the prettiest of all California, not counting that you can actually swim as the water temperature is acceptable. You do pay the price but get it all. We stayed two nights and enjoyed the amenities without taking our car once. The beach service was impeccable.
Manager Response: Ben,  All of us here at the Resort are delighted that you so thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us.  We also agree with you that our beaches and views are some of the prettiest in California.  For those not familiar with Newport Coast we are located mid-way between LA and San Diego in what we refer to as "paradise."  We look forward to your return.  Sincerely, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: we live less than an hour away but like many people needed a vacation.  with COVID still a real concern, it was important to go somewhere that we could feel like we were still safe.  After looking at various places The Villas at the Resort at Pelican Hill seemed to fulfill everything we needed.  The Peace of Mind implementations worked well - hand sanitizer everywhere, extra masks, masks and hand sanitizer on arrival, and all remotes were prepackaged you reassure they had been cleaned.  we still had lysol wiped just in case.  We mostly did our own cooking, almost packed our whole house but still used some of the supplied materials (all cuisinart and pretty clean).  The Wolf oven/range was awesome.  Danielle was amazing in helping me coordinate some groceries and getting some
Manager Response: Dear Kayb,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a thorough and thoughtful review.  Even though you live within an hour drive we love making you feel as if you are "a world away!"  Glad that you experienced our Peace of Mind initiative and felt safe throughout your stay.  It's our top priority.  And while the resort situated on 504 acres is magnificent, so too are the beaches and surrounding neighborhoods.  We're delighted that you enjoyed everything that Newport Coast has to offer.  We look forward to having you return again soon.  Warm regards, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: This was our second visit to Pelican Hill and the view alone will have us coming back for more.  The bungalows were spacious and exactly as expected. The pool was amazing and huge, perfect for social distancing. On-site dining options were great for breakfast and lunch, and the resturant and resort staff treated everyone like family. We're already planning our next getaway, and Pelican Hill is quickly becoming our home away from home.

Service here is nothing short of exceptional. Even with limitations on what is open we had an amazing time. Villas are beautiful and we love the isolation of the villa pool. We can't wait to return again at the end of the summer for another get away.
Manager Response: Kcali8496,  The good news...summer never ends here in Newport Beach and the pool is maintained at 82 degrees year round.  See you again soon,  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: The grounds of the Pelican Hill resort are simply stunning.  The landscaping, the layout, and the views are top notch, especially in the public areas.   The bungalows were spacious and beautiful, with a very comfortable bed, and a huge, and comfortable, balcony/patio.  The bathroom was large, and the tub large enough to have a large-framed male soak in it.  The bed was extremely comfortable.  Throughout the stay, the staff on all counts was very friendly and attentive, and did not hesitate to respond, enthusiastically, to any request.  This is definitely a five-star resort (with corresponding prices, of course), but the grounds and location are simply stunning.  If I had to pick a gripe, it would be that traffic noise is quite noticeable from the balcony, but it isn't all that
Manager Response: Hello Matt,  Thank you so much for visiting Pelican Hill! We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to experience all that our seaside village has to offer. I appreciate your kind feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards, Gerard Widder Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Even with virus issues this is a place I cannot  give a high rating to yet. Beware.
Summary: Okay. So we were needing a change of scenery (although earlier in May visited the San Ysidro Ranch and am about  to write that review) and decided Pelican Hill might be perfect for us. We booked through Amex Centurion although learned both during the booking and the stay that the Centurion level means nothing to Pelican Hill. Checked the family into a 3 bedroom "villa" and was happy to be told that we would have a butler available to us at all times. Unfortunately the check-in was the only time we saw our butler and every time I pushed the "butler" button on the phone I got a different person at the front desk. I will say that each person I spoke to with any request was terrifically nice and seemed to be genuinely hospitable, however, very little resulted after each of my
Manager Response: GoGo1951,  At the time of your visit I certainly acknowledge the impact that COVID had on our ability to deliver the full guest experience that you expect.  We've used the past couple of months however to navigate providing a safe experience for our resort guests and at the same time meet, dare I say exceed, your expectations.  While we are still unable to provide all of the amenities that guests have come to appreciate when visiting the Resort at Pelican Hill, the overwhelming feedback we have received has been very positive.  We will continue to evaluate our offerings in the weeks and months ahead.  Thank you, Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary: Needed a break and a change of perspective/scenery from home during the COVID pandemic so decided to stay somewhere local but very different than home. This was our second stay here and my second birthday celebration at the Pelican as well. We had a wonderful time, and one night was too short!  We stayed in a lovely ocean-view villa (previously stayed in a bungalow). It was honestly too much space for us (we kept 2 of the 3 bedroom doors closed and never went in) but the living room and terrace were wonderful. The staff were excellent.  Everything felt clean. I wasn't sure about the kitchen utensils and cups (when they were last used and disinfected) so we didn't use most of them and re-cleaned everything we used with soap and hot water. Nothing against the Pelican, but we just
Manager Response: Happy belated birthday! We're grateful that you chose to include Pelican Hill in your celebrations and appreciate your thoughtful feedback about your stay, especially your suggestions regarding the presentation of kitchenware and frequency of housekeeping service. Please be assured our guests' and associates' wellness remains our highest priority, and I am proud to say that we have been able to serve our guests in a responsible manner during this period maintaining strict health and safety guidelines. Thank you again for your kind review, and we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon.   Stay healthy and best regards,  Gerard Widder Managing Director

Summary Heading: Location, Room, Service- 5 STARS all the way !
Summary: I have traveled the world and the Resort at Pelican Hill is now one of my new favorite hotels. The expansive grounds are beautiful with the gigantic round Coliseum pool with a surrounding restaurant. There is also a fine dining restaurant called Andrea and the Pelican Grill across the street. The spa is beautiful with travertine tiles everywhere and a large jacuzzi, steam room, and relaxation room. They also have various activities including yoga. The bungalows are very cozy with ocean views, large patios, and fireplaces. The service is top- notch and I look forward to my return soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, Mike! We're delighted to read you enjoyed exploring all the Resort has to offer and hope this is the first of many visits to Pelican Hill. I appreciate your kind feedback and look forward to the opportunity to serve you again soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Lovely room, less than lovely front office  service
Summary: This resort is beautiful. A lovely setting and the bungalow I stayed in had a spectacular  view of the ocean. But for a 5-star luxury resort it had the most uneven service I've ever experienced.  I arrived around noon. While I understand the resort has a 4PM check-in policy I had called in advance explaining I was going to a wedding with multiple events and would really appreciate getting into my room as soon as possible. When I checked in, I was told "You know our check-in policy."  Ah.. maybe. But perhaps there was  a more gracious way to say that to me.  I wandered around until after 3 when I went back to the front desk where the person rudely said, " I said I'd call you when we had a room." Thank heavens someone else and said they would check and yes, a room was available.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your feedback with us. I sincerely apologize that your arrival to the Resort was anything less than welcoming and am disappointed to read that your check-in experience fell short of the rest of your time on property and tarnished your overall stay. Given that you were visiting us for a wedding celebration, I regret that our team was not more gracious in accommodate your request for an early check-in and understand the frustration this caused for your evening’s itinerary. Please know I’ve addressed your candid comments with our front desk and leadership team, and I hope we can regain your trust for a much-improved return to the Resort in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: recently i stayed at the Pelican Hill. Usually when in the area I stay at the Montage in Laguna Beach but sometimes I like to try something new:  Upon arriving the receptionist made a little drama as i had forgotten my id, had to show several credit cards - my id photo in my iphone was not enough. so far not really a warm welcome you would expect!  the Pool looks stunning but when you you are in it is just shallow. feels almost like swimming in a large fountain. there was initially only one person serving the pool completely overworked and understaffed :)  Really loved the spacious rooms with balcony and fire place - large bath tub-well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill, Julius! Please know the security of our guests is of the utmost importance to our team, and I apologize for the delays you experienced upon check-in as our front desk agents verified your identity and reservation. I'm glad to read you enjoyed your stay in the Bungalows and appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback with us. We hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Pelican Hill sets the standard in customer satisfaction. With superior room accommodations, exquisite food selections and dining experiences, you can’t go wrong with Pelican Hill. The circular always warm salt water infinity swimming pool and jacuzzi are inviting. The staff (all) are above reproach in professionalism and customer service. I HIGHLY recommend a stay at Pelican Hill, and will recommend to my clients. I will definitely be back for a stay in the near future.
Manager Response: Matthew,  Congratulations on 31 years!
