We consider it a great privilege to be a part of your special celebrations, and I'm honored to read our friendly team made your stay that much more memorable. Thank you for your kind feedback and recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Happy anniversary!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: a nice resort to retreat from your stressful everyday life
Summary: The bungalows you can rent there are very nice and luxurious (depending how much you want to spend). They have a very nice pool area to lounge around and a good restaurant as well. We ordered several items from the menu and everything tasted extremely good including dessert and coffee. I rarely visit places like this as California as a whole is a tourist magnet but if you feel like wanting to get away for a weekend then this place is definitely worth checking out.
Manager Response: Hi Sanjay,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your recent getaway! I'm so glad you enjoyed your Bungalow accommodations as well as your dining experience at Coliseum Pool & Grill. We appreciate your kind review and hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Stunning property, perfect for a relaxing getaway
Summary: I loved staying here. The spa is first class. My friends all golfed and thought it was one of the best golf courses they've ever played at. I'm coming back when they do their guest bartending pop ups with Old Lightning and Peppi's Cellar bar in NYC. I did yoga while i was there and ate at every single restaurant. And the pool is sooooo coool. It's massive. They let me borrow a unicorn floaty for all my instagram dreams. It was a lovely stay and I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a staycation, wellness vacation, or even family vacation. There's a lot to do.
Manager Response: Hi Rachel,   Thank you so much for visiting Pelican Hill! We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to explore all our seaside village has to offer. I appreciate your kind feedback and look forward to welcoming you back for another Instagram-worthy getaway soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights for a work conference. First, the property is gorgeous. Fantastic ocean and golf course views. Check in was easy. Every staff member encountered was incredibly friendly. The room was meticulously clean, comfortable, well-appointed and spacious. The bed was extremely comfortable with lovely linens. The property is extremely quiet - heard zero noise outside the room. It is located walking distance to the beach with a gorgeous walk to get there, including sidewalks and paved trails.   I can only think of 2 downsides. Food and beverage are pricey, but in line with resorts of this luxury. Also, the rooms are kind of like bungalows/duplexes so the property covers a large area on hills. So you need either a bellman in a golf cart to help with luggage, or to
Manager Response: Hi Janice,   I'm so glad your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill and am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay in the Bungalows - as well as exploring our neighboring Crystal Cove Beach. We appreciate you taking the time to share such a thoughtful review of your experience and hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back to Newport Beach very soon. Safe travels!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Enjoyed the stay for a couple of days. We had good service there and great views. My opinion on the Resort is that it’s a little “tired” looking now. It’s time to update the entire hotel with more cleaner modern lines in the furniture , lighter fabrics , new carpets and paint. Like all hotels , they need interiors redone after 15-20 years. You would still get a European feel if the interiors were done modestly.  Will come back though and recommend it for those traveling to Newport Beach. Beautiful scenery!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback and am glad to read that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I'm delighted to share that Pelican Hill is in the midst of a Resort-wide refresh that includes re-upholstery, carpeting, and more in our Bungalows, Villas and public areas. While these updates are in keeping with Pelican Hill's Renaissance-inspired Italianate design, we are always looking to improve our guest's overall experience and appreciate your insight on what you'd like to see at Pelican Hill in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We loved our week at Pelican Hill! Very nice and we had a fantastic view from one of the bungalows. We’ll definitely have to try and get back! The only complaint we had was the lack of staff at the pool and lots of unsupervised kids in the hot tub. Other than that, 5 stars all the way!
Manager Response: Hello Jason,  Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! While I'm glad to read you enjoyed your week in the Bungalows, I apologize that the inaccessibility of pool service and presence of children in the hot tub tarnished your overall experience. Please know I've passed along this feedback to our Coliseum Pool leaders, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pelican Hill again soon! Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Family trip to Southern California and Pelican Hill was our third stop.  We arrived at sunset just in time to catch the sunset from our villa. Had a party of 7, and the three bedroom was a great fit, not to mention the washer and dryer was a nice mid week surprise when we’d stayed in hotels prior.   The staff was informative and friendly at check in and check out. Had dinner at the golf club and it was a very nice experience. Breakfast was at the villa clubhouse and the kids enjoyed a swim in a giant pool they had all to themselves afterwards.   Would highly recommend PH to anyone, especially families traveling through the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill during your tour through Southern California! I'm delighted to read that the Villas were a great fit for your family, and I'm so glad you had an opportunity to really explore all the Resort has to offer. I truly appreciate you taking the time to share your kind feedback and hope your travels bring you back to Newport Coast again in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: A beautiful place for the pelicans, and anybody else, to come home to roost, if you can handle the price
Summary: Fabulously manicured grounds plus a beautiful and unique huge pool. The rooms are nicely appointed with well stocked bathroom and coffee bar.  Loved the fireplace to take the edge off the morning chill.  Delightful place.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill, Stan! I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your positive review. We hope your travels bring you back for another cozy getaway soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This is a great place with beautiful views, excellent golf course and spectacular dining. World class service and rooms, staff is excellent and cater to your every need. Great experience for company meeting.
Manager Response: Hello Darren,   We're so glad your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill! I'm proud to hear you enjoyed your time at the Resort and hope you have an opportunity to visit again soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Even better the second time around
Summary: This is an excellent resort, highly rated and worth the reputation.  Having a car to get around or to visit the surrounding communities is almost a necessity in my opinion.  The amenities are excellent .  We stayed in one of the Villas.  This is good for a family or to accommodate several close friends, as there are 3 bedrooms with individual BR facilities, a living room with an open dining room and kitchen.  Though the price is upper end, you get what you are paying for.
Manager Response: Hello Jack,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I'm so glad you enjoyed your overall stay in the Villas and appreciate you taking the time to leave your thoughtful review. We hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I was here for the first time at a business meeting. The rooms are spacious suites with fireplaces in the living and bedroom area. Bathroom is big and roomy. The staff were outstanding in their friendliness and helpfulness. We had a number of group meals and the food was excellent. Everything was fresh and beautifully presented. I will return. Highly recommended
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback - we're delighted you enjoyed your first visit to Pelican Hill! While you were here on business, I'm glad to read you still had an opportunity to explore all the Resort has to offer, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: It’s big but can feel private
Summary: This is a big resort but it’s set up on a way that it feels smaller. The ocean view bungalow was great. Everything was well kept. Now a few drawbacks:  be prepared for a BIG pool area. Also, the road sounds from the Coast Highway mar an otherwise fantastic view from your room patio. Also, I was not really impressed with the restaurant experiences. Service was great but I was looking for something on a smaller scale which this is not. It is what it is and does it well.
Manager Response: Hello Richard,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and taking the time to share such a thoughtful review of your experience. While I'm glad to read you enjoyed your overall stay in the Bungalows, I apologize that your restaurant experiences and proximity to Pacific Coast Highway tarnished your time at Pelican Hill. We appreciate your thoughtful insight and hope that your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We decided to go with the Villa over the Bungalow for 1 specific reason, Villa’s come with Butler service. We booked our reservation in July after a site visit. Kurt the butler showed us the different rooms and explained the butler service how you can simply call and a butler will take you anywhere you would like to go, as far as going to South Coast plaza. I asked about the resort and was told a butler will take you around in a golf cart to see all of the property. We booked the room in July for our reservation on November 9-11. I explained I was booking the room for our wedding prep and honeymoon night. When I made the reservation I followed up with an email request for butler service on the Wedding day for car service at 1:30 and 2:45. When I checked in the room was available
Manager Response: Hi Chrissy,   Thank you for your feedback, and I apologize for the transportation delays you experienced during your stay at the Resort - especially on an occasion as important as your wedding night. While our butler team offers 24-hour service to our Villa guests, off-property transportation and Resort tours are often subject to availability. I regret our team did not better anticipate your need for a guaranteed pick-up time at 2:45 p.m., and I sincerely apologize this resulted in your late arrival. In addition to the Butlers, both Villa and Bungalow guests have access to complimentary coach service from our Guest Services team, which also provides transportation across the Resort grounds. Please know that I've addressed your detailed concerns with our Villa and Guest Services leaders, so we may prevent a misstep like this in the future. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to regain your trust for a much-improved return sometime in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I had a business meeting and stayed here with our company.  The facilities are just amazing and the view(s) you are witnessed to are just breath taking!  Everything is 5 Stars and the service justifies the indulgence of a luxury experience.  If you can swing it ... absolutely!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! I'm so glad your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill and am delighted you had a chance to explore the Resort during your meeting. We truly appreciate your thoughtful feedback and hope to welcome you back soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Spent a week in a bungalow and would not change a thing. Love being able to park the rental car in front of my own door. Views are breathtaking and the bungalows are only matched by the 3-bedroom villas which I will opt for next time. All hotel staff were phenomenal, friendly and punctual to the minute. Location was perfect as you are 10-15 minutes from everything...Balboa Island, Laguna Beach, high-end shopping and the Beachcomber. Hard to guage on GoogleMaps, but you are close to everything. Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I'm glad to read you enjoyed your week in the Bungalows and had the opportunity to explore so much of Newport Beach and Laguna Beach as well. We appreciate your kind feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon - next time in the Villas!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Relaxing resort with country club feel
Summary: Had the opportunity to spend 6 nights recently on a mini golf vacation. Spectacular suite looking out on the ocean was a 10. The spa was wonderful, restaurants good, golf very good. The resorts proximity to Newport Beach guaranteed anything you might need; once inside, it’s another world of calm and serenity.  I’d rate this a 91.
Manager Response: Hi Stevie,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill for your recent golf getaway! We appreciate you taking the time to share your kind review and are glad to hear you enjoyed exploring all the Resort has to offer beyond the courses. Thanks again for your thoughtful feedback, and we hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Met all my admittedly high expectations
Summary: in the LA area there is not a better place to have a golf/spa/relaxation few days. The restaurants are good (not very creative menus) not great but the service is first class. The bungalows are big enough for two with a nice exterior porch. Friendly helpful staff, and two wonderful courses.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback! We're proud to welcome some of the world's most discerning travelers and are proud to read your time at Pelican Hill met your high expectations. We appreciate your insight and hope your travels bring you back for another golf getaway soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This resort is just stunning! Every single aspect: rooms, layout, food, cleanness are just fantastic!  Customer service is awesome! Spa facilities are amazing! The location of this property is very convent. We fell in love with this hotel! Definitely we will return! Thank you so much for making our stay there very special!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such a thoughtful review of your stay at Pelican Hill! It sounds like you really had an opportunity to explore all the Resort has to offer and look forward to welcoming you back soon. Until then, we appreciate your feedback and wish you safe travels!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovon  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This place is absolutely incredible. The view from Andrea’s restaurant is out rages.  This resort is always immaculate and the golf course is beautiful.  It is a very upscale restaurant which is one of my top 10 restaurants, Andria’s. They also have a restaurant down by the pool side, the pool is shaped like a Colosseum and the view is amazing as well.  Another fun restaurant there is called the pelican grill. It’s so good, fun, I love hemisphere, and they serve oysters.  The night we were there they also had live music.  I WOULD recommend.
Manager Response: Cindy, Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and sharing your thoughtful recommendations! We appreciate your kind words about our Resort restaurants and hope to welcome you back for another ocean-view visit soon.   Happy Holidays! Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The location is beautiful but 4 important things to share with prospective guest.   The villas are lovely but they need to cycle them out for deep cleanings. You just cannot run them as hard as they do with daily turns. The villas are small houses and they need carpets cleaned and things really scrubbed. The turn and burn really shows on the units.   The food really sucks at the Resort overall - even Andrea needs a menu refresh. Not to mention that allowing travelers in visors and flipflops undermines the 300 caviar and 200 risotto. Is it a nice restaurant or a coffee shop? The Colosseum food is awful at all meals and Grill is better but find one healthy thing on that menu. One.  The front staff at the villas are nice but not helpful due to policies.   For example, villa checkin
Manager Response: Hello,   I apologize your stay at Pelican Hill fell so short of your expectations and appreciate you taking the time to share such detailed feedback about the Resort and your experience. We'd be grateful for the opportunity to speak with you personally, and I've connected you with our Villa General Manager in a private message. We look forward to discussing your visit in more detail and hope to welcome you back for a much-improved return in the future.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My family and I spent Thanksgiving at the Resort. We had a wonderful time. Our rooms were wonderful, very bright and clean. The heated pool was amazing and the hot tub as well. The Coliseum Restaurant was amazing. The only issue we had that there was no heat in the first room we checked into. I didn't realize it until I woke up at 4am in a 65F degree room. We were traveling with our 4 year old daughter. I called the front desk at 6am after the temperature dropped to 63F. And then I called again around 8:30am to check on the status and unfortunately they couldn't guarantee the boiler would be fixed. They had another room available ta few doors down thankfully. So we were moved to that room that morning. I just wish we didn't have to deal with this issue, since our stay was short
Manager Response: Hello Ania,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your Thanksgiving celebrations! While I'm glad to read you enjoyed your overall stay and experience at Coliseum Pool & Grill, I sincerely apologize the problems with your Bungalow's boiler tarnished your short time with us. I'm glad our team was able to accommodate a room move for you, and please know our engineering team has addressed all necessary maintenance to your Bungalow. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback and hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Brief stay but was blown away by the service and the luxurious details.  Fire place + ocean view = serenity. Staff drove my car to my villa when it was ready so we didn't have to do a thing.  Cocktails by the Coliseum pool highly recommended as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such lovely feedback about your recent stay. We're so glad you enjoyed the Villas and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a longer visit soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Our overall experience at the resort was fantastic.  The experience in the Pro Shop was regrettably terrible. Upon entering the shop my wife saw a 75% Off Sale Tag located on a shelf.  She spoke with Kristopher and asked if everything on the shelves were 75% off.  Kristopher confirmed that  was accurate. "He" hand selected items to show and quote the sale prices. My wife selected various items and Kristopher wrapped her purchases.Then he states you misunderstood none of this was 75% off.  My wife reminded him he was at the display where he had confirmed the discount.  He denied the entire conversation. She asked him why he was lying and he again stated she misunderstood.  He was at that point trying to get her to leave the shop. He left the shop and returned in ten minutes only
Manager Response: Hello Don,   I appreciate you taking the time to bring this feedback to our attention and sincerely apologize that your experience at the golf shop tarnished your overall stay at the Resort. I'm disappointed that our team was not more gracious in handling the miscommunication and regret that you and your wife were made to feel unwelcome. Please know that I've addressed your detailed concerns with our General Manager of Golf, so we may continue to improve our guest experience. Thank you again for your visit, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We are "regulars" at this place.  The rooms are lovely, the layout for resort is good, amenities are first rate.  The challenges: 1) front desk and arrival was marginal - including not having rooms ready at 430pm; 2) Dining - for breakfast was not particularly inspired and service could be slow.   It should be a 5 star - but it needs a bit of work
Manager Response: Hello Jonathan,   Thank you so much for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your candid feedback with us. I sincerely apologize for the delays you experienced upon check-in and regret that your breakfast fell short of the delicious and attentive dining experience we aim to provide each of our guests. Please know I've personally addressed your insight with our front desk and culinary teams, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a much-improved return soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I checked out of the Fashion Island Hotel,and moved to Pelican Hill...what a breath of fresh air and luxury. Starting from the valet, to the front desk, and every staff member who I encountered, the resort is first class, luxury all the way. The only thing I have to say that could use improvement is the food at the pool area. Might be one of the worst California rolls I’ve ever eaten, but still the staff was excellent and felt I was surrounded by beauty, luxury, and peace...
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! While I'm glad to read you enjoyed your overall stay, I apologize that your California Roll at the pool wasn't equally outstanding. Please know I've taken this opportunity to address your concerns directly with our culinary team, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for another relaxing getaway soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: What a fantastic location for a wedding.  My nephew and new bride were treated with every consideration. The food service was very good, the staff was some of the best I have ever experienced at such a large event.  The facility is just perfect very well kept and clean. The bathrooms were spotless.
Manager Response: Hello Bill,   On behalf of our entire Pelican Hill family, it was an honor to be a part of your nephew's big day. We're delighted to read that it was such a memorable celebration, and I truly appreciate you taking the time to pass along your kind remarks. Thanks again for your insight, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Amazing resort - best in Southern California
Summary: We do an annual family stay-cation here because it’s such a beautiful resort.  Also pretty baby friendly. We requested for a crib for our room in advanced and it was set up before we checked into our villa. They even had a little plush toy pelican for our daughter!   The offer pick up and drop off shuttle service to crystal cove and a bunch of amenities like a bag of towels and toys for the kids! Didn’t use a service but will next time!   Food could be a little bit more diverse as it’s mostly American cuisine and Italian. Otherwise service was amazing.
Manager Response: Jenni, I'm so honored that Pelican Hill has become a special tradition for your family! Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughtful review with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable staycation - and beach day! - very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This resort is totally amazing! Great experience for everything. The pools are beautiful, the spa is great, the food is the top. Everything provide a wonderful and amazing experience here! I may say that this place in my top 5 places I have ever been to.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I appreciate your kind review and am so glad to read you enjoyed experiencing all the Resort has to offer. We hope your travels bring you back very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Everything about this resort is perfection. The massage at the spa was the best. The service at every instance was impeccable. My room was really spacious and included a gas fireplace, as well as a nice size balcony with 2 comfortable lounge chairs and an ocean view. The one downside is that it is a bit of a walk to the beach but transportation is available at no cost. Views from all over the resort are breathtaking. D
Manager Response: Hello Elena,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your kind words about your stay in the Bungalows! I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your time at the Resort and took advantage of our complimentary beach shuttle service to Crystal Cove as well. We hope to welcome you back for another ocean-view visit soon!  Warm regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Seriously well worth the $$. Stayed in the ocean front bungalow with my husband for the weekend and the room was fabulous. Spacious and clean and nicely decorated! The amenities were great too. The pool/jacuzzi is open 24-hours and that was a nice new experience. A good amount of places to eat in the hotel as well.   My only complaint was the service at the pool. We laid down by the pool excited to order a few drinks and relax but the waiter/waitress took about 40 min to bring us two beers so that by the time it came we were over the excitement because they didn’t seem to care about urgency. When we asked what’s taking so long, the waiter said that they’re waiting for a few other drinks to be ready so that they can bring them all out together. Seriously? Made no sense.   I can’t
Manager Response: Hello Suzy,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your weekend getaway with your husband! I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind feedback with us and am glad to read you enjoyed your overall stay at the Resort. I apologize that the service delays you experienced at Coliseum Pool tarnished your time with us, and I've personally addressed your feedback with our team. Thank you again for your visit, and we hope to welcome you both back to Pelican Hill very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This is my first stay at Pelican Hill resort and I have to say it is in the TOP TEN of the very best places and experience I've ever had. First of all, the resort is so well manicured and maintained. The villa we stayed at had all the comforts of home and more of what you would want. I swear, I could have lived there! From the ultra soft sheets and very comfortable bed to the luxurious towels and bath products to the well stocked kitchen, these details were not lost on me. The villa sits with a gorgeous view of downtown Newport. We enjoyed watching the most amazing sunsets at the patio that you never want to leave your villa!
Manager Response: Hello Chessa,   I'm so delighted to read that your first visit to Pelican Hill left such a positive impression on you! We appreciate your kind feedback about the Villas and are glad you enjoyed Newport Beach's beautiful fall sunsets. Thanks again for your visit, and we hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: For such an expensive luxury resort, you would think there would be a relaxing pool available for our adult guests. Instead you have the main pool which is filled with children and plays extremely loud bad music (we asked if they could turn down the volume and they said no). And then they have the "adult pool" which is a pool directly next to the children's camp. Why would they put an adult pool right next to a children's camp?!? We sat there because we ended up deciding that listening to kids scream for hours on end was actually more pleasant than the main pool. But we should not have had to make that decision. This just seems like an easy fix to me that would make this property way more pleasant for its adult guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your candid feedback with us, and I apologize that your experience at Pelican Hill's new Adult Pool fell so short of your expectations and the environment we aim to create for our adult guests. Please know that the Resort is in the midst of continued updates to the adult pool area, so we may continue to elevate the pool experience to be distinctive and enjoyable. I've also shared your feedback on the Coliseum Pool music with our leadership team as well. I'm so sorry your pool experience tarnished your overall stay at Pelican Hill, and we hope to welcome you back for a much-improved experience in the future.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Can't say enough GREAT things about this resort.  Whether for business or pleasure you must check out this property.  The service levels were on point, the staff are so accomodating.  Top notch all the way.  Amazing views, golf courses are incredible.  Do yourself a favor and book a weekend here!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback! We're glad to hear you enjoyed a wonderful stay and that our team made your time at Pelican Hill even more memorable. We appreciate your thoughtful insight and hope that your travels bring you back to our seaside village soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Excellent service, beautiful golf course and pools, condos, food etc. true 5 star resort. Car service to the different restaurants, pools, beach, shopping and very quick upon calling. You can book with views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean, golf course or other areas not with the view. Every person you meet greets you with my pleasure to serve you.
Manager Response: Hi Gerri,   We appreciate you taking the time to share your kind review with us! I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay at Pelican Hill and had an opportunity to explore our surrounding areas as well. Thanks again for your thoughtful feedback, and we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach very soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The Southern California coast is paradise on its own, but Pelican Hill somehow manages to elevate it. The resort is nothing short of stunning. The rooms are absolutely top of the line. The service and the staff, from the shuttle drivers to the cleaners to the doormen to the laundry people and everyone in between, are beyond what is even remotely expected. I've stayed at top of the line hotels - St. Regis, Ritz-Carlton, etc. This is in a completely different league.   I played, and loved, both golf courses and my fiancee adored the spa. The on-site Italian restaurant, Andrea, was surprisingly fantastic - not "resort food" at all. Crystal Cove beach is within walking distance and there is also a shuttle. Laguna and Newport are a short 10-minute drive away and offer even more
Manager Response: Hello David,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill - we're so moved by your incredibly thoughtful review! I'm delighted to read that you enjoyed a relaxing getaway and our team made your stay even more memorable. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to serving you again the next time your travels bring you to Newport Beach!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This was a wonderful property. The staff was amazing and couldn’t do enough to make our stay memorable. Our room was spacious and comfortable and housekeeping was prompt and efficient. The golf course was scenic and challenging. The spa was well run and had excellent therapists. The food was good in all restaurants and it was a very relaxing experience. We would definitely return, especially in the fall when it is a little off season.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and leaving such a thoughtful review of your stay. I'm so glad you enjoyed your time with us and hope that your travels bring you back to Newport Beach very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My high school friend and myself stayed a week at pelican hill. We chose a 2 bedroom ocean view villa.  Views were outstanding.  The villa while impeccably maintained was a little dated in decor, although the furnishings were of very high quality.  The beds were extremely comfortable and we both noticed the best towels/ linens out of all of our previous 5- star resort stays. We both appreciated the daily texts from housekeeping concerning our schedules and when we would like our villa cleaned and/or turned down.  Housekeeping kept our villa stocked with laundry detergent,  bottled water,  nespresso pods and an over abundance of fresh towels.  The resort also kept us stocked with ice as the sub zero ice maker was inoperative. Our villa kitchen was stocked with many niceties such
Manager Response: Hello Rob,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your friend's birthday celebrations! I appreciate you taking the time to leave such a detailed review of your stay, and I'm proud to read you enjoyed your time at the Villas. Please know I've shared your kind feedback with Jeremy as well, and we hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill again soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We arrived on a Sunday morning   to check in and our garden bungalow was ready within 30 minutes which was a great start but unfortunately the only plus point of this resort. After unpacking we headed to the Coliseum pool to begin a relaxing 2 days at the end of our holiday, wow, what a shock! There was a large group of unruly children running wild in and around the pool totally unsupervised by their parents. The resort rents out the cabanas which surround the pool on the upper level to local people who book them to celebrate different occasions.  There were a number of parties ongoing when we arrived at the pool resulting in excessive noise and the unfortunate example of adults standing around in the pool consuming considerable amounts of alcohol. This is certainly not what we
Manager Response: Hello Norma,   I appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback with us and sincerely apologize that your visit to Pelican Hill was anything less than perfect. I'm disappointed that your experiences at Coliseum Pool fell short of the tranquil atmosphere you were looking forward to. While many guests visit the Resort looking to either relax or celebrate, I regret your overall experience was tarnished by both the service missteps and other guests. Please know I've addressed your detailed concerns with our Coliseum Pool and leadership teams, and we hope to regain your trust for a much-improved return if your travels bring you to Newport Beach in the future.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We travelled to Newport for a family function. Typically we stay at 5 star resorts. We have stayed at The Resort at Pelican Hill before and have found the service and facilities first rate. For the two of us we have stayed at the bungalows and they were roomy enough for us. This time we chose the villas. Like the name implies...very large and spacious. Villa 814 was beautiful and had a great view. We catered a party for my family and friends. The staff was attentive thoughtful and dedicated. The food and service were tremendous. The whole trip great.  Will definitely go back!
Manager Response: Hello Mark,   Thank you for returning to Pelican Hill and sharing your thoughtful feedback! I'm glad to read you enjoyed the Villas and found them spacious for entertaining as well. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope your travels bring you back to Newport Coast very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Pelican Hill needs an attitude adjustment. I visited the property for a tour and lunch and then for booking a stay and I was appalled at the staffs attitude. For starters they are blatantly disingenuous starting from the reservation staff on. The front desk staff didn’t even greet us and instead acted like she was too busy to look at us until we literally were at her desk when she pretended to be surprised. It was offensive. Sadly they’re also severely incapable of simple concierge requests that all other 5 star resorts can accommodate. Things like sourcing a hair stylist or makeup artist for a night out during my stay, that I can find myself from yelp that they were literally dumbfounded when asked. When respectfully shared that other hotels can source our requests they were
Manager Response: I apologize that your recent visit to Pelican Hill was anything less than perfect and regret your interactions with our Guest Experience Conceirges fell short of the friendly, attentive experience we aim to provide each of our guests. We'd be grateful for the opportunity to personally apologize and discuss your stay in more detail. I've connected you with our Director of Guest Experience in a private message, and we look forward to speaking with you soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Fifth Visit - Tired furnishings - Exhorbitant 75$ service fee
Summary: We have been three times, three villa stays with family and two bungalows.  This visit we were so disappointed.  Original room and filthy bed skirt and very tired soft furnishings with dirty balcony and sun beds.  We advised one of the managers who kindly changed our room to a much better one, however furnishings still needed replacing.  We were shocked with resort fee of 75$  The analagy we gave the hotel was that if this hotel were not in these magnificent grounds with lovely pool but on a freeway would anyone pay upwards of 600$ per night.  Our fee was removed, but this charge is as cheap trick to make the room charge look less than it is.  Parking is out side the room and the pool is very crowded with little shade and not enough umbrellas.  Noisy with children in holiday
Manager Response: Hello Marsha,   I appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback with us and apologize that your recent stay at Pelican Hill fell short of the relaxing getaway you were looking forward to - as well as the visits you've enjoyed with us in the past. I'm glad to share that the Pelican Hill is in the midst of a Resort-wide refresh to update many of the items you've mentioned, and I've personally addressed your other concerns with our Coliseum Pool and culinary teams.  While Pelican Hill’s resort fee of $65 remains lower than the combined resort and parking fees of other luxury resorts in our area, I apologize that you did not find the inclusions to add value to your stay. I regret that our team did not do more to clarify the benefits available to you, and I invite you to find a complete list at pelicanhill.com/resortfee  I truly appreciate your insight and hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust for a much-improved return soon.  Warm regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: From what I understand, the staff here is all "Four Season" trained. I LOVE this resort, I come here as often as I can for a little get away, I live just up the road in Redondo Beach. it's a great little get away, the staff is superb, the food is excellent, the pool is outstanding. I came this time because I had a little surgery and my doctor is here in Newport and I knew I would be well taken care of here and comfortable and again, they did not disappoint. I can't wait to come back here for my birthday and now I'm even considering getting married here.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Pelican Hill during your time in Newport Beach and taking the time to share such a kind review with us. While the Resort is not affiliated with Four Seasons, I'm proud to read that you felt the team's friendly and attentive welcome during your important time of rest and recovery. We appreciate your thoughtful feedback and look forward to many more getaways (and perhaps a Pelican Hill wedding!) in the future.   Warm regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Villas were amazing. Staff was amazing. View was amazing. Pool was amazing. The only negative thing about our week long trip here was service around the pool is very spotty. The young guys seem more interested in flirting than servicing the guest and the young girls can not service the entire pool area.  Loved the bed linens!!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! While I'm glad to read you enjoyed your overall stay at the Villas, I apologize that your service experience at the pool fell short of the gracious and attentive atmosphere we aim to create for each of our guests. I appreciate you taking the time to bring this feedback to our attention and have addressed your concerns with our leaders and service teams. Thank you again for your insight, and we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Everything in Pelican Hill was amazing, food, golf, pool, room, views, landscape! Very peaceful, great place to relax and enjoy the resort, we stay 4 nights, is a lot to do in that area ( Newport Beach, Laguna Beach, is a amazing Mall call Fashion Island, etc ) Can’t wait to go back!
Manager Response: Hi Mileidi,   I'm so glad you enjoyed your first visit to Pelican Hill! Thank you for sharing your thoughtful review with us, and we look forward to seeing you again, too. Wishing you safe travels!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: A three time visitor to this romantic resort with a 360 degree pool, restaurants, and a golf course overlooking the ocean. There is a good variety of food from American, Italian, to Asian that are so sumptuous! The place is only a few minutes away from the beach, and has a valet parking. My kids and I love this place! Will keep coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to Pelican Hill, Marilou! I'm proud to read the Resort has become a special destination for your family, and we hope to welcome you back for many more delicious meal and beach days to come!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Reasonably priced, about $550-700/night for their private villa rooms, we stayed for 2 weeks just doing a little staycation.  Everything was perfect from fireplace, to food, to privacy.  Made sure to dine at their nicer restaurants like Andrea and we ate there every night.  Such a delight to have the truffle and risottto. Go here for the vacation without issues and a lovely staycation or vacation for anyone who wants to relax.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback! Our hope is that the Villas feel like a tranquil oasis within the Resort, and we're so grateful you and your fiance chose to stay with us. I'm glad to read you enjoyed a relaxing getaway together, and we hope to welcome you back for another memorable staycation - and more risotto! - very soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Wow. Phenomenal experience here, and we are already looking at dates to return! It was so beautiful. The bungalow was so comfortable and romantic that we didn’t want to leave, but we had to visit the beautiful pool and explore the grounds. The bed was so comfortable, and the terrace with lounge chairs was certainly used. We loved the bathtub and the fireplace, too! And nespresso coffee in the morning was great. Loved the shower and light up makeup mirror. They even have turn down service with chocolate and will shine your shoes complimentary (and return them to you on a silver platter-nice touch).   The pool was beautiful and not too cold! We loved it. Enjoyed our time there on Friday and Saturday. Plenty of chairs to relax, upstairs or down. Food at the coliseum was great.
Manager Response: Hi Marcella,   Thank you so much for visiting Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your detailed reviews across our Yelp and Tripadvisor pages - especially your kind words about Brandon! I'm glad to read that you and your husband enjoyed a memorable weekend in the Bungalows, and we appreciate you choosing to celebrate his birthday with us. We hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach very soon, and please share my belated birthday wishes with your husband.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Worst 5 star hotel I ever experienced.  We came from overseas and traveling with elderly people.  Very tired and jet lag.  We came to hotel 1pm ( thru Amex booking allows early check in) hoping to check in early.  Reception gave us unwelcoming response.. check in is 5pm why are you here so early look.  I told receptionist our situation but didn’t care. They knew we are waiting but made us wait for 4hours check us in at 5pm.   Housekeeping was bad too.  Breakfast room service dishes were left behind.    Hotel offer ride to near by restaurant. But never show up. We end up driving there.  Late to dinner. It was my husband’s birthday party.  Hotel is all about talk ... misleading... many things are not follow up.    We booked 5 star hotel for service but we got 1 star service.  We
Manager Response: Hello Michael,   I apologize that your visit to Pelican Hill fell short of the relaxing stay you were looking forward to. While early check-in is based on availability, I regret that our team was not able to accommodate you - especially after your long travels. We'd be grateful for the opportunity to personally apologize for the other service missteps you experienced, and I've connected you with our Front of House Director in a private message. We truly appreciate your insight and look forward to connecting with you soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Pelican Hill Resort - Andrea Ristorante - Tuscany Villa Experience
Summary: Valet - two young men run to open the doors of your car and to retrieve it later - complimentary Hostess - greets you and give us congratulations on our 27th anniversary Servers (3) - very personable and again congrtulations on your 27th anniversary Seating - quiet and romantic  private booth with view of the ocean (if you stand up) Appetizer - Proscuitto di San Daniele  - noble - only the best in the world - plenty of it Entree - petite filet mignon - perfectly grilled and tasted supremely wonderful Deserts - looked beautiful, but tasted bland - need a new pastry chef Practically everything in the hotel is from Italy because Don Bren is infatuated with the country - chandeliers, alder rafters, limestone wall plaster and fireplace facings, Sambonet silverware and much, much
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for lunch at Andrea! I appreciate you taking the time to leave a detailed review of your dining experience, and I've shared your comments with our chefs and pastry team as well. We hope to welcome you back for another ocean-view meal soon and thank you again for your candid feedback!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Weekend Getaway with Friends and Family
Summary: Pelican Hill is a 6-star hotel resort.  We stayed at the villas, had dinner at Andrea's and brunch at the pool Pool and grill.  The food and the service were amazing.  The swimming pool is breathtaking.  It is a bit pricy but worth every penny, in my opinion. Great weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your weekend at Pelican Hill! I'm so glad you enjoyed the Villas and had the opportunity to explore all the Resort has to offer. We truly appreciate you taking the time to leave such a kind review and hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Must keep working so we can go back! Great views, great service
Summary: We stayed at this very luxurious resort for a family gathering. The location has some of the most amazing views, exceptional food and service. Our accommodations were comfortable, spacious and allowed us to enjoy each other with out feeling crowded. The resort has some very good  restaurants on site. If you need to grab snacks or grocery to enhance your trip there is a Vons Pavilions nearby, an ice cream shack across the highway and some really good local food options from mexican to healthy choices and  there was plenty to do on site. Our family loved it and our friend s are trying to figure out how to plan a trip there soon. It was a once in a lifetime or maybe twice trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We consider it an incredible privilege to be a part of our guests' special family memories, and I'm delighted to read you enjoyed your stay at Pelican Hill - and exploring our surrounding Newport Coast community. Thank you again for your visit, and we hope your travels bring you back again in the future!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My wife and I booked 4 days at this hotel. When he arrived it was very impressive. We booked a garden bungalow. It was lovely but it was a room not a bungalow. We were very happy with everything till we went to the pool. It was massive with loud music. Kids splashing and grown ups playing with balls. All perfectly normal for families but we like a more relaxed holiday. We asked if they had an adult only pool but they didn’t. As we lay we got more and more agitated. We had a beautiful meal in the Italian. The service in every area is top class. However we decided to check out and although we had paid upfront the management were very understanding. I do recommend this hotel for families and golfers though.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Stewart,   I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and apologize again that your stay at Pelican Hill fell short of the serene getaway that you and your wife were looking forward to. While I'm glad to read that you enjoyed your meal at Andrea, I'm disappointed that the ambiance at the pool tarnished your overall experience. Please know that we've used this opportunity to address pool etiquette with our leadership team, and we hope to regain your trust for a much more relaxing visit in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: First Class resort - Bring your wallet
Summary: We were golfing our way up the CA coast playing golf at a few places.  This property is huge - and I must add — very expensive. They maintain the property immaculately. Rooms are very spacious. We had a nice fireplace in ours. Not much of a view from most rooms because there are so many trees on the hillside. Bathrooms are quite large, well equipped except they did NOT include a magnifying mirror.  Only issues had to do with cleaning - in the bathroom is they need to pay attention to the shower grout and the baseboard cleaning. There is a shuttered window that can be opened and closed between the bathtub and the main area in the room - did not like that. Some light and noise comes through even when closed. The staff was pleasant, extremely accommodating, and polite!  We played
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill during your golf tour through California! We appreciate you leaving such thoughtful feedback about your stay, and I've shared your suggestions regarding the Bungalow bathrooms to our housekeeping and rooms teams. Please know that the security of our guests is of the highest priority to our team, and we offer in-room safes and safety deposit boxes for guests to store their valuables with complete peace of mind. Thanks again for your insight, and we hope to welcome you back to play Ocean North Course soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Great Hotel - More Couples/Business then Family
Summary: I have stayed at Pelican three (3) times.  I have stayed in a standard room twice, once for a business event and once with my fiancé and then once in a 4 bedroom villa with butler with family of 6.  There is no doubt that this is a 5 star hotel shooting for the pole position in the Newport/Laguna competitive hotel line up.  This is Don Bren’s (owner/founder of The Irvine Co.) baby and he wants this to be the best hotel in So./Cal.  Pelican sits squarely up there with Montage Laguna and The Grand Del Mar.  Thus is a resort that you will likely not leave unless your hitting Javiers or Mastros for dinner.    The service level is high.  The rooms are very nice.  The pool is over the top.  The food is good not great.   I prefer this hotel for adult get away or large business
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful feedback! We're so grateful that your travels have brought you to Pelican Hill for both business and leisure over the years and appreciate your continued loyalty. While I'm glad to read you've enjoyed the accommodations and friendly service from our team, I apologize that your dining experiences weren't equally outstanding. We'd be grateful for the opportunity to discuss your feedback in more detail, and I've connected you with one of our food & beverage leaders in a private message. Thanks again for your insight, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill this holiday season!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Really impressed great hotel with four season type experience
Summary: The Pelican was incredible I cant actually fault them in any way, everything runs like clockwork and the staff are some of the most helpful polite staff I have ever had in a hotel. We had a Villa Suite which was huge and looked beautiful, the housekeeping service was brilliant even folding up our kid's clothes and putting them tidily away. The grounds where amazing, food was great one of kids fell in love with the veggie burger and could not stop eating it. All in all a great experience and really look forward to returning again one day. Well done Pelican for providing an overall great experience and fantastic hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Daniel,   Thank you for bringing your family to Pelican Hill! I'm glad to hear you enjoyed the Villas, and I've shared your kind feedback with our housekeeping team as well. We appreciate your thoughtful review and look forward to welcoming you back for more memories - and veggie burgers! - in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Its nice hotel family style .. its not my first visit.. the first one was in 2014 and we had bungalow.. this time we decided to have villa it call villa as it has garden but it will be as flat with 2 bed rooms and living area with table , full equipment kitchen and big balcony. The villa nice and the space good but little bit out of dated.. the shower not nice at all its hanging on to the wall and high with very low pursuers.. its very old style even the tub ..   Its good and quite with safety and good service but over priced for the villa .
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your detailed review with us. I apologize that you didn't find the Villas to be as enjoyable as our Bungalow accommodations and have personally shared your feedback on the bathroom fixtures with our rooms and engineering leaders. We truly appreciate your thoughtful feedback and hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I have stayed at this resort 8 times.  It is the best!  The bungalows, grounds, pool and restaurants are all fabulous! .  The views are fabulous as well. The Coliseum is a wonderful place for breakfast. The Pelican Grill is a great choice for dinner.  The staff at the resort is friendly and professional. They always have smiles on their faces.  Looking forward to going back next summer!
Manager Response: Sheryl, thank you so much for your continued loyalty! We truly consider it an honor to welcome you back over the years and appreciate your kind words about the Resort and our team. We look forward to seeing you again next summer!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The Good: Service was overall excellent in most areas especially by the pool. Reception, valet parking and room service all very good. The resort is well kept and managed and parts of it are lovely.   The Bad: We had a bungalow ocean view room. View was good but partially blocked by large glass screens around the terrace. Very high ceilings but the room is quite dated and dark lots of stone and wood. Our fireplace didn’t work despite the maintenance coming out to fix it unsuccessfully. Last night the air con failed so we had no air con at all. We had to make do with fans all night. To be fair to the hotel they gave us a credit for this night but it’s an indication how the rooms are starting to deteriorate in amenity and need a refurb. Resort was built in 2008 so I think it needs
Manager Response: I apologize that your stay at Pelican Hill fell short of the relaxing visit that you and your fiancé were looking forward to. I'm disappointed that your Bungalow accommodations were anything less than perfect and have addressed your concerns about amenities and overall design with our engineering department. Please know that I've also shared your feedback on the atmosphere of Coliseum Pool with our leadership team, so we may continually improve the Resort experience to be enjoyable for all guests. Thank you again for taking the time to share your candid review with us, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a much-improved return in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Hi, The room is good but the room service not that good I came back to hotel at 2:30 pm still not clean   I have order from amazon they deliver it to another room, the box has my name and they deliver it to another room who have a different name also the box was open which is not acceptable !!!  Thanks
Manager Response: Mr. Alhumaidhi,   I sincerely apologize for the miscommunication with your recent Amazon delivery and regret the delay and inconvenience this caused your family. Please know I have also shared your feedback and preferred housekeeping service times with our housekeeping team, and we hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust for a much-improved return in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: What a disappointment this place has been. I should preface that my scale of what to expect is a sliding scale depending upon the premium price I am paying, and this place charges a lot per night, so my expectations are high.  But they do not even satisfy much lower discount expectations.  To start with the positive, the grounds are very nice.  It is a very well appointed hotel.  That makes it all the more noticeable how bad the service is.  Just some of the examples include:  - After a long day of traveling with three kids, our room was not ready on time.  It was "ready" about 30 minutes late.  However, it was clear that even with an extra 30 minutes they rushed to get it ready.  There were (large) food crumbs from the prior guests still on the chairs, there were no water
Manager Response: Hello Jason,   I apologize that your stay at Pelican Hill fell so short of not only your expectations, but the timely service and excellent accommodations we aim to provide to every guest. I'm disappointed by the missteps you experienced - especially on an occasion as special as a family vacation. While I'm personally addressing your feedback with our housekeeping team, we'd be grateful for the opportunity to apologize and hopefully regain your trust for a much-improved return in the future. I've shared more contact information with you in a private message and look forward to speaking with you soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: SPECTACULAR Property - done FIRST CLASS in every imaginable way...
Summary: Went for a little "staycation" as we live local! Spent the day by the pool (large round pool with views and super service) then went down to the beach that night for a firepit bbq on the sand, and enjoyed our villa with outside patio and superiror amenitites! The staff is best of the best - and a huge shout out to Nancy Murillo and her team, Kimberly the night front desk manager and even Bailey the driver of the coach that takes you around ... super kind caring nice people - and boy can they make it happen!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your Orange County staycation - I'm so glad you were able to explore not only the Resort but our neighboring Crystal Cove beach as well! Please know that I've shared your kind words with Nancy, Kimberly, Bailey and we hope that your travels bring you back to the Villas soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We just spent 3 wonderful nights at the Resort in Bungalow 115 Ocean View.  We enjoyed every moment of our stay.    The rooms are huge and the terraces are also very big.  We loved the coliseum pool as well.  Lots of kids in the afternoon after 3 pm, but 10 am - 3 pm was very peaceful.  We did room service one night and it was fine, but expensive, but they did set up the table which was nice.  We also ate at Andreas one evening and had a wonderful dinner and watched an amazing sunset.  Highly recommend.  When we return, we will definitely be sure to reserve a bungalow that faces the golf course so we can view that each evening.  My only suggestion to the resort would be to upgrade some of the electronic charging components.  No USB ports any where.
Manager Response: Hello Jake,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill! I'm so glad to read that you enjoyed your Bungalow accommodations and had an exceptional dinner at Andrea, too. I appreciate your suggestion about USB ports and have shared that feedback with our rooms team, as we're in the midst of refreshing our guest rooms. We are so grateful for your visit and thoughtful feedback and hope to see you again very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Have stayed at Pelican several times and wish I could give them a good review. The rooms were beautiful 5 years ago but now a lot of deferred maintenance needed. Service is universally bad. Room service takes hours and often is wrong. Pool service is non existent and required going to different pool altogether to find a server. They prioritize groups and don’t care about families traveling with them. Have tried all of the restaurants — lunch for 4 was $300 and inedible. They need to fire all management and revamp this place.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback with us and sincerely apologize that several parts of your stay fell so short of your expectations and our standards. I'm disappointed that our team didn't make you feel absolutely valued as a guest, and I've connected you with our Front Desk Manager in a private message so we may personally apologize and share more about the refurbishment in progress across the Resort. We appreciate your insight and look forward to speaking with you!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I was one of the hair stylist and also a wedding guest at this resort last year. I did the bridesmaids hair in the bridal villa and attended the wedding. This was the most beautiful wedding I have ever seen, something from the movies or a  celebrity wedding. The venue was stunning and there resort grounds are immaculate.
Manager Response: Hello Asia Marie,  Thank you for celebrating with us at Pelican Hill! We're so glad that you had a wonderful experience both as a vendor and guest of the wedding, and I've shared your kind feedback with our banquets and weddings team as well. We appreciate your insight and hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I will still never forget this weekend, we rent a 3 bedroom villa for 3 nights, everything was lovely and was having a great time, till we were at the Coliseum Pool all day I had put my watch, necklace & diamond tennis bracelet in the zippered part of my purse and kept a close eye on it the whole time every we were there with had their things in one area and a towel to cover everything. After being in the pool we decided to go to our villa and just hangout there, when I went to bed at 5am I noticed the bed was turned down so the maid came through our Master Bedroom, they didn’t even inform us they were in our room. Their is a small patio off the master room and I noticed the door didn’t lock and felt uncomfortable about it and told the concierge but was never fixed. The next
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Montoya,   I appreciate you taking the time to bring these concerns to our attention. Please know that the safety and security of our guests is of the utmost importance to our team. As we were unable to identify your reservation from the details shared in this review, I've connected you a private message requesting your preferred phone number so our security team can contact you directly to discuss your stay in more detail and further investigate your concerns. Thank you again for your feedback, and we look forward to connecting with you soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The staff were friendly and helpful. They were able to help as soon as a need arrived. The facility is quite clean and beautiful. Service was very timely considering the distance from the bungalows to the main building. The grounds were breathtaking.
Manager Response: Hi Lisa,   We're so glad that your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill! Thank you for your kind feedback about our team, and we hope to welcome you back for a more leisurely Newport Beach getaway soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: There is not one negative about this resort. From the check in, room, pool, restaurant, concierge...all of it was superb!  The rooms were clean and comfortable. Views were nice. Customer service throughout the resort was spot on. Resort had a phenomenal pool that was so relaxing.  Concierge was so helpful with setting up restaurant reservations for us and with anything else we needed. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Hi Susan,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and sharing such a thoughtful review of your stay! I'm so glad you enjoyed all the Resort has to offer and that our conceirge team were a helpful resource for you. We appreciate your kind feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This was one of the nicest, if not the nicest resort we have ever stayed in, we stayed in room 139 (Ocean view King Suite). The entire resort is immaculate, it's a 10We rented the bungalow suite with a view of the ocean STAR resort. The service is outstanding, the food is delicious, and the pool area was great with the whole view of the ocean. The whole staff was very friendly and nice and made sure we had a good time, I could not think of even one thing that was not a 5 STAR!!!!!!!!!!!!!! We booked the bungalow suite with a view of the ocean Amazing property and views! Beds are really comfortable with every type of pillow to choose from, and Nespresso pod coffee maker!!!!! Thank you for a great weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the Bungalows! I'm so grateful for your kind feedback and am happy to hear that your experience at Pelican Hill was so wonderful. Please know I've taken this opportunity to share your words with the rest of our team, and we hope to welcome you back for another weekend getaway in the future!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Some of the best views in Orange County! The pool area is also beautiful. Stunning golf course. The spa is possibly the best I have ever been in. Room and hotel grounds were immaculate. Definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback, Courtney! I'm so glad you had the opportunity to explore all Pelican Hill has to offer and that the Spa was such a stand-out experience for you. We appreciate your feedback and hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I had high expectations for Pelican Hill as so many friends recommended the property. Our stay at Pelican Hill exceeded of all them! We traveled to Pelican Hill as a party of 10. We rented a 4 bedroom villa and a golf course view bungalow. Both were beautiful spaces. We loved the ability to access the beautiful property with easy, either by foot, or shuttle. Our dinner at Andrea's was one of our favorite nights. The coliseum pool, spa, and villa pool were all fabulous. The staff expertly attended to all of our needs. I would highly recommend Pelican Hill for anyone looking for a stay in Southern California.
Manager Response: Hi Emily,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and sharing such kind feedback about your time with us. I'm glad to read you all enjoyed your stay in the Villas and that your experience even exceeded your friend's recommendation! Please know I've shared your positive comments with our Andrea team as well, and we hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: A must stay place if you love the beach, great food, excellent hospitality, amazing architecture, and golf
Summary: We stayed in room 416 (Ocean view King room). The entire resort is immaculate, the service is outstanding, the food is delicious, and the value for money is good.  What we liked the most about Pelican Hill is all the cost of staying at Pelican Hill is in the room charge e.g. self vehicle parking and golf range usage. When we arrived to check-in our room wasnt available. Pelican Hill made it memorable by giving us a simple voucher to enjoy a cup of tea in their cafe with a view of the resort grounds. This resort knows the ethic of service and has got it right.
Manager Response: Hello Richard!  Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and taking the time to share such kind feedback about your stay! I apologize that your room wasn't available immediately upon arrival but am proud to hear that your team turned your wait into a memorable moment. We appreciate your insight and hope that your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Nothing Special but a Nice Weekend Away
Summary: Let me preface this review but stating I did not choose this resort...I was gifted to us, so for a spur of the moment staycation where we just had to pay for food, drinks etc.. it was a nice weekend but nothing that set it apart from the experiences I have had a similar type properties.  I will give you a few positives and a few negatives but just keep in mind we prefer boutique hotels. If we were paying top dollar to go to a coastal area, I would situate myself closer the the beach where I could smell and hear the ocean.  Room service- 2 of 3 times the food sucked  What was supposed to be a bungalow w/ ocean view not what I envisioned.  The room was very nice with vaulted ceilings, gas fireplace, comfy bed and a big bathtub perfect for a lovely bubble bath but the view was a
Manager Response: Hi Stacy,   Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback, and I apologize that your weekend at Pelican Hill was anything less than perfect - especially on a special occasion like your birthday. I'm disappointed that your experience with in-room dining wasn't exceptional and that your Bungalow accommodations fell short of your expectations as well. Please know that for our guests' convenience, complimentary coach service to Crystal Cove Beach departs hourly from the main estate. As a more upbeat live music option, Pelican Grill also features a band on weekend evenings. I really appreciate you bringing these concerns to our attention, so I could address them with our leadership team. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a much-improved return in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This is a great staycation resort if you don't feel like traveling far and want to feel like you are in an island resort getaway especially if you have young kids.  Our kids enjoyed camp Pelican very much throughout our stay.   The kids club keeps kids busy with arts and craft, sand pit, swimming and they even provide many choices for snacks and drinks and lunch.  While the kids were engaged, mom was having spa time and relaxing in the steam room and Jacuzzi . I had a ocean view bungalow with a great view and the fireplace was lit during my stay... all in all a great stay and would definitely come back. Staff were very attentive and other patrons were friendly.  Got to meet the hawk and see it at work... it chased a bunch of crows away like a scene from discovery channel.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your family to Pelican Hill! I'm delighted to read that you enjoyed a relaxing getaway in the Bungalows - and that Camp Pelican gave you the opportunity to take advantage of some much-deserved Spa time. We appreciate your kind review and hope to welcome you all back to Pelican Hill soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: As a Luxury Travel Designer, I am constantly staying at luxury properties all over the world.  I reside in So Cal, not far from The Resort at Pelican Hill and this remains one of my very favorite places.  Whether I stay for a weekend or just the day, I love it every time.  It's magical, so much so that my husband and I got engaged and married there!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill, Sheri! Your thoughtful feedback means so much to us, especially as a fellow travel professional - and Southern California local! We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you and your husband back for many memorable visits to come.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We have always loved the Resort at Pelican Hill and come regularly to the spa and restaurants. We stayed in the ocean view bungalow a few years ago and now that we have two children, we decided to book a staycation in a three bedroom villa.   It was simply amazing! We all wanted to stay forever. The stacking doors open up to a gorgeous ocean view; the kitchen is fully stocked (a major plus when traveling with your little ones); the fireplace was a hit with everyone; every bedroom had its own beautifully appointed bathroom. Having a private garage and washer/dryer was also an awesome perk.   We dined at all the restaurants but our favorite was probably breakfast and lunch at the Coliseum Grille.   Service was truly outstanding from start to finish. We did not encounter a single
Manager Response: Hi Kim,   Thank you for visiting the Villas and sharing your kind review! Being a part of our guests' most special family memories is a great privilege, and we're thrilled to read that Pelican Hill has become a new tradition for you all. Please know I've shared your thoughtful feedback with our team, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another special getaway soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Recently  spent a  night at  the Pelican  Hill  with  my  clients ,  it  was  simply  amazing  the  staff  is  so  attentive  and  extremely  polite  definitely  making  you  feel special. I  staid  in one  of the villas  ..  you  would  never  want  to leave spectacular  view , quite and best service .
Manager Response: Hello Enzo,   I'm glad your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill and that you enjoyed your stay in the Villas. We appreciate your visit and kind feedback and hope to welcome you back to Newport Beach very soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican HIll

Summary: I came here back in January for two nights with my boyfriend and I was blown away. They have a gorgeous property and the most amazing rooms you could possibly imagine. While it is a pricey hotel, you truly get your money’s worth here. I stayed in their most basic room for about $500 and it was huge with a big comfortable bed, fireplace, large bathroom, sitting area, and a large balcony with an amazing view.   From the moment I walked in, the service was incredible. I had been traveling when I checked in and was a bit of a mess and in grungy clothes, but the staff treated me like I was the most important guest they had. I have never seen better service in any hotel. The airport had lost my luggage, and the hotel took care of everything for me and got it to my room as soon as it
Manager Response: Hi Marie,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill this winter!
