I'm so proud to read that the friendly service from our staff is what made your stay so memorable and have taken this opportunity to share your kind words with our leadership team as well. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to welcome you and your boyfriend back for another relaxing stay in the Bungalows very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan,  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: One of My Best Get-a-way places!
Summary: I love The Resort at Pelican Hill! The service is great and all the activities. The staff really cares about their customers. There is always something fun to do and the planned classes and activities are great. Not to mention the pick up and drop off at Crystal Cove Beach, one of my favorites to watch the Sunset. I last Traveled here August 2017, and I will return in September 2019!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Rose! I'm delighted to read that you've enjoyed all the Resort has to offer and even explored our neighboring Crystal Cove Beach as well. We look forward to welcoming you back to Pelican Hill this fall!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The villa bedrooms and bathrooms were spacious and clean. Private. Garage. Ideal for long stays.  The gym and pool are a short walk. The views are quite nice. I think the staff missed a day of cleaning/turndown, so that was surprising. And I hate when flat water is not provided without having to ask for it. Overall though, it was a nice stay.
Manager Response: Hello Justin,   Thank you visiting the Villas! I appreciate your kind feedback about your stay and apologize if our housekeeping team missed a turndown service while you were with us. Please know I've addressed your feedback and suggestion about still water with our housekeeping team, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: 10 years coming here, age starting to show on 4 bedroom villas; fire alarm issues, rude security
Summary: Been coming to Pelican Hill for 10 years (since it opened in 2008). The age of the Villas has been showing more and more every year. This time around (may 2019) we saw cracks on the roof and walls, doors sound loose and look old, finishes look dated.   Faulty fire alarms went off at 3am, waking everyone up, had to wait for the fire Marshall. At $2,500 per night, simply unacceptable. Best the resort could do is give us a $300 credit; it was initially $100 after we complained that we wanted a free night.  Fourth day at villa, security walks in at 9am with a smoking complaint, agent was super rude with a accusing tone and rude. Worst of all we were all playing golf since 8am and my brother happened to answer the door on way out. He mentioned to agent that nobody was home so the
Manager Response: Hello MOIPanama,   I apologize that your recent stay in the Villas left you disappointed, especially as a loyal guest over the past decade. While the safety and comfort our guests is of the utmost importance to our team, I regret that your stay was interrupted by fire alarms and that our security team was anything less than gracious in investigating their smoking concerns. I've connected you with our General Manager in a private message, so we may personally apologize and also share the many refreshment projects taking place at both the Villas and the Resort's public spaces. Thank you again for your candid insight, and we hope to welcome you back for a much-improved return in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I have visited the spa for two years and this was my first time extending my stay to the bungalows. It was the best decision ever.   From the time of arrival to the time of departure the service was outstanding, the food is delicious, and the view is amazing. It was absolutely the best getaway.
Manager Response: Hi Tracy,   I'm glad to read that you had an opportunity to extend your stay at Pelican HIll and am delighted that you enjoyed your time in the Bungalows. Thank you for sharing such lovely feedback about your trip, and we hope to welcome you back for another relaxing staycation - or "daycation" - very soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: So many of my friends love this place. Some have been married here, some are here every week and holiday but I have never really spent a lot of time in Orange County.  I drove out from Beverly Hills to meet my friend who was staying there for a spa day and had one of the most incredible weekends. Had an 80 minute Rest & Relax massage with Michelle that took away a full month of stress and tension and completely relaxed me. We had brunch afterwards and enjoyed a custom vegan meal that they prepared according to all of my food restrictions. Now I get why they all love it.  I will definitely be back, not just for the spa but for the full experience. :)
Manager Response: I'm so glad that your travels brought you to Pelican Hill and that you enjoyed such a wonderful weekend with your friends! I understand how important it is to take time to step aside from the busyness of life, and we're honored that Pelican Hill could be that relaxing getaway for you. Thank you for taking the time to offer your kind feedback, and I'll be sure to personally share your kind words with Michelle, too. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I was visiting with my daughter and granddaughter and we were very happy with all personals and food. Thank you for a nice experience. The steak was done perfectly as we ordered and everything was very delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your family to Pelican Hill! I'm glad to read that you enjoyed a memorable evening together, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Beautiful Property - Great Place For A Family Vacation - Located In Paradise
Summary: We flew across country from one coast to the other for a work trip turned partial vacation.  The Pelican Hill Resort is not only a beautiful property, but it is located in one of the prettiest places in Southern California. I loved the property, the service, the food, the pool.  My daughter couldn't get enough of the pool!!! The only little things to mention though are the cleanliness of the rooms.  They are a bit worn and outdated and they require some updating.  They just require more cleaning than I think the housekeeping staff can offer them.  They weren't filthy or really dirty....just worn and a little dirty. The food was good.  It wasn't great and I kind of expected more from this resort. But it was ok and I can't overly complain. All in all though, it was a great
Manager Response: Hi Kirsten,   I'm delighted that your travels brought you to Pelican Hill! I appreciate your thoughtful feedback about your stay and candid insight about your Bungalow accommodations. I'm glad to share that the Resort is in the midst of updating our Bungalows and Villas with refreshed upholstery, entertainment systems and other in-room amenities, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back to Newport Beach soon.   Warm regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, very good service, food is only OK (not great)
Summary: My company returned to Pelican Hill a second time for a partner retreat (after a few years elsewhere). It was good the first time but even better on this last visit. With few exceptions but most people felt the property is beautiful, perfectly maintained and the rooms are very nice, Views are gorgeous. Although the hotel was fully booked, it is so large that in most cases you just don't feel impinged upon by the other activities. But it is too big to give an intimate atmosphere.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. I give them very high marks -- equivalent to or better than Four Season or Ritz Carlton.  Most of the people in our group felt that the food was good but just OK.  It is an expensive property but generally competitive with similar resorts.  Spa treatments were
Manager Response: Hello Jim,   I'm so glad that your business travels brought you back to Pelican Hill and appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful review with us. Please know I've passed along your kind words about Maria and Roxanne the falconer, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: A beautiful luxury resort on the Coast
Summary: We enjoyed a long weekend at the Villas at Pelican Hill--the two bedroom villa being ideal for the two of us.  Service at the Villas Clubhouse was excellent and we were very well looked after.  (Thank you Shelley!)  Food at the resort was delicious and the ambiance was relaxing and refined.  The Villas are a bit less crowded than the main hotel, especially the pool and fitness center.  We would highly commend this property.
Manager Response: Hi Robert,   Thank you for choosing to visit Pelican Hill! The Villas are almost like a Resort within our Resort, and I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Please know I've shared your kind words with Shelley as well, and we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Coast soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Splendid Room with a View and Wonderful Service!
Summary: We spent several days at this beautiful location. What a find!  From check in - greeted warmly and efficiently by Aaron - to check out - this place did not disappoint. We had a gorgeous bungalow with views of the ocean. The decor is nice, and the bed was very good. We both liked the set-up of the bathroom with the large tub where you could soak and still see the ocean.  Every request was handled swiftly and professionally. Room service was great and the restaurants were lovely. We enjoyed chatting with the Italian bartender. Actually, all encounters with staff were truly pleasant.  It is a nice location for taking walks or just hanging out by the pool. One thing about the pool - we traveled as a couple and noted there were many families with small children. I have no issue with
Manager Response: Hi Shanah,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! We're delighted to read Aaron left such a positive first impression of the Resort and that you enjoyed your Bungalow accommodations. I appreciate your suggestion for an adult-only hot tub and will share that with your team. As another tranquil on-property amenity, please know access to the Spa's Acqua Colonnade (soaking tubs, saunas, etc.) is available to all Resort guests over the age of 18. Thanks again for your insight, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: WITHOUT A DOUBT ONE OF THE NICEST PLACES TO STAY IN CALIFORNIA
Summary: If you want luxury, great service, fantastic food, a comfortable room, in a perfect atmosphere, then Pelican Hill is the place for you. We couldn't have had a nicer stay.  The room was beautiful, the views to die for, the food was superb, the service was exemplary.  It just couldn't get any better.
Manager Response: Hi Kristen,   Thank you for such a glowing review of your stay at Pelican Hill! Our team appreciates your kind words, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Lovely location, spectacular rooms, delicious food, bring your walking shoes.
Summary: We booked a 4 night stay in a bungalow for a gathering with friends who also stayed at the property. Our bungalow did not have a sea view but we didn’t care. It was lovely and had a balcony which we could enjoy in complete privacy due to the well thought out landscaping.   The room had a large bathroom with a shower and a tub, double sinks, a big king bed and beautifully clean. I walked to Crystal Cove State Park, a lovely downhill walk, 1 mile from the main building. Yes the walk back to the property is uphill and a bit challenging but enjoyable. There is a path the entire way and a crosswalk with a light to allow pedestrians across the busy street to the park. The resort provides a shuttle to the old refurbished Crystal Cove beach houses and the famous Beachcomber restaurant.
Manager Response: Hello Claire,   Thank you for taking the time to share such a thoughtful review of your time at Pelican Hill! While I'm glad to read that you enjoyed your overall stay in the Bungalows and had the opportunity to explore our surrounding communities, I apologize for the inconvenient delays you experienced with our on-property coach service. I've personally shared your feedback with our Guest Services Managers, and we hope that your travels bring you back to our seaside village very soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: We were at this resort for 4 days.
Summary: So OK.   This is one VERY expensive resort.   And you always say, you don't mind paying if it really is great.   So this one is close but you still feel that there is a lot of nickel & diming.   We had a "package" rate which did include breakfast.   Breakfast cost $40. for a really not very exciting buffet. That is a lot more than most places.   So if your breakfast isn't included, it becomes very expensive unless you want to go buy stuff and keep it in your room.   There are shuttles that take you to the beach and you are given towels and water.   That is actually a really nice benefit except that the shuttle only runs essentially once an hour and you really can't walk to the beach.    The spa, like the rest of the resort, is good, maybe above average but waaaay above average
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I'm glad to read that you enjoyed our Resort amenities like the beach coach, our Five-Star spa and ocean-view restaurants. I appreciate your thoughts on the value of our offerings, as well. We hope that your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: In all of our travels Pelican stands out as one of the best.  We attended a private event, and the resort did a fabulous job.  One minor problem:  after sunset it gets very dark.  My wife and I were nearly run over by golf carts that drive through the event, but without lights.  We were surprised that golfing in the dark was even possible, but it sure presents a danger to guests and the golfers--not to mention liability to the resort. Guests were walking to dinner along the same cart path.  Although that is the only flaw in our experience, management needs to take corrective action.  We did not stay in the resort, but will at another time.  I will even play golf, but in daylight.
Manager Response: Hello, and thank you for your candid feedback. The safety of our guests is our top priority, and I appreciate you taking the time to share your recommendations about how to improve golf cart visibility after dark. I have followed up with our leadership team to  promptly address this concern and make changes moving forward. We hope to welcome you and your wife for a visit and golf round in the future.  Warm regards, Tom Donovan Pelican Hill Managing Director

Summary: My husband and I stayed in a villa over the weekend and it was perfection. We enjoyed the accommodations very much. The views are breathtaking and the villa is bright, open and comfortable. The resort is gorgeous and the pool is epic. The staff is extremely accommodating and helpful.    There are a couple drawbacks to this resort. They don’t have walking access to the beach but they do have a shuttle that runs every hour back and forth. Also, if you stay in a villa you will want a car or bikes because the main lobby is a bit of a distance from the villas.   We enjoyed the villa a lot and had a great time at the resort!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review about your recent Villa stay with us. I'm proud of our accommodating and helpful staff for delivering such a positive experience to you and your husband. We're pleased to offer complimentary coaches to transport our guests to the beach and around the resort grounds. Bikes are also a great way to get around our Italian seaside village, and we have them available to our guests for their convenience. Thanks again for your thoughtful feedback, and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This was one of the nicest, if not the nicest resort we have ever stayed in. They give you the white glove treatment from the time you arrive until the time you leave. The resort itself is immaculate as are the rooms. The pool was absolutely gorgeous and relaxing and even our 5 & 6 year olds had a blast. I can't say enough good things about this resort.
Manager Response: Hello, and thank you for posting your positive feedback about your Pelican Hill stay. I'm glad you and your family enjoyed your immaculate guest room, the gorgeous pool and "white glove" service from our team. We look forward to welcoming you back again!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I rarely leave reviews. The service at this resort is genuine, friendly and top notch.  They must have a terrific management and training program.  Food is also excellent. I would love to return for  another trip
Manager Response: We're so grateful that you took the time to share your review with us! Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill, and we hope that your travels bring you back very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This is an all around exceptional resort. Truth be told, we had no idea what to expect as first timers and we hadn't researched the hotel but were blown away by all the amenities, grounds, rooms, and dining options. We rented the bungalow suite with a view of the ocean. The room was vast, with cozy details like comfy couches and two fireplaces. It was also super convenient having a kitchenette area, with dining table and coffee machine.   The beds were luxurious with a spacious lounge area, work space, and TV. The bathroom was large and relaxing. The spa tub was such an indulgent treat and the soaps provided were top of the line. We had a two bedroom bungalow with two full bathrooms and there was plenty of space for a larger family. The balcony was enormous with a table and
Manager Response: Thank you for including Pelican Hill in your family's special Christmas celebrations! We're so fortunate to have people like Person on our team, and I've shared your thoughtful feedback with him as well. We appreciate you graciously sharing your kind words, and we hope that this was the first of many memorable Pelican Hill visits to come!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Another fine stay at our favorite resort in Southern Ca.  The property is always well kept and clean.  Rooms are fantastic with a touch of sophistication and homey at the same time.  Staff are wonderful as always and makes you feel welcome.   This time, we had our activities prearranged by Danielle and she made sure everything was perfect.  Her personal service made our stay extra special.    Everything you need to have a relaxing weekend is here.  Good food, lot of things to do for adult and kids alike, and their gigantic Coliseum pool is a favorite hangout for the kids.  Two championship golf courses, world class spa and views to die for - what else can you ask for.  Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share such a thoughtful review about your time at Pelican Hill! Danielle is an incredible leader here at the Resort, and I'll be sure to personally pass along your kind words. Thank you again for your visit, and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you again soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The most beautiful resort.  The bungalow i stayed in was amazing.  The service was great I ate at two of the restaurants. They were both great. Fun bartenders too. The grounds are beautiful and the  views from my room was fabulous
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I'm delighted to read that you enjoyed your Bungalow accommodations and had the opportunity to explore our on-property restaurants as well. We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Excited to get back this week!
Summary: This is one of the most beautiful resorts in California. We come to this property to relax, Spa, eat and swim. The rooms are gorgeous and the staff is top notch. The restaurants are great in the hotel but also a short ride away you can have all the best in Newport! Not to mention Soul Cycle is 5 minutes away! See you all Tuesday!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback! I'm glad to read that Pelican Hill has become a relaxing destination for you and proud that our team has made your recent visits extra memorable. We appreciate your thoughtful review and look forward to welcoming you back today.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Amazing property and views!  Exceptional service with a smile from every staff member, many addressed me by name despite my short stay.  The rooms are incredible: large, beautifully appointed, comfortable, with enormous bathrooms, high ceilings, fireplaces, and large private terraces.  A perfect place to relax and feel pampered in a luxurious setting.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I'm glad to read that you felt so welcomed by our team and appreciate your thoughtful feedback about your Bungalow accommodations. We hope to welcome you back for another relaxing getaway soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The room is not very big but the view is what really makes this place. My room had an ocean view. It had a glass balcony railing so none of the view was obstructed. The bed was pretty comfortable, the bathroom was nice, typical for a 5 star resort. The view from the main building off the back balcony was truly amazing. If I can look at that view all day, I would be very happy. The pool was beautiful but it was too cold to use. The restaurant food was fairly mediocre. I'm not sure if it's worth the price but it was a beautiful place.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughtful and detailed feedback about your recent visit to Pelican Hill. While I'm glad to read that many parts of your stay were picturesque, I apologize that your dining experiences weren't equally wonderful and have addressed your concerns with our culinary team. Please know that we keep Coliseum Pool heated to approximately 82 degrees year-round, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for another stay - and pool day! - in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Resort Pelicon Hill was very wonderful place.amazing Decorating resort room.resort manager was very helpful and friendly.food and drinks was amazing and really great service.fitness center,bar,swimming pool,spa and business center was amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill, Arunava! I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind feedback and am glad to read you had an opportunity to really explore all the Resort has to offer. On behalf of our team, we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach again soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Still My Favorite, but needs some Updating
Summary: I love this resort (just read my many reviews) however after coming here so often you begin to see the little things that are starting to age.  I am finally starting to have trouble sleeping as the beds and pillows are getting too soft.  The AV in the villas needs to be updated so that you can use bluetooth, etc.  They have started some of the renovations and I can't wait to get back a little later this year and see some of the completed work.  Still the resort has great service and is really quiet.  Even with work being done, you would not know it. Service, views, peace and quiet and being in a gated area (if you stay in the villas) makes this the place that I keep coming back to.
Manager Response: Hello!   Thank you for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill - and for taking the time to share another thoughtful feedback with us! We're excited for you to experience some of the Resort's refreshed amenities, including Bluetooth capabilities and new televisions and sound systems. Please know that our housekeeping team would be delighted to provide you with different pillows during your next visit, and I've sent you a private message so we may better anticipate your next visit. We appreciate your insight and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Is it pricey? Yes! But I guarantee you will not regret it. The food was amazing and we ate at all the restaurants on site. You don’t even have to leave the resort there is so much to do.  Shout out to Ricardo at Andrea Restaurant- the perfect waiter! And Jennifer at the spa who have the very best facial. High-five to Helena the massage therapist who did my in room massage on the veranda.  5 star resort- they are 5 star for a reason.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! While we're certainly proud of our Five-Star rating, kind feedback like yours is even more meaningful. I'm glad to read that you had the opportunity to enjoy all the Resort has to offer, and I'll be sure to thank Ricardo, Jennifer and Helena for making your stay that much more memorable. We appreciate your thoughtful comments and hope that your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Warm regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Ruined weekend! Poor staff, poorly maintained property. Getting old and beat up.  Broken HVAC , old tv, spotty wifi, unresponsive front desk. I know management has had a high turnover and things seem to be getting worse not better. Horrible stay and a ruined weekend.  Water damage,  pet damage,  water leaking in the room.  Ridiculous for how much they charge. Total money grab for the Irvine company.
Manager Response: Hi Andrew,   I sincerely apologize that your weekend visit to Pelican Hill fell so short of your expectations. The challenges you describe don't reflect the exceptional service and accommodations we aim to provide for each of our guests, and I'm disappointed that we missed the mark for you. We truly appreciate your insight and look forward to connecting with you.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Rooms were well appointed, wonderful fireplaces, "slight glimpse" of ocean (wish could have been more)… golf carts there to assist in getting around... restaurant on site very good dinner and Sunday Brunch!
Manager Response: Hi Keith,   Thank you for visiting the Bungalows! I appreciate you taking the time to share your review, and it was a pleasure to welcome you to Pelican Hill. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you again the next time that your travels bring you to Newport Beach.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed here for four nights. First off, the pool area ‘coliseum’ is stunning! Apparently the second largest circular pool in the world. Unfortunately too chilly to use,  but very beautiful.  Second great plus are the wellness classes, went to three and each was excellent.  Unfortunately quite a few niggles which would not have me return...  Rooms feel outdated and not homely enough despite signs everywhere saying your home from home. The bathroom amenities did not feel personalised, too corporate and despite a huge bath no bath salts or oils to put in the bath. I had to call housekeeping twice during my stay to get my room serviced as it had been overlooked.  Breakfast was good though better gluten free options could be offered. Staff at breakfast were excellent.  Gym was ok,
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill, and I apologize that your time at the Resort was anything less than perfect. Your candid feedback allows us to continually improve our guest experience, and I've taken this opportunity to discuss your concerns about in-room amenities, housekeeping, gluten-free offerings and the fitness center with our leadership team. As you mentioned, our goal is to offer a tranquil home-away-from-home for our guests, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a much-improved visit to Pelican Hill soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed here for one night.  Greeted by lemon trees outside the front door of the bungalow - loaded with lots of fruit.  Room was huge, well appointed with robes, toiletries, mini-bar (for a fee), and Nespresso pod coffee maker, plus hot water kettle for tea which was a nice touch.  Beds are really comfortable with every type of pillow to choose from.  Room has fireplace - great, if only it worked.   Two staff had to come, two trips to get it started.  At the prices charged, everything in the room should be in perfect working order vs. having to call out to get help to turn on a gas fireplace with one switch on the wall.  At $600+ a night, they also need to modernize rooms for 21st century to include electric sockets with USB inputs.  Bring your own gear to charge computers and
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the Bungalows! I appreciate you so graciously sharing about your time at the Resort and am glad to read that you enjoyed your overall stay. I apologize for the troubles you experienced with your fireplace and have passed along your feedback and room number to our engineering team to investigate and make any necessary repairs. Thank you again for your thoughtful review, and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We stayed in room 642....  a two bedroom that was lovely.  A gorgeous balcony with views down to the ocean.  Next time I’d bring a few groceries of our own to add to the well stocked kitchen. This is a place to come and stay for a while!!  The resort is huge and where we were , it has its own beautiful pool area.  The view is spectacular. The only thing is that we were far from it.  They have a shuttle service and the drivers were great (especially Johnny....thanks for the tour!)
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the Villas and taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback on our Tripadvisor pages! Summary Heading: Great spot for a family vacation

The room plus the outdoor area gave us plenty of space (2 adults plus a young child and toddler), and even though the weather was chilly, we really enjoyed the location.  The view was gorgeous and the room and service were great overall.    The beautiful beach is a 5 minute drive away (it would be nice if shuttle service were on demand instead of hourly, so we chose to drive our rental car), and it's a great, convenient spot for exploring the towns nearby.  My only request for a hotel of this caliber would be complimentary coffee somewhere on the property earlier in the morning! We were waking up on East Coast time and the coffee shop in the hotel didn't open until 7 (and the machine in the room didn't do it
Manager Response: Hi Andalu,  Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your family's winter getaway! Restaurant food is delicious but quantity is on the smaller side. Would definitely recommend this place!

Summary Heading: You feel like you are in a Fantisy

I was impressed with Zarko Lucic, who took the time to hear our needs and went above and beyond to make special birthday at Pelican Inn an extremely memorable stay. With this special service, it exceeded our wildest expectations.  The location is excellent. The spa was very good, the bar was busy and fun to try adventuresome and delicious cocktail selection. they make you feel it is a privilege for them to look after your every need. Their ability to anticipate our needs and requirements was uncanny and unlike other hotels in this category.   The breath-taking view from our balcony was surreal we decided to order room

Summary: Wow!  This is our second visit here.  Everything is 😉 amazing!!!  Staff is super!  Food is fabulous! Accommodations are beautiful!  Spa is wonderful!!!!  Can’t say enough about the resort.  Even in the pouring rain it is hard not to enjoy the aabiance!

Summary: I've been to many Ritz Carlton, Four Season, etc, but Pelican Hill now tops them all.  The resort is situated to maximize the beautiful Pacific view and rooms were very very nice.  We played both golf courses on the property and each were exceptional.  I especially liked the South Course that traverses the terrain all the way down to the Pacific shore.  It was both challenging and beautiful!  I give Pelican Hill my highest marks for beauty, comfort and service. A+
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I'm so glad that you had the opportunity to golf both courses while you were here, and we hope that your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I stayed at Pelican Resort for three nights in Feb 19 for a conference.  My fellow delegates and I christened it 'The Bubble'. The place where everything is beautiful. Where the staff bend over backwards to provide impeccable service, the food is great, the location amazing, the rooms divine, the conference facilities ... top notch. Where nobody ever gets sick, the weather is always mild, and the gods themselves cast their beatific radiance over the elegant idyll that is Pelican Hill.  In a straw poll of the 150 delegates in attendance, the general sentiment was 'Please don't make me leave'. I am not yet ready to return to the 'real world'.   Several of my colleagues and I have made a pact to return one day (no mean feat given we're located in Australia).  Thank you, Pelican

Thank you for taking the time to share such a kind review of your stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you and your colleagues back to our seaside village soon. Safe travels!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We had so much fun at Pelican Resort. This is one of the most beautiful resort. The rooms are very elegant . I had the best night sleep ever. The bed was so comfy. It has the most amazing views. We will be back very soon.

Summary Heading: First time at this great restaurant-Went to noon lunch .
Summary: Such a beautiful location- We enjoyed the time we were their-Great food-Great wine selection-Easy to location-A little pricy but not for the atmosphere- 5 of us had such a good time with the waiter. and staff-I highly recommend anyone to try this beautiful place with the Pacific ocean visible---
Manager Response: Thank you for dining with us at Pelican Hill! I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind review, and we hope to serve you again very soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Elegant, well run and luxurious property....and yet...
Summary: The Resort at Pelican Hill is one of the most beautiful resorts/hotels I have ever had the pleasure of patronizing.  It is set in the hills above Newport Beach on 36 holes of golf with dramatic vistas and views.  The bones of the hotel are extraordinary - high ceilings, large rooms, a clever layout with the rooms surrounding small courtyards (not unlike a smaller version of La Quinta) and first class monumentation.  And yet... the decor - while expensive and elegant - reminds me of late 1980's Reagan Era high net worth homes or hotels.  All beige, lots of granite and marble, somewhat dimly lit....  It's really, really nice but isn't it 2019 now and haven't we evolved?  The good news is that with the good bones of the hotel, when the powers that be determine to redecorate it will
Manager Response: Hi Jake,   I appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback about your recent visit to Pelican Hill. Please know we've shared your insight about the Resort's decor with our leadership team, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back for another getaway in the future. Thank you again for your visit!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Luxury Hospitality - Redefined by The Resort at Pelican Hill
Summary: The most luxurious, professional and the best service I have ever experienced in all my hotel/resort stays at some of the best hotels and resorts around the world. As a hotelier for 32 years and previously a Chief Sales & Marketing Officer of an ultra-luxury hotel brand/company, I do have very high standards. Big brands like Four Seasons and Ritz Carlton have a ton to learn from The Resort at Pelican Hill, which is an independent luxury resort led by an awesome management team and run by awesome colleagues, who make the real difference.
Manager Response: Hi Apo,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! Your kind feedback is even more meaningful as a fellow hospitality professional, and I'm proud to read that our team members made your stay so memorable. We sincerely appreciate your thoughtful review and hope to welcome you back to Newport Beach very soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Despite the title I didn’t get to relax too much as it was a business trip - but hey what a place for a business trip.  This is truly a beautiful location with very comfortable well appointed bungalows, very friendly staff and great service.   Sadly didn’t get chance to try the pool - which looked beautiful and inviting in the California sunshine or the spa which was reported by a colleague as being a lovely experience but the overall stay was great and anyone looking for a 5* type break won’t be disappointed .   This was my first experience of the US west coast and it was memorable - the only down-side, I’ve now been spoiled!  Looking forward to the opportunity to go back that’s for sure!
Manager Response: Hello Cleggyb,   I'm delighted that your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill and appreciate you sharing your experience with us. We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back for a poolside getaway in the future!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Just returned from a wonderful stay in an ocean view bungalow. No major complaints but when paying for a 5 star resort, the expectations are very high hence the 4 star rating. Loved the room: large and nicely appointed, the fireplace, the view and the deep soak tub were highlights; the service overall was excellent and all the staff were very friendly. The spa was lovely as well. The one star downgrade is for minor things: previously opened, half drunk water bottle in our room at check-in (they replaced quickly when we called and they also brought us requested ice); our bath tub wouldn’t drain and it took 2 notifications to fix - second time, they fixed it quickly; tv wouldn’t connect for Cast viewing (did not get fixed while we were there); reservation info said refrigerator
Manager Response: Hello Mr. and Mrs. Corrigan,   Thank you again for visiting Pelican Hill this past weekend, and I apologize that your time with us was anything less than perfect. While I'm glad to read that you enjoyed your overall visit and Bungalow accommodations, I'm disappointed that your stay was inconvenienced by service requests. Please know that I've personally addressed your feedback with our leadership team, so we may continually improve our guests' overall experience. We truly appreciate your feedback and look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back to Pelican Hill again in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed at the Resort at Pelican Hill over the MLK weekend. It’s a beautiful property with sprawling grounds. We stayed at one of the Bungalows right by the Coliseum Pool & Grill. It is incredibly spacious, with soaring ceilings, fireplace, and a separate sitting area. There is a little window from the bathroom to the sleeping area, which my 3-year old son enjoyed since he could look out while taking a bubble bath. The small furnished patio area provided a nice private area to relax and looked out into the golf course. I could imagine spending hours there just reading a book. Overall, a very relaxing stay. Would definitely stay there again in the future!
Manager Response: Hi Christina,   Thank you for spending the holiday weekend at Pelican Hill! I'm delighted to read that your family enjoyed a fun-filled getaway, and our team appreciates you taking the time to share your kind words with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Awesome location!! Suite was perfect.  Heavy rain the night we stayed so the fire/fireplace was perfect setting that evening.   Ordered room service, very good food hot and tasty.  Staff first Class could not fault our stay!!
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed a cozy visit to Pelican Hill! Please know I've taken this opportunity to share your thoughtful feedback with our team, and we hope to welcome you back for another stay in the Bungalows very soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Beautiful location with ocean view. The bungalows are spacious with its own patio overlooking the ocean and gives you plenty of privacy.  Everything about this resort is nothing short of amazing including the food and service, restaurants, spa and golf!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the Bungalows and sharing your kind review with us! We're so glad your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill, and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you again in the future. Summary: Great check in. Our room wasn't ready but they let us know as soon as it was. We hung out and enjoyed the view and had something to drink. Santa stopped by and said hello. Our room was fabulous. Lots of room, huge bathroom, fireplace and a great patio with ocean view. Comfy bed. Massages were great! Room service breakfast was really good and there was a toaster in the room which was a nice touch. Everyone was very friendly and nice. Will definitely go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating the Christmas season with us at Pelican Hill! I appreciate you taking the time to share such kind feedback about your stay with us, and we hope that your travels bring you back to Newport Coast in 2019. Summary: Having heard of the Resort at Pelican Hill we decided to give it a try. Wow, we are impressed! Set above the coast line and golf course, the views are amazing. We booked a two bedroom villa. The furnishings and design were perfect. We even had a private garage. The Villas come with a very helpful Butler. He unloaded our car, parked it in the garage; and, helped us orient ourselves to the area. The kitchen is well equipped and state of art. There are shuttles to the beach and Crystal Cove. Tonight a big storm is coming in, we plan to sit by the fire and enjoy the rain. We plan on returning in the summer.
Manager Response: Hello James,   Thank you for visiting the Villas! I'm delighted that you're enjoying a cozy stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again this summer.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Went to the Rose Bowl and stayed at Pelican Hill.. the facility is fantastic, the staff if friendly and helpful but mostly stays out of the way. The Pool facility is like no other with amazing views and plenty of room.
Manager Response: Hi Jeff,   Thank you for starting 2019 with us at Pelican Hill! We appreciate your visit and thoughtful review and look forward to welcoming you back for another stay soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Our whole family was at Pelican Hill from December 29th through January 2nd.  We stayed in a 4 bedroom villa  The villa and staff amazing.   Everything we did....golf,spa,Camp Pelican,dining was FABULOUS    We had our own bulter.  Nice since he could answer a lot of our questions personally.  As far as we were concerned u didn’t need to leave the complex for anything.  Although there is shopping nearby....maybe 10 minutes

Summary: Stayed at The Resort at Pelican Hill while on a business trip in September 2018.  It was my first visit to Newport Beach and I'm not sure I can top it unless I return.  The service was incredible, the accommodations were incredible, the views were incredible, the golf was incredible, the pool was incredible.  This is truly a best of the best.  I was able to stay an extra day on the front end and the back end of the trip and it was worth it!  I will say that it is not inexpensive, but for an experience like Pelican Hill, it is worth every dollar spent.  I would come back in a heartbeat....   Oh, and on a side note - I spent a considerable amount of time in their business center, and they were so accommodating - made doing business in luxury more enjoyable!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Hello!   I'm so glad you enjoyed your first visit to Newport Beach and had the opportunity to extend your business trip to explore more of the Resort.
