At the Grill, we had ordered an appetizer that got missed, we had burgers that were overcooked and very slow service. I had to have someone grab our waiter twice in order to get things corrected. At the pool, a waitress didn't stop for us the entire time we were out there unless we flagged her down - there were not many guests around the pool (maybe 8 families at the busiest point...) and there were about 4 servers that we saw.  In the Coliseum restaurant, we were sat for a late breakfast but didn't have anyone stop by our table for about 15 minutes - finally, a manager came over to ask if we wanted something to
Manager Response: Hi Stephie,   I appreciate you taking the time to share such detailed feedback with us. While I'm glad to read that you enjoyed your overall stay and dining experiences at Andrea, I apologize that the service missteps at Coliseum Pool & Grill tarnished your visit. Please know I've addressed your candid notes with our food and beverage and hospitality service teams, so we may continually improve our guests' experiences. Thank you again for your thoughtful insight and we hope to welcome you back soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My wife and I have taken two trips here now. It has become our absolute favorite resort in all of California now. Great spa, fantastic rooms, we had in room dining and went to the Coliseum to eat both times. Each time was excellent.  I will post a very in depth review on our next visit this year.
Manager Response: Hi Sean,   I'm so honored to hear that Pelican Hill has become a special destination for you and your wife. I appreciate your kind feedback, and our team looks forward to welcoming you back in 2019.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Spent 6 nights in a Pelican Hill “Villa”
Summary: 2 bedroom and 2 1/2 bath BUT the maintainance and service were terrible. We called the first morning to report that the TV did not have sound and the wireless internet did not work. After 3 visits by “the IT person”, the TV continued to have no sound and the Internet worked sporadically. We continued to call and always spoke to a very pleasant person but nothing was ever fixed. The security was also deficient. We stayed in a building with “locked” outer doors. Unfortunately, the thresholds were rusty so the doors were never closed. The”garden view” wad of a dry hillside. FYI, the price averaged $900.00 per night.
Manager Response: Hi Kerry,   I apologize that your recent stay in the Villas was anything less than perfect and that your experiences with engineering and IT tarnished your overall visit. Please know that I've personally addressed your concerns about TVs, wireless access and the exterior Villa doors with our leadership team, and I've also sent you a private message connecting you with our Villas General Manager. We sincerely appreciate your insight and hope to regain your trust for a much-improved return soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: As you drive towards the entrance of the resort through the tony neighborhoods of Newport Coast, your expectations are raised.   We were not disappointed.  The resort’s architecture and appointments are elegant and tasteful but not stuffy.  No huge multi-story structures in sight, just unobstructed ocean views everywhere from the property.  Crystal Cove beach access is less than a mile away by shuttle or a short walk. We stayed in a private 850 square foot bungalow.   A perfectly manicured emerald green fairway below our unit was the only thing between us and spectacular ocean and sunset views. The food and service was perfect in every restaurant and nearly perfect in every other amenity.  The only glitch we experienced was in our return shuttle trip from the beach.   We arrived
Manager Response: Hi Victor,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your recent couple's getaway! I appreciate your detailed review of your stay and apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with our coach service from Crystal Cove. I've taken this opportunity to address your feedback with our guest services team, so we may prevent any miscommunication in the future. Thank you again for your visit, and we hope to see you again soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Love love love this place.  Wish I had the cash to eat at the Chef’s Table.  Service and food were top notch.  Eat outside if the weather is good.  Sunsets are incredible!  Can’t wait to go again! Check it out!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your kind feedback with us! Thank you again for your visit, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another ocean-view dining experience soon!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This resort is one of our favorites in the whole country. Set on the Pacific Ocean it is spectacular. The rooms are beautiful and huge with every modern convenience you could want . Two pools, two championship golf courses and three delicious restaurants. The hotel is so well run it will astonish you. The grounds are manicured , and landscaped beautifully.  You will not be disappointed about anything and will rebook before you leave.
Manager Response: Hi Michael,   I'm so honored that Pelican Hill has become a favorite destination of yours and appreciate you taking the time to share such a kind review of your visit. We appreciate your thoughtful feedback and hope that your travels bring you back to Newport Beach very soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Top Notch Experience at Pelican Hill Resort
Summary: The people and service here is excellent. The room large and very comfortable. I give Pelican Hill a solid 10 out of 10 experience and will come back soon. It's rate to get this type of service today. It's over the top. Great great great!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review! I appreciate you taking the time to share such kind feedback about your service experience at the Resort, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill again soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The rooms are huge they have beautiful private outdoor space. The on sight restaurant was amazing we had a lovely dinner there. The oval pool is gorgeous. The spa was amazing and the service was incredible. Beautiful views from almost anywhere on the property and beautiful place to watch the sunset
Manager Response: Hi Mary,   I appreciate your kind words! Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill, and we hope that your travels bring you back for another picturesque getaway very soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Top Shelf Villa Accomodations and Breathtaking Views of Pacific Ocean
Summary: Staying in 3 bedroom villa leased by Exclusive Resorts and a 3 minute walk to the pool, fitness center, and restaurant for breakfast and lunch. Villas have daily maid service, washer-dryer, and full kitchen.  Amazing views off the back porch of the Pacific Ocean and one of the two golf courses. 2 Kings bedrooms and third had 2 double beds.  Bathrooms very luxurious.  Great bars and restaurants on property as well as shuttle service to and from.
Manager Response: Hello Joe,   I'm delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay in the Villas! It sounds like you really had an opportunity to explore all the Resort has to offer, and we appreciate you sharing your thoughtful feedback with us. Thank you again for your kind words, and I hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill very soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Great Location - Beautiful Views of Ocean
Summary: We spent 3 days at this beautiful resort, unfortunately it rained through most of the trip but I will definitely stay there again.  The room was well appointed.  They asked before our stay if we required anything extra in the room.  It has a lovely fireplace and shutters to close off the exterior lights in the mornings.  The bed was comfortable, the sofa was down filled and enough chairs to entertain.  Room service was excellent.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you to Pelican Hill! Thank you for your kind feedback about your pre-arrival and room service experience, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back the next time your travels bring you to Newport Beach.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: What a beautiful place to stay.   Everything is top notch.   I would highly recommend.  The villas are wonderful.   The patios are large - The Fireplace romantic.    The food delicious - This is a must stop if you are visiting Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Hi Molly,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! The Villas are such a special way to experience the Resort, and we hope to welcome you back for another romantic Newport Beach getaway soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We stayed in a bungalow room which was spacious and well furnished. All linens and pillows felt like new. Very comfortable bed. Nice large bathroom with amenities. Staff was friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: I'm delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay! Thank you for sharing your thoughtful comments about the Bungalows, and we look forward to serving you again soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We just returned from our stay at Pelican Hill and I can't say I was impressed. We had a travelzoo voucher and paid $380 per night and on my opinion, the price was not justified. The place is nice and relaxing, however, our room was a bit outdated. We stayed at a garden bungalow and the worst thing was the sewage smell every time you have to use water in the bathroom. It was bad but since we were only there for 1 night, I did not want to bother to move. Also right before bedtime, we discovered our heater was broken. We called the front desk and they sent out a guy, which confirmed the above. We were offered to move to a different room or wait for 1.5 hour for a heater to be fixed and we did not want to do either of those, so I asked them for a portable heater, which they happily
Manager Response: Hi Diana,   I apologize that your first visit to Pelican Hill fell short of the relaxing weekend getaway that you were looking forward to, and I understand your frustration with the inconvenient engineering issues you experienced. Our goal is for guests to enjoy every moment of their stay, and I've addressed your concerns with our housekeeping, engineering and front desk teams, so we may continually improve our guests' overall experience. Thank you again for sharing your candid feedback, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a much-improved visit soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: With a shuttle to Crystal Cove beach and local hikes, this becomes a base for enjoying the great facilities onsite or for venturing further afield, knowing the luxury that awaits your return.  A hedonistic resort that has not lost touch with real world needs (catering for all travel categories from families with children to couples), it gives all the comfort one could seek on a break. The place is 40 odd miles south of LA but feels a world removed from the hustle and bustle of the city. The villas are luxurious with even a fireplace for winter.  Worth a stay and one for the bucket list of hotels to experience in life.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and sharing your kind remarks with us. I'm so glad that the Villas offered a relaxing getaway for you, and our team hopes to welcome you back soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Perfect way to celebrate my 30 birthday
Summary: I visited in November with 2 of my friends to celebrate my birthday!  The views and setting are amazing and our ocean view bungalow room was great! I just wish it had an umbrella outside (some did ours didn’t) because it made sitting out there harder.   As all the reviews say, this isn’t a beach resort so don’t come if you are looking for that. We did walk down to the beach both days and it’s super easy and a great way to get some exercise. One morning with walked at crystal cove state park which is gorgeous and then the next morning we ate at the beachcomber (worth the wait) and walked the beach while we waited!!  One of my main reservations is the spa. While the spa is nice and all of us LOVED our treatments, it’s weird to me that there is no outside area at the spa. Last
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your 30th birthday celebrations and for taking the time to share more about your experience with us. I appreciate your candid feedback about the Spa amenities and have addressed your concerns with our Spa Director as well. I wish you all the best in the year ahead and hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: One of the Finest properties I have stayed at.
Summary: I was in Newport Coast for a meeting at Pelican Hill. I booked a few extra days to relax after my meetings . Very glad I did, the Andrea lounge staff was excellent, great Martinis. lunch at the Coliseum was very good with fantastic views of the Pacific. great location to explore the area  or golf at the resort. The Spa is not very large but very nice the people were very pleasant and had a very enjoyable experience. Room was huge with a balcony and two bedrooms very nice. ask for a suite you will not be sorry.  Plenty of room if you have a family.
Manager Response: Hi Dave,   I'm delighted your business travels brought you to Newport Beach and that you had an opportunity to extend your visit to experience more of the Resort. Thank you for your kind words about Andrea, Coliseum Pool & Grill and the Spa, and we hope to welcome you back again!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My family absolutely loved our visit. This property is not only gorgeous but also delivers 5 star treatment. We stayed in a beautiful 3 bedroom villa with an ocean view. Immediately upon arrival our butler Kurt took really good care of us. We order room service and received excellent service from Ignacio and Trino! They were so hospitable and accommodating. Gloria and Maggie in housekeeping took really good care of us. We had an issue with our bathtub and it was immediately rectified. The only issue we had was during check out. Like many guests were trying to checkout in a timely manner. At approximately 12:10pm on Friday 11/23 we received a very rude and nasty phone call from a woman that identified herself as the butler coordinator. She informed us about the resort’s check out
Manager Response: Hi Allison,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your recent family getaway and so graciously sharing your detailed feedback with us. Please know I've taken this opportunity to pass along your kind words to Kurt, Gloria, Maggie, Ignacio and Trino. I'd also like to sincerely apologize that the ungracious call you experienced at check-out tarnished your departure experience, and I look forward to the opportunity to welcome your family back to the Villas in the future!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We recently stayed on two separate weekends and I must say this is the favorite resort in California. From the service to food, golf and scenery it was just spectacular.  My personal favorite is the Pelican Grill after a round of golf and kids do not want to get out of the pool. Staff is super nice and friendly. It seems like lately they stepped it up a notch or two.
Manager Response: Hello Nebojsa,   Thank you for returning to Pelican Hill! Our goal is to continually improve our guests' experience, and I'm pleased to read that your family enjoyed your most recent weekend getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Definitely worth their Five Star Rating
Summary: Nothing but praise for this property.  Stayed in a 3-bedroom villa overlooking the Pacific/Catalina.  The rooms were nicely appointed.  Really enjoyed the separate facilities for the villa’s despite all the screaming kids in the amazing pool and hot tub.  Service at the pool was just okay.  Played both the North and South course. Incredible tracks but not for the average golfer.  Want to recognize John who caddied for us both days.  Can’t remember ever having a more enthusiastic caddie who was so well versed on the nuances of the courses.  Had drinks and appetizers in the Grill after golf both days.  Highly recommend the margarita pizza.  Did room service breakfast all 3 mornings - food was hot and flavorful even though it took nearly 2 hours for delivery on our last day.
Manager Response: Hi Dan,   It was a pleasure to welcome you to Pelican Hill, and I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful and candid feedback with us. Please know I've taken this opportunity to thank John for making your experience that much more memorable, and I've personally addressed your detailed comments with our leadership team, too. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back to Pelican Hill in the future!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The grounds and service at The Resort at Pelican Hill are simply amazing. We stayed at a 2 bedroom North villa and were blown away with the villa size and amenities.  Everything you could want was there.  Check in was extremely smooth and the service was simply the best we have experienced. Everyone encountered was friendly, courteous and exceptionally attentive. If there was anything you needed, you could simply call or text and your request would be met within minutes. The service was faster than NYC takeout delivery!! It almost seemed as if the person was right outside your villa. No joke.  The grounds are beautiful and there were workers everywhere primping the grounds to keep in top shape. The cost was high BUT it was well worth it. I would have no problems recommending the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us in the Villas! I'm glad to read that you enjoyed your visit and that our "Reach Me" texting service was helpful to you as well. We truly appreciate your recommendation and hope that your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: As a hotel owner in Cabo San Lucas My wife and I went to pelican hill after attending a event in San Diego .  Orange County is a big market for us and I have a high school friend, Robert Marusi who is the head of sales and marketing so we wanted to check it out.   We could not have been been more impressed and in awe of the natural beauty and the cleanliness of the whole property.  As hotel owners we can not help but observe every aspect from operations to food and beverage.  The professionally casual manner of the staff and amazing amenities combine to make this a more personalized experience than one would expect from such a large property The golf club sports bar is not to missed as is the spa and and pool but to me the value is in the welcoming nature of the staff and
Manager Response: Hello Lee,   I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback, which is even more meaningful as a fellow hotelier. We're proud to have Robert as a part of our Pelican Hill family, and I've passed along your kind words to him as well. Thank you again for your visit, and we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach very soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We stayed in one of the "bungalows", which was actually an upscale motor inn room. You drive to your room, which is a good size and comfortably decorated to my exact taste. The room is very much like my study at home; identical carpet, very similar limestone in the entry, similar fireplace, and almost identical granite trim. The service is excellent, there is plenty to do on the grounds and in the area. The hiking in the hills and on the beach is first-rate. The service is what you'd expect from a place of this calibre. My wife really enjoyed her spa experience there and the golfing is challenging, but lovely. The food at Andrea is very good, the food at the Coliseum isn't. Definitely get an ocean-view room; the bungalows numbered in the 100 range are the highest on the hill and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your kind review with us! I'm delighted to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your overall stay in the Bungalows, and I have addressed your candid feedback about the Resort's on-property amenities with our leadership team as well. We appreciate your thoughtful insight and hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Yearly trip, always love Pelican Hill
Summary: Great service, amazing food, beautiful views. Top of the line everything. Cant wait for our next trip! Highly recommend eating at andrea and getting your driver to take you to the beach! Theres a restaurant on the sand that is Delicious! It's the place to go!
Manager Response: Hi Natalie,   We're so honored that Pelican Hill has become a part of your annual traditions! I appreciate you graciously sharing your kind review with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable getaway next year - if not sooner!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Too many new staff to make it as Fabulous as it could be.
Summary: The resort has several different levels of service. The complex surrounds a 36 hole golf course that follows the hillside that overlooks the ocean. There are bungalows (least expensive) to 4-bedroom Villas on the north side, associated with several clubhouses, pools, and buildings for meetings and events. As part of an event with 100 attendees, I thought the level of service and attention to detail would be impeccable given the prices and the location. Alas, this was not to be. While there seems to be hundreds of staff on the grounds, pool and housekeeping, there was only 1 person (yes, ONE) at reception. So, you had to wait a really long time to try to get anything done. Check-in is not straight forward, and seems to take inordinately long. We asked no less than 4 people where
Manager Response: Hello Lester,   It was a pleasure to welcome you to Pelican Hill, and I appreciate you sharing your thoughtful review with us. I apologize that the service missteps and delays you experienced upon arrival were a disappointing start to your stay, and I've personally addressed your frustrating check-in experience with our Director of Rooms. Thank you again for taking the time to offer your candid insight, and I hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We had such a first class experience here . The service April, Bennet and Zack provided was second to none, they really made us feel special . Lunch at Andreas was also a real treat . It was truly a wonderful resort to visit and would highly recommend it .
Manager Response: Hello Diane,   Thank you for sharing your kind feedback about April, Bennett and Zack. I'm proud to read that their service made your visit to Pelican Hill that much more memorable, and we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My family of five booked a villa at The Resort at Pelican Hill and our stay was nothing short of spectacular.   Upon pulling up to the villas, we were greeted by our butler who helped bring up our luggage from our private garage. He showed us to our villa and noted all of the wonderful features, amenities and services. Anything we needed, they were just a quick call away. And, they noted they would be happy to run errands for us or do some grocery shopping.   The first day we arrived, the weather was amazing so we decided to enjoy the sunset at the beach. We called for transportation to the beach and they took us to Crystal Cove, just before stopping to load the car up with towels and water. The sunset was amazing and the perfect spot for the kids to run around after spending
Manager Response: Hello Dawkito20,   It was our pleasure to be a part of your special family vacation! I'm so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay in the Villas and had the opportunity to explore all that Pelican Hill and our surrounding Crystal Cove Beach have to offer. We appreciate you sharing your kind feedback with us and look forward to welcoming you all back for another relaxing getaway soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Best place in OC to unwind
Summary: We head out to Pelican Hill every year to unwind and relax.  And as always, the stay was fantastic.  Facilities were great.  Kids found the heated pool the best place to spend their time.  Golf course was not too shaby either.  Different dining options available onsite.   Accommodations are spacious and cozy.    Easy to get around with their shuttles running pretty on time.  Staff were friendly and ready to assist.    Had a relaxing time and definitely worth another visit next year.
Manager Response: Hello Ska912,   I'm honored to read that Pelican Hill has become a special destination for your family and appreciate you taking the time to share your kind feedback on our Tripadvisor pages. Thank you again for your visit, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you all back for another memorable getaway next year.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I stayed in Pelican Hill for a conference meeting. From arrival, did not feel being welcomed. Since the previous night, I stayed with Montage Laguna Beach, their service is much better. Anyway, on the 2nd day around 4:30 pm, when I return my room, I found out one of my shoes (Michael Kors brand) is missing(cannot find anywhere in the room). I then contacted the hotel front office assistant manager, he said he would find out what is going on and call me back(while check-in I left my UK mobile number in their system), during my dinner outside hotel, no one ever called me, I had to call him around 9:30 pm, He said he went to my room, did not find my shoes. Security manager went to my room after him, did not find my shoes either, they did not know what happened but will investigate.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Li,   I sincerely apologize that your visit to Pelican Hill left you disappointed and fell short of the welcoming stay you were looking forward to. Please know the security and comfort of our guests is of the utmost importance to us, and while I'm glad that your shoes were located within your Bungalow, I'm troubled by the inattentive follow-up you experienced. I understand that our Assistant Front Office Manager has unsuccessfully attempted to connect with you, and I've shared a private message with his direct contact information and to confirm your preferred contact details as well. We appreciate you graciously taking the time to bring your concerns to our attention and hope to regain your and your clients' trust for a much-improved return visit soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I recently stayed here for a work conference and was absolutely blown away.  The staff is courteous, the grounds are pristine, and the facility as a whole is just outstanding.  I played golf on both the north and south courses, and both were amazing.  The food is nothing short of delicious as well.  Please make sure to pick up the stuffed pelicans in the gift shop for your kids, I could not grab them upon my departure as the store was closed.  That would have been my only complaint.  The news stand store should have at least access to it at all times in case a guest needs something.  Other than that, outstanding trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!   I'm so glad that your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill and am delighted to read that you enjoyed such a wonderful visit. I apologize that you didn't have the opportunity to purchase a stuffed Murdock while you were with us. I'd like to make sure that you receive one and have sent you a private message with more details. We appreciate your thoughtful feedback and hope to welcome you back very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: They pay attention to every detail - treat yourself and stay here!
Summary: From the moment that Rami checked me into my ocean facing villa, to the great service I received at lunch from Gina and Sebastian French, to the helpful Julia at Concierge... this team makes sure every detail is taken care of.   The villas are breathtaking, beautiful interiors with luxury amenities. Easy to park your own vehicle and their gate system is so smooth. The Poolside grill offers delicious options and the bar at sunset is the place to be.   The infinity pool is a treat and if you are hosting an event on property the events staff are so attentive and helpful. We loved our stay and I would highly recommend you treat yourself and stay in the ocean facing villas.
Manager Response: Hello Neen,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and for taking the time to share such a thoughtful review. Please know I've taken this opportunity to personally thank Rami, Gina, Sebastian and Julia for providing seamless and friendly service during your stay. We appreciate your kind words and hope your travels bring you back to the Villas soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We had an exceptional experience staying at the Pelican Hill Resort. The pool and spa were amazing. The service was great. They went out of their way to accommodate every request we made. I cant wait to return.
Manager Response: Hi Kalliroe,   I'm so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay at Pelican Hill and that our friendly team made your experience that much more memorable. I hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill, and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you again soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I just hung up with the nicest lady in reservations, Nicole Turner. She spent 30 minutes on the phone with me describing all the rooms and all the different rates and packages to help me find the best rate for the time I wanted to come.  The best customer service ever, and I haven’t even set foot on the property yet!   Definitely 5 ⭐️.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your upcoming travels! Please know that I've taken this opportunity to personally thank Nicole for creating such a wonderful reservation experience for you, and we look forward to welcoming you to the Resort soon. Wishing you safe travels!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This hotel is just great, nice location, super nice pool area and nice staff. The only negative was the very slow check-in time (almost 20 minutes) and only 1 person working up the queue. Not understandable why they do not add people in rush hours. Other than that, i can highly recommend this place.  Also, I played the south golf course which is just great.
Manager Response: Hello Andreas,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I apologize for the check-in delay that tarnished your arrival experience and am glad to read that you enjoyed the rest of your stay at the Resort. We appreciate your kind feedback and recommendation and hope to welcome you back soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Pros:  The bungalows are great: very large space, quite nice taste, private terrace with (for mine) great view; weekend breakfast buffet is also quite good - Beautiful view on the ocean and on the golf course
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the Bungalows! We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback with us, and we hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill for another ocean-view weekend soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I have been to The Resort at Pelican Hill now times.  Each time i come the experience gets even better.  The accommodations are top notch and the resorts amenities are second to none.  I have now stayed in a bungalow, and 3/4 bedroom villas.  The staff if very courteous and make you feel like a VIP.  I would reccomend Pelican Hill to honeymooners, anniversary weekends or just a getaway with your family.
Manager Response: Hi Nathan,   Thank you for your kind review! I'm proud to read that Pelican Hill has become a favorite destination of yours and appreciate your recommendation. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back for another relaxing getaway to the Bungalows or Villas very soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Gorgeous resort with amazing views, amenities and service
Summary: We spent a fantastic long weekend at Pelican Hill in a beautiful 3 BR villa. The villa was large and luxurious with a great kitchen, living room and terrace overlooking the Pacific.  FYI - although there are 3 BRs and 3 baths in the villa, one of the BRs is much smaller and its bathroom is across the hall.This wasn't a problem for our family, but it might be if the villa is being shared by 3 couples. We were treated beautifully by the entire staff all weekend. Everyone is so friendly! There is a butler service that is extremely helpful and a shuttle that will pick you up and drive you anywhere around the resort and to the beach - a special thank you to Jeremy and Augie. The Coliseum Pool is great (and huge) but we preferred the quieter pool at the Villas. My husband and son
Manager Response: Hi Carolyn,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your family's weekend getaway. I'm so glad that you enjoyed your stay in the Villas but am even more proud to read that it was our team that made your visit so memorable. Please know I've taken this opportunity to thank Jeremy, Augie and Bobby for their friendly service, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Villas soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Forbes Travel Guide Five Star Deserving for Customer Service
Summary: Pelican Hill Andrea the food and the views, amazing, the service is  Forbes travel guide five star Deserving.  They are able to anticipate your needs before asking, they know how to capture the  service with a flow. Recognizes the reason for dining in my case, birthday celeb  Ash- sweetest with the location of the table  Robert - on top of the orders and didn’t mind photobombing  Moises- felt like family altho we have much different DNA make up   Robert from valet courteous and appearance kept at the most professional ( we don’t know how many of them is named Robert, he is the talller and leaner younger Robert ) Jasmin from the villa- made us feel like really really home with the attention to details, and   Craig from villa valet -guided us to the villa with a car instead of
Manager Response: Hello Rolando,   Happy birthday! Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit to Pelican Hill, especially the team members who made your stay so memorable. I'm glad to read you enjoyed your birthday celebrations and will be sure to pass along your kind words to Ash, Robert, Moises, Robert, Hasmin, Craig, Wilson and Bradley. We hope to welcome you back for another relaxing getaway to the Villas soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This was our second visit, a long weekend out of the Midwest. Everything at Pelican Hill is first class: the rooms, the views, the obars, and mostly the people who work there. With the exception of some slow service poolside, we had absolutely no complaints.
Manager Response: Hello Thomas,   Thank you so much for returning to Pelican Hill for your weekend getaway! I appreciate your loyalty as well as your thoughtful feedback, and we hope to see you again very soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Ok, so the Resort at Pelican Hill is absolutely gorgeous; every architectural detail inside and out was fabulous and so is the landscaping.  The casitas are spacious and super luxurious.  Amenities are amazing.  The pool is stunning and so are the views.  We also loved the location.    However, they need to improve the service to match the level of luxury of the actual space!  Maybe service was a bit off because we were there on the Labor Day weekend and the property was full?  Still they should be used to the crowds by now....    Our check-in host was a bit standoffish.  He finally agreed to upgrade us after initially informing us that there were no upgrades available for Platinum Amex cardholders. He also informed us that we could use the Villa pool. But when we tried to use
Manager Response: Hello Aluor,   Thank you for so graciously taking the time to share your candid feedback with us, and I apologize that your stay at Pelican Hill this Labor Day was anything less than perfect. I'm disappointed by the miscommunications and service delays that you experienced and regret that we fell short of the relaxing getaway you were looking forward to. I'd like to take this opportunity to connect you with our Front Office Manager, so we may personally apologize and hopefully regain your trust for an improved return in the future. I've shared his direct contact information with you in a private message, and we look forward to speaking with you soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Do not visit this resort if you want a relaxing, high-end resort experience
Summary: Do not visit this resort if you want a high-end resort experience. From the moment we arrived, the service was extremely poor and despite attempts by the management to rectify things it never came close to living up to the hype. We were there over the 4th of July weekend and, simply put, it was a mess and I would (at a minimum) stay away over any holiday weekend.  Our visit started off on the wrong foot and continued throughout our five day stay. After promising us an early check-in and telling us to walk around for a while until the room was ready, we returned to the front desk an hour and a half later to find out that the desk clerk told us the wrong thing and we couldn't get in until 4:00 (3 hours later). So, we had wasted that time and were directed to the spa to change if
Manager Response: Hello Amy,   I appreciate you taking the time to share your detailed and candid feedback with us, and I sincerely apologize that your recent stay at Pelican Hill fell short of the relaxing Fourth of July weekend that you were looking forward to. I'm disappointed by the service missteps and miscommunication you experienced, and I regret that our team didn't successfully recover your visit. I'd like to take this opportunity to connect you with our Front Office Manager, so we may personally apologize and hopefully regain your trust for a much-improved return in the future. I've shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to the opportunity to connect with you soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: VILLA  Lovely setting but at $1500 a night for a two bedroom villa (mid week) it's outrageous. They are chronically understaffed (housekeeping showed up at 6pm and by then we were all back in the villa).   BEACH The beach is public and so there's a shuttle but only once an hour which is not often enough. Each shuttle is packed and three of the trips people were sitting on each other's laps (ridiculous).   Once you show up at the beach, you get chairs for free but you have to wander down to the Beachcomber stand (there are no signs and no one from the Resort guiding you.) The Beachcomber restaurant had an hour wait every time we tried so we gave up and clearly there's no preference for Pelican Hill guests (maybe they should think about that).   DINING  The Villa restaurant was
Manager Response: Hello Kathleen,   I apologize that your recent stay in the Villas left you disappointed, and I appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us. Our goal is for guests to enjoy every part of their visit to Pelican Hill, and I've taken this opportunity to personally address your feedback on the Crystal Cove coach service and on-property dining at the Villas and Coliseum Pool & Grill with our leadership team. I'd also like to connect you with our Villas Manager, so we may personally apologize for missing the mark and hopefully regain your trust for a return visit in the future. I've shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to the opportunity to speak with you soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: If you plan on leaving a tip ($), "give the envelope to the person who you want the money to go to."   I was informed by a staff member that almost "EVERY" employee at the Pelican Hills Resort (drivers, housemen, floor supervisors, plant cleaners & other housekeepers) is after the tips that guests leave behind; staff from other areas walk in the rooms shortly after guest leaves and take the money. There should be better control over this, but unfortunately, there isn't!
Manager Response: Hello Danny,   Thank you for taking the time to share your concerns with us, and I apologize for the disappointing conversation you had with a member of our staff. Please know the situation you experienced does not reflect the culture of our team, and I've sent you a direct message, so we may discuss your feedback in more detail. We appreciate your candid insight and look forward to the opportunity to connect with you soon.  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: There is not much more I could possibly say about how wonderful our stay was. We were celebrating our 20th wedding anniversary and decided to kick it up a notch. The resort was immaculate and the staff were friendly and very professional. We were upgraded to a ocean view bungalow and it was a stellar view. The room was immaculate and everything was thought of. Breakfast in the room the next morning was delicious and care was taken by the gentleman serving it, including making the toast in the room.
Manager Response: Congratulations on 20 years of marriage, and thank you for celebrating with us at Pelican Hill! We appreciate you taking the time to share your kind feedback on Tripadvisor, and we hope to welcome you both back for another romantic getaway in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I have stayed at a number of fine properties over the years and this is at the top.  The  resort is beautiful, the service impeccable, and the food delicious.  The only fault I could find is that the WiFi can be slow and does not work on the patios of the bungalows or the main pool.  I stayed here for a week with my wife and 10 year old twins.  We were in a two-queen bungalow which is essentially a vary large hotel room that you park right in front of which is very convenient.  There was a large bathroom, patio, and wet bar.  We had a fridge brought to the room so we could store drinks and snacks for the kids.  The room was easily big enough for a family of four with younger kids.  As mentioned, the resort is beautiful with an upscale ambiance yet family friendly.  The main pool
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your family vacation! I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay in the Bungalows and had the opportunity to spend time by Coliseum Pool as well. Please know I've also taken this opportunity to share your kind words with Andrea's team as well, and we hope that your travels bring you back to Newport Beach very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: The best luxury place to hang out!
Summary: I love this place! The sunset was amazing! the pool was divine! The food is superb!! We will be visiting again this August, and I am sure my family will love it here!   Very close to newport beach and I love the villas and bungalows!
Manager Response: Hello Cindy,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill to be a part of your special family traditions. I'm so proud to read that the Resort has become a special destination for you all, and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We splashed out and treated ourselves to a stay here and we were certainly not disappointed. Our 'bungalow' was amazing. It was roomy spacious well designed. Great choices in the minibar.  A private patio with sun beds and table and chairs. A fire. A marble bathroom with lush soft towels and robes with gorgeous lemon toiletries, everything you could want or expect. Loved the huge circular pool here too as well as the floating bean bag beds. Food venues here were surprisingly quite casual, mostly Italian style, but the food was good. There was  also a separate children's pool, (not that all children chose to use it!) and private cabin TV rooms on the upper pool level. It's quite a big resort so our room was not made up until quite late in the day but house keeping were friendly.
Manager Response: Hello Miss_Adventure09,   It was a pleasure to welcome you to Pelican Hill, and I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your time in the Bungalows! We appreciate your thoughtful feedback about your stay and look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I recently went on a golf retreat at the Pelican Hill Resort in Newport Beach. It is luxury at its finest. I would recommend this resort to anyone looking to get away from the typical holiday fare. This is truly special. Enchanting vistas along the coast, a relatively low key relaxing approach makes this a true gem. The golf is not too bad either if you can hit a straight ball. Overall this resort is an eleven on a scale of one to ten.
Manager Response: Hello jimsI2177UC,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! We appreciate you sharing your kind words and recommendations on Tripadvisor and hope that your travels bring you back to Newport Beach - and our golf courses! - very soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We had a family and friends’ gathering at Pelican Hill.  The grounds and facilities are lovely. The food in The Grill was delicious and staff was quite attentive.  The rooms are spacious but we had stayed in the hotel 7 years ago and there had been no upgrades in the rooms since then. Many of our guests’ rooms had issues- tv problems, poor water pressure in shower, faded furniture.  Rooms were not serviced in a timely manner.  One day our room was not serviced until 6 pm and several guests complained that they did not have turn down service with fresh towels.  Not all of the rooms had outdoor umbrellas and it was too hot to sit outside without any coverage.  For a 5 star hotel I expected more.
Manager Response: Hello Randi,  Thank you for returning to Pelican Hill for your birthday getaway and for taking the time to share your experience with us. I apologize that your group's accommodations left you disappointed and have taken this opportunity to address your concerns about shower water pressure, entertainment systems, furniture conditions and service times with our engineering and housekeeping teams. Your candid feedback allows us the opportunity to continually improve our guests' overall experience, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Pelican Hill again in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Ya better not pass this up!!
Summary: If you stay here and book one of the villas you will not be disappointed. We booked a 3 bedroom villa with beautiful views of the ocean and golf course. Exquisitely appointed rooms with full size kitchen, dinning & living room with even a fireplace. Bose sound systems with all tv’s. Stocked bar and even some complementary goodies to get you started.  Staying at the villas also gets you the entitlement to the villas pool and to a restaurant just for the villas. Of course you can use the main pool as well as dining in the main restaurant which is also out of this world. Your also entitled to your own butler who will arrange anything you need and you’ll not need to drive your CSU within a 10 mile radius because all you have to do is call for the limo and they will pick you up and
Manager Response: Hello Chris,   It was a pleasure to welcome you to the Villas, and we appreciate you sharing your kind review with us. I'm glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to explore so much of the Resort during your visit. We appreciate your thoughtful feedback and hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I love The Resort at Pelican Hill!  I just returned from my 7th visit there and everything was wonderful!  Everyone who works there is fabulous.  They are all very nice and accommodating.  Breakfast in the Coliseum is delicious and the Pelican Grill is a great choice for dinner.  The bungalows are gorgeous and the pool is beautiful.  I am looking forward to returning next summer for my 8th visit!  :)
Manager Response: Hello Sheryl,    We’re so honored that Pelican Hill has become a special destination for you, and I appreciate you taking the time to offer your kind feedback on our pages! I’m delighted to read that you’ve been able to explore all the Resort has to offer, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back for vacation number eight next year!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We had a party of many meet at this super location resort. Generally was a good experience but do need to mention that the restaurants ( all) did let the experience down. Meals at breakfast, lunch, and dinner were set back by very bad timing of meals being bought to the table, items missing from ordered menu. Not what should be experienced from a top rated venue. Also on numerous days we had to call for the room to be made up. But still a great venue, just a few areas to improve on.
Manager Response: Hello Dave,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your group gathering, and I apologize that your on-property dining fell short of the rest of your stay with us. Our goal is to create a dining experience that is both delicious and seamless, and I'm disappointed to read that we missed the mark. Please know I've taken this opportunity to personally address this concern with our Director of Food & Beverage, and I've also shared your feedback with our housekeeping team as well. I truly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us, and we hope to welcome you back for a much-improved visit soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: The best resort in Newport Beach
Summary: The resort is a huge development in Newport Coast with an amazing gulf course and fantastic views of the ocean. Great swimming pool area, not to deep for young kids. The food in the resorts restaurants are amazing. We had a sea view #Bungalow with ocean view which is very good for a family of two adults and  two kids. We will definitely go back again.
Manager Response: Hello Alqahtany69,    Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I appreciate your thoughtful feedback and am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay in the Bungalows - we hope it is the first of many! Please know I’ve shared your kind words with the rest of our team, and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you again soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Our family loved Pelican Hill at least once during the summer months because of the special treatment, excellent food, beautiful facilities and awesome swimming pool. We were welcomed in a very friendly way, and everyone is so helpful. It is a great family friendly resort where you'll always have a great time
Manager Response: Hello Chris,    It was a pleasure to welcome your family to Pelican Hill! We consider it an incredible privilege to be a part of these special memories, and I’m glad to read that you enjoyed a wonderful vacation together. I appreciate your kind feedback, and we look forward to seeing your family again soon!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Beautiful grounds but mediocre service. Pool closed to guests for an entire day of our trip and even pool restaurant had a long wait for guests. I felt like half our experience at the pelican was waiting....waiting for our room, waiting for table. Won’t be back.
Manager Response: Hello Alexandra,    I appreciate your candid feedback and apologize that your service experience at Pelican Hill fell short of the relaxing stay you were looking forward to. While the Coliseum Pool occasionally closes for private events, I regret that our team was not more gracious in notifying you in advance and accommodating you at our Villa pool. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to address your concerns directly with our Coliseum Pool leadership team, and we hope to regain your trust for a much-improved return visit in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: It’s not often that we get to enjoy a circular pool and this one was amazing.  It’s apparently the largest circular pool in the world.  Our room was lovely and the concierge was really helpful.  The spa was relaxing.  The terra stone massage was divine. Didn’t love the crystal cove beach.  Tons of flies, and very crowded.
Manager Response: Hi Nire47,    Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! I’m glad to hear that you especially enjoyed your spa treatment and time by the pool. The Coliseum Pool is definitely one of our most iconic destinations on-property, measuring 136 feet in diameter with more than 1.1 million glass mosaic tiles meticulously laid by hand. Thank you again for your visit and thoughtful review, and we hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We went with our five month old, they provided a crib and extra sheets and everything. Your room is not right on the ocean but there is a beautiful view of it. Room is spacious, the whole resort is beautiful and luxurious. The weather is not that warm to make me want to swim in the beautiful round shaped pool all the time, but it’s a spectacular view from the restaurant right on the side of it. The New Year Eve party is a lot of fun!
Manager Response: Hi Eatlyme, Thank you for celebrating the holiday season at Pelican Hill! It was a pleasure to have your family here with us to ring in 2018, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back to Newport Beach in the future!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed in North Villas so isolated from main hotel and facilities. Great accommodation, huge rooms and living area. Good bathrooms too but you need to drive or call for transport to get anywhere. Villa Clubhouse and pool in walking distance across main road!!. More a vacation rental offering than hotel.  Service at pool just average. A cabana costs a ripoff $400 for the day!! (But you get 4 cans of soda and some potato chips included)   Shuttle bus to Crystal Cove is good and they supply towels, chairs and umbrellas.   Italian restaurant does great fresh pasta and good wine list.   Overall ok but avoid Villas unless you’re prepared for the isolation.
Manager Response: Hello Fred,    Thank you for taking the time to share your candid feedback with us, and I apologize that your recent stay at the Villas was anything less than perfect. I’m especially disappointed that your Cabana experience fell short and have taken this opportunity to personally address your concerns with our pool leadership team. I truly appreciate you graciously sharing your insight, so we may continually enhance our guests’ overall experience, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a much-improved visit in the future.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: What can you say about this resort?  It's ultimate luxury in an unreal location. The rooms are phenomenal and all amenities are top shelf.  Staff couldn't be nicer and the views of the ocean are priceless.
Manager Response: Hi Todd,   I appreciate your thoughtful feedback - it’s great to hear that you enjoyed a wonderful stay! Thank you for your visit, and we hope to welcome you back for another ocean-view getaway soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: I fell in love with Pelican Hill
Summary: Friendly service, April assisted me and because I was celebrating a special occasion she had me stay in King bungalow with ocean view.   Then Antonio surprised me with a bottle of champagne from the concierge desk WOW!   The Coliseum pool is immaculate and has the ocean, golf course and sunsets behind it and is open 24 hours, so I would swim at 9pm and just float looking up at the stars.   Back to my room and it's high ceilings and a window that opens up from the bathtub to the bedroom, where I can watch t.v or gaze at the ocean. The fireplace was on a timer so I would fall asleep to its light and warmth.  I enjoyed the espresso machine and boyee was that some strong stuff!  I took a drive down to South Coast Plaza parked with Valet, did some shopping and then relaxed at the
Manager Response: Hello Krystle,    It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Thank you for celebrating with us at Pelican Hill and for taking the time to share your kind words about April and Antonio. I’m glad to read that you enjoyed a relaxing Bungalow getaway, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travels bring you to Newport Beach!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I stayed in a bungalow. The bungalow was clean; has separate tub and shower, private balcony with lounge chairs table and umbrella. My room was a king with garden view. The view is of the golf course beautiful.  The coliseum pool is within walking distance. They provide a van ride to Crystal Cove if you desire a trip to the beach. Overall the location and accommodations are nice.
Manager Response: Hello Carol,    Thank you for visiting the Bungalows! I’m glad to hear that you enjoyed your Bungalow accommodations and took the opportunity to explore our neighboring Crystal Cove Beach as well. We appreciate your thoughtful feedback and hope to welcome you back soon.    Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We love this Resort and appreciate their attention to detail.  The villas are spacious and they offer car service to all local destinations/restaurants.  Always friendly staff and service is excellent! We only request would be for them to offer weekend Yoga classes from an instructor from Vibes Hot Yoga.
Manager Response: Hello Ali,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback! We agree that it's the little details that make a big difference in a memorable vacation, and we're glad to read you enjoyed your stay at Pelican Hill. Please know that Resort guests are invited to enjoy complimentary daily fitness classes (including several Yoga offerings) at our Spa Movement Studio, and we hope to welcome you back for another getaway very soon!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: we have stayed here five times  we come here on our way back from skiing before we make our way back to Australia.  we have made some great family memories here with my children always recalling good times here. the rooms are very good they are big clean well decorated with luxury bath products. the beds are fit for a queen.  we love the shopping in the area, its only a 20min drive from disneyland which we love to visit every year and the beautiful walks around the beach areas. the resort is beautiful with incredible attention to detail the interiors are also beautiful. the pool and food by the pool are great so is the food and service in the restaurants. the casual cafe is my favourite it has great coffee and pastries. now just for a little negative about 2 years ago they
Manager Response: Hello Ness,    I’m honored that Pelican Hill has become a special destination for your family, and we appreciate your continued loyalty. There’s really so much to explore in Orange County, and I’m glad to read that you’ve enjoyed visiting Disneyland, Crystal Cove and Fashion Island over the years. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to personally share your detailed feedback with our leadership team, and we look forward to welcoming you back for your sixth Pelican Hill vacation soon!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We went to the coffee shop . The place was recommended by my friend. Very nice place to have relaxing time . Friendly and helpful staff. I  enjoyed the beautiful view. Loved the coffee and icecream.  It looked like travelers were enjoying alot too. Very nice pool and resort.
Manager Response: Hello Maryam,    Thank you for stopping by Caffe & Market for gelato and coffee! I appreciate your kind review, and we hope to welcome you back soon, so you have the opportunity to explore all that Pelican Hill has to offer!    Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: What a gorgeous location, sitting high on Pelican Hill overlooking Newport Beach and the Pacific Ocean. Two beautiful and challenging Tom Fabio golf courses await. I prefer the South course which wends its way down to the beach and back up. Vistas are lovely and the terrain is astounding. The fairways are large and forgiving but the greens are well-guarded by sand bunkers. I found the greens to be in excellent condition. The resort has two large pools and hot tubs. Each pool is bordered by comfortable cabanas.  There are various dining alternatives and the food is excellent. Try the lovely spa and get a great massage. K
Manager Response: Hello Cary,    Thank you for taking the time to share such wonderful feedback about your recent stay at Pelican Hill! I’m glad to hear that you had an opportunity to enjoy our golf courses, pools and on-property dining, and we hope that your travels bring you back to the Resort soon!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Fanatastic experience...if you don’t care about golf
Summary: The property, rooms, amenities, and service all live up to their reputations...a true five-star operation. The golf is a different story. Hotel guests get no preference on tee times; the green fees are over $300; the courses are frequently rented out for outside events; and the shag carpets in a Motel 6 room roll better than the greens. So, leave your sticks at home, and enjoy a world-class resort in a beautiful locale.
Manager Response: Hi Steven,    I appreciate your candid feedback about your recent stay at Pelican Hill and apologize that your experience at the Golf Club didn’t live up to the rest of your visit. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to share your concerns with our Golf General Manager, and we have taken steps to continually improve course conditions and green maintenance throughout the summer months. Thank you again for your thoughtful review, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We went 3 couples for 4 days. The staff is great, friendly and will do anything for you. The rooms are gorgeous, clean and very well taken care off. The restaurants are also great. We will be back. Thanks to the management for such a pleasant trip.
Manager Response: Hi Jose,    Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback on our Resort and Andrea Pages. I’m glad that you enjoyed a wonderful couples’ trip, and we appreciate you choosing Pelican Hill for such a special getaway. We truly appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back to Newport Beach very soon!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The service at Pelican Hill is fabulous   The pool menu is extremely limited.   Food overall at the resort is mediocre.   You are paying a surcharge.  on your room charge for tips, so there is no reason to tip daily.   Everyone at the resort is helpful.  I would definitely go back
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and sharing your candid feedback with us. I apologize that your dining experiences on-property fell short of the rest of your time with us, and I’ve taken this opportunity to share your concerns about the pool menu with our culinary team. We truly appreciate your insight, and I hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Spent 2 wonderful nights at Pelican Hill.  Loved the bungalow and our ocean view. Worth the extra expense.  I really enjoyed the size of the bungalow and the quality of it.  Huge bathroom (large walk in shower was a favorite), fire place and patio with a view over the golf course out to the Pacific Ocean.    The beds are so comfy but more on the softer side (FYI).    I did use the fitness center each morning.  Easy to walk to and a nice facility.    Parking was right in front of the bungalow.    We ate off property, didn’t go to pool or spa.  We enjoyed golf and our room.    Very nice resort with excellent amenities, friendly staff and spectacular views.
Manager Response: Hi Janean,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your summer getaway! I’m delighted to read that you enjoyed your Bungalow, and we hope to welcome you back for another ocean-view escape in the future.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We have visited the Orange County area many times and have stayed at pretty much all the various high-end hotels. This trip we decided to try pelican hill and stay in a villa. The villa area is in a separate area and entrance from the main hotel. It has its own clubhouse, pool, restaurant and facilities but you can also go to the main hotel area.   The resort is spectacular with well appointed villas that are great for families. The pools/landscaping are beautiful and the restaurants are very good. You may even run into LA celebrities or sports figures while there. What truly separates this resort from others is the service. While many resorts tout their great service, we found pelican hill service to be exceptional. Not only do the staff go out of their way but they truly seem
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your candid feedback about your recent stay with us! While I’m glad that you enjoyed your time on-property, I apologize that your trip to Crystal Cove Beach left you disappointed. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to share your concerns with the beach stand team, and we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We decided to go there for a weekend just to relax. We really enjoyed the food at the restaurants. But most of all, we appreciated the unfailing cordiality and competence of the staff. We stayed in a nice townhouse with an ocean view. It was a nice change from our apartment in Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for making Pelican Hill your home-away-from-home for the weekend! I’m so glad you enjoyed your visit but am even more proud to read that it was the friendly service from our team that made your stay so memorable. We hope to see you again soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Wonderful staycation w/ an ideal way to take in a quintessential Southern California beach
Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed a little staycation at this luxurious resort.  Chose this property in part due to its oversized bungalows with lots of privacy, as well as its terrific access to one of the nicer beaches around.  Although the resort sits on a bluff and not immediately near the beach, it runs a regular shuttle service to Crystal Cove only a few minutes away.  This allows you to get to and from a great beach without the hassle or cost of parking.  And, friendly/helpful beach boys will set up (complimentary to resort guests) beach chairs and an umbrella for you once you arrive.  Makes you feel really pampered.  [Hot tip: if you go to Crystal Cove, build in time to eat at The Beachcomber Cafe--great breakfast with incredible views, decently priced.  Worth the wait.]   We used a
Manager Response: Hello Dan,    Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your recent staycation and for taking the time to share such a thoughtful review of your time with us. I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your overall stay in the Bungalows and apologize for the errors you experienced with your Nespresso and Bose sound system, as well as the service misstep at valet.
