Summary: Get ready for ROYAL TREATMENT from arrival to departure. Check in is extremely courteous & helpful specially if you have never been there, but also welcomed with open arms if you are returning. Bungalows are extremely nice very comfortably and adequately furnished. Amenities are wonderful. Food variety at various venues are outstanding Not to be missed for any celebration
Manager Response: Hello Sam,    Thank you so much for sharing your reviews on our Resort, Andrea and Pelican Grill pages! I appreciate your thoughtful feedback and am glad to read you enjoyed a wonderful stay in the Bungalows. We hope to welcome you back for another relaxing - and delicious! - return to Pelican Hill very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: One of rhe more luxurious hotels I stay at.. View...food..service... People...all amazing.. Plus a world vlass golf venture.. Close to fashion center mall..a high end mall with all the great retailers.. Wonderful venue.
Manager Response: Hello Fjferaco,    Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I’m delighted you enjoyed experiencing all the Resort has to offer and stop by Fashion Island as well. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your kind review with us and hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed in a two bedroom villa.  Villa itself is superb, with extra touches such as milk, cream, tea, coffee in the fridge, laundry supplies etc.  This is an overtop resort which can't seem to get the small things right.  The resort is huge -- you need to get shuttles to get from one part to another.  And that is where this resort started to fall apart.  We went to Andrea for dinner the first night.  And then waited at least 30 minutes to get a shuttle back to the villa.  We could have driven the car but were assured that the shuttle service was the way to go.  Not.  Then when we returned and the shuttle driver had left, the keys would not work for the villa.  And then for servicing the villa, pre check in, they ask when you want your room serviced so we said 1 to 3 (the choice
Manager Response: Hi AnotherVacationPls,    I apologize that your recent visit to the Villas was anything less than perfect. I’m disappointed by the unacceptable transportation and housekeeping delays you experienced and regret that we fell short of the seamless and relaxing visit you were looking forward to. I’d like to connect you with our Villas General Manager, so we may personally apologize, and I’ve shared his direct number with you in a private message. Thank you again for sharing your candid feedback with us, and we hope to welcome you back for a much-improved stay soon.  Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We had several dinners here.  The service was very good.. Our waitress was new but did a nice job.The food and drinks were enjoyable!  The crabs cakes were great! The beautiful pool view is wonderful. We had dinner with a special friend the second dinner. She had a great experience too !  We liked the cone ice cream desserts also. We will return.   The valet men are always so helpful, nice and informative!
Manager Response: Hello Janet,    Thank you for visiting us for dinner! I’m so glad to hear you enjoyed a delicious meal at Coliseum Pool & Grill and will pass along your kind words about the crab cakes to our culinary team. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We went with our son’s family and his in laws. We had two villas in the 4600 section. The views of the ocean and golf course were spectacular. Our villas, the hallways, elevator and stairwell were absolutely spotless!  This is something that you rarely see anymore. The staff was so friendly and ready to help. I do think the concierge needs to work harder at the recommendations she makes. Sending guests to drive to Huntington Beach for a farmers market/carnival isn’t a great idea for people who traveled all the way from the east coast. The main fitness center was well equipped however being we were there during June gloom, it was a bit overcrowded. I’m sure that’s not the case the rest of the year. Great leadership where cleanliness and customer service is concerned. The manager
Manager Response: Hello Terry,   I’m so glad that your family travels brought you to Pelican Hill, and I thank you for your thoughtful review. I especially appreciate your insight on your concierge experience and have addressed your feedback with our guest experience team. We hope to welcome you back to Newport Beach very soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Rooms were great- cabana not so great
Summary: We stayed here after our Cabo trip was cancelled due to hurricane Bud.  The bungalow was amazing. Food- loved it all.  Service at pool and bar was consistajtky good.Our biggest disappointment was the 500.00 a day cabana.  Walls, table, armoir were dirty, tv was old, bose did not even have bluetooth and was unusable.   Cabana was not worth the money at all.  Dirty and overpriced.  I was sad to have wasted the money.
Manager Response: Hi Denise,    It was a pleasure to welcome you all for your family vacation, and I’m glad to read you enjoyed a relaxing stay together - especially after having to change your travel plans. I apologize that your experience at the Coliseum Pool & Grill cabanas wasn’t equally wonderful, and I’d like to connect you with our Pool Operations Manager, so we may personally apologize for falling short. I’ve shared his personal phone number with you in a private message, and we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Beach soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We returned from a 4 night stay at Pelican Hill. I went back and forth between saying our stay was excellent and just very good for a few reasons.  Check in time is 4. We arrived at 6:30 and were told our room was not ready. I'm not sure what would have happened if we had arrived at 4. Would we have had to wait 2 hours to get in?  We only waited about 15 min and they gave us a credit of $100. The room is very nice, large  and the view is wonderful. I agree with a few reviews that some of the furniture could use some updating. The back of the chairs are worn. The chairs outside were dirty.  The day before we left we left our room at 8 and didn't get back until 5 to find our room had not been cleaned. I had to call the front desk.  We sat by the pool one afternoon and told the
Manager Response: Hi skv13,    Thank you so much for starting your summer with us at Pelican Hill and for graciously taking the time to share your detailed feedback. Our goal is for you to enjoy every part of your stay at the Resort, and I apologize that your housekeeping service and dining at Coliseum Pool and Andrea left you disappointed. Please know that I’ve taken this opportunity to personally address your comments with our Director of Food & Beverage and Housekeeping Manager, so we may continually improve our guests’ experiences. I truly appreciate your insight and look forward to seeing you again soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Visiting this place every year expecting better
Summary: We visit this place every year since 2010 as a family coming from Saudi Arabia. My husband love this place so much!! Every year i send them to change their soft uncomfortable  mattress on the bed or at least find a solution!! Its the worst bedding ever and so bad for the back !! Last year i slept my whole vacation on the floor !!it was sooo bad !!  While me and my husband where watching a movie at night in the villa a big rat came out from the back of the cabinet !! This was the most discusting thing that happened ever to me!! They just send 2 men who came and stayed all night trying to get it out and nothing happened .i slept that day openening my eyes !!
Manager Response: Hello Abeermohd,   Thank you so much for your family’s continued loyalty to Pelican Hill over the past eight summers, and I apologize that your most recent stay in the Villas was anything less than perfect. I’d like to connect you and your husband with our Villas General Manager, so we may discuss your concerns in more detail and better personalize your experience in the future. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to the opportunity to speak with you soon.  Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Nice view on a clear day, very reasonable prices.  Monika our server went above and beyond.  I had a grilled salmon salad, others had a burger with yummy garlic fries. Elegant feeling with a beautiful ocean view. I highly recommend making reservations.
Manager Response: Hi Mamiefiere,    I appreciate your thoughtful review! We’re proud to have great team members like Monika, and I’ve made sure to personally thank her for taking such wonderful care of your party. We look forward to welcoming you back to Coliseum Pool & Grill for another ocean-view visit soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I stayed multiple times at Pelican Hill Resort but this time my stay was below my expectations for a 5 star resort. I stayed in other 5 star resorts and this time my visit to Pelican Hill Resort was unacceptable and maybe 2 stars. For the price that I paid, there are other choices I could make.  It started with the check-in waiting 20 min in line and then never text to inform me that the room was ready. I had to wait another 20 min in line to get the room keys. Even the itinerary that they gave me upon check-in had wrong date and time for the spa reservations. They never cleaned the room after we called and told them that will be at the spa for 5 hours. They offer to clean it after we called again but I would not sacrifice my relaxation for their screwup. At the Coliseum pool
Manager Response: Hello,    I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us, and I’m disappointed to read that your most recent stay at Pelican Hill fell short of the visits you’ve enjoyed in the past. I apologize for the unacceptable delays and service missteps you experienced and regret the inconvenience this caused throughout your stay. Please know I am addressing your detailed concerns with our Spa and Coliseum Pool & Grill teams, and I’d like to connect you with our Front Desk Manager as well. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we hope to regain your trust for a much-improved return in the future.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: This is still my favorite place to go, but it could use some updating
Summary: Pelican Hill (PH) is my home away from home.  The service is always great and staying in a villa, it's always quiet.  This last trip the resort was at capacity which is something that I usually don't experience.  A lot of families were at the pool but there was still plenty of room and we had no issue getting chairs.  Away from the common areas it was quiet as always.  Service on this trip was outstanding despite it being so busy.  There had been some repair work done to the villas over the last few months.  I was hoping that they were getting some much needed updating.  Dont get me wrong, the villas are very nice and comfortable, just getting worn.  It would be nice to have bluetooth capabilities for the entertainment system instead of the old cable connection.  Especially with
Manager Response: Hi ChiTown69,    Thank you again for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill! I apologize that your recent stay in the Villas fell short of your previous visits to the Resort. Your candid feedback allows us to continually improve our guests’ overall experience, and I’ve personally addressed your feedback on the Villa furniture and in-room entertainment systems with our Director of Engineering. I’d also like to connect you with our Villas General Manager, so we may personally apologize for missing the mark on your last trip and better anticipate your next arrival. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: First time staying at this resort; we typically stay at the Ritz but they were sold out.  Stayed in an ocean view bungalow.  Really enjoyed the coliseum pool and having your own dedicated parking spot.  Didn't enjoy Crystal Cove Beach as felt it was too crowded.  Would definitely consider staying here again!
Manager Response: Hello Eiszel,    Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I’m so glad you enjoyed your first stay in the Bungalows, and we hope to welcome you back for many more relaxing getaways in the future. We truly appreciate your feedback and look forward to serving you again soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I have stayed at this resort several times over the past few years-- and have contributed a review after one of those earlier stays.  Unfortunately, a slow but marked decrease in quality over time is now evident.  While the location is still as stunning as always, and the villas are spacious, the quality of service has been on a downward slope, and a seeming lack of attention to customer expectations more evident.  It starts with the check in process-- where late in the day villas are not ready for check in, and waiting customers are kept hostage to misleading ETA's; even delayed airlines are getting better at being honest with passengers when delayed flights will actually take off.   The villas themselves, while nice and spacious, are obviously beginning to show signs of aging.
Manager Response: Hello,    I’m sorry that your most recent stay at Pelican Hill fell short of your expectations. I understand your frustration with not only the delay at check-in, but also the miscommunication you experienced. Please know I’m addressing your concerns with our front desk team, so we may provide a more gracious check-in experience for our guests. We truly appreciate your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill, and I’d like to connect you with our Villas General Manager, so we may personally apologize and better anticipate your next visit. I’ve shared his personal phone number in a private message, and we hope to welcome you back for a much-improved stay soon.   Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My Wife and I loved our stay at the Pelican Hill Resort. From the grand entrance, to the immaculate rooms, it was truly a treat and a special experience.  -Top rated restaurants at the resort -Golf in your backyard -Scenic views of the coast -Spacious and private suites -Excellent customer service  Cassidy in management truly made this stay a special experience and we can't wait to to return next time we're in OC.
Manager Response: Hello Sal,   I’m so glad your travels brought you to Pelican Hill and appreciate you sharing your thoughtful feedback with us. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to personally share your kind words with Cassidy as well, and we look forward to welcoming you both back for another getaway soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Nice grounds and nice service...when you can get it.
Summary: The high-lights and low-lights of the other reviews are mostly accurate.  The grounds are nice and the service is hospitable.  The food is good.  For our group the real missed opportunity here though is the embarrassing (and striking) lack poolside service.  It's pretty crazy.  We experienced a 2+ hour wait for food and almost a 45m wait for a canned beer.  Over the course of an hour or two dirty dishes and empties piled up everywhere in an unsightly mounds every 20 feet or so.  It got so bad we saw a guest who's in the industry bussing the pool area and conscripting staff to help her.  She was very low key and kind, and the whole thing was incredible to watch:  She said when she went into the service area there were more than a half dozen staff standing around talking.  Nobody
Manager Response: Hi Datuber,    I apologize for your inexcusable experience at Coliseum Pool & Grill yesterday and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. Our goal is for guests to enjoy every part of their stay at Pelican Hill, and I’m disappointed that your time at the pool fell so short of the attentive and gracious experience we aim to create. Please know that I’ve addressed your party’s concerns with our management team and would also like to connect you with our Director of Food & Beverage, so we may personally apologize for missing the mark. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to the opportunity to connect with you soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We have booked a 2 bedroom villa several times at Pelican Hill. It’s our favorite place to “staycation”. The villas are HUGE and have everything a family could need: nespresso, beverages stocked in the fridge, free laundry, the list goes on. The villa kid pool is the perfect size for toddlers and there’s a great free shuttle to the beach. It’s easy to get rides around the property in Mercedes SUVs, you really never need to leave! Outside of the price $$$$ you really can’t go wrong.
Manager Response: Hi Mnmorage,    Thank you for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill! We’re honored that the Villas have become a special getaway from your family and appreciate you sharing your kind feedback with us. We hope to welcome you all back for another relaxation staycation this summer!   Warm regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed in the 2 bedroom villas which was nice. Very elegantly appointed and clean. However , went to hang out at the coliseum pool , which was loud with very poor service. The pool attendant claimed that there were no shady loungers  available , yet many of the umbrellas were down and not being used. In addition, there were vacant loungers that were left with dirty towels- while the pool attendants were just standing around. I ended up changing the lounger myself under a shady umbrella. Terrible service at the coliseum pool for a five star resort!  They need to improve over there. Villa pool service  is much better when we went over there the next day.
Manager Response: Hi Luxury321,    Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your stay in the Villas, I apologize that your time at Coliseum Pool wasn’t equally wonderful. I’ve taken this opportunity to personally address your concerns with our pool attendant team and management, so we may ensure that our guests enjoy all aspects of their stay with us. We appreciate your visit and candid insight and hope to welcome you back to the Villas soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Property is spectacular and services were very good.  Casitas are spacious with great bathrooms and gas fireplace.    Lanai has nice view of golf course but outdoor furniture could use updating. North and south golf courses are challenging and expensive when you throw in fore caddy.  Food was good.  Property is pretty spread out but they do have shuttle busses to run you around.  Need a car to get to the nicer beaches.  Did enjoy eating at Beachcomer at Crystal Cove that shuttle will take you to and from hotel.   Luxury property but for the money, I’ve had better value at other properties like the Ritz and Four Seasons.
Manager Response: Hello James,    I’m glad your travels brought you to Pelican Hill and thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate your candid feedback, and I’ve taken this opportunity to address your detailed comments with the rest of our leadership and golf team, so we may continually improve our guests’ overall experience. Thank you again for your visit, and we hope to serve you again soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We had a rainy visit.  This did keep us from laying out by the pool.   Our villa had a really pretty view looking over the water.  This property is not right on the water, so keep that in mind.   We loved how the bathroom/tub opened up into the room. Loved the huge soaking tub.  Bring bubble bath/salts for extra enjoyment.  Love the balcony, laid out on the chaises when it was not raining.   The fridge/goodie drawers were filled with a good array of treats and drinks including mini alcohol bottles.  Loved that they had a deck of cards included.  The staff was on point no matter where we were at the resort.   Meeting and often anticipating our needs before asked.    The golf course is stunning and it appears difficult based on the play that we watched during our visit.  The pool
Manager Response: Hello Deana,   We appreciate you graciously sharing such thoughtful feedback on our Tripadvisor pages! I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your getaway to the Villas and had the opportunity to explore all the Resort has to offer. Please know I’ve shared your kind words about your dining experiences with our culinary teams as well. Thank you again for your visit, and we hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill very soon - including a spa day!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: One of our favorite resorts in California. Beautiful grounds, huge rooms, wonderful spa and great food. Most importantly the service is impeccable always. We had room 111 super close to lobby and pool.
Manager Response: Hello Karina,    We’re honored that Pelican Hill has become a favorite destination of yours! Thank you for sharing your kind review with us, and we look forward to seeing you again very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Beautiful hotel and setting in a picturesque location. Hotel offers amazing amenities and restaurant choices. Also close to Crystal Cove beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! Our goal is for guests to enjoy every moment of their stay at Pelican Hill, and I'm glad to read you had the opportunity to experience Pelican Hill's on-property dining, as well as our neighboring Crystal Cove Beach. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Failure to execute on service pledge
Summary: A five star resort starts and ends with SERVICE.  You pay more to get a certain level of service, drink & food prices are higher, room rates are higher, you are prepared to tip more, you understand and expect that.  So you become very disappointed, very quickly when service promises are not delivered. Just like a previous review, “Disappoints, even on the basics”, we were consistently let down.   To start, even before we arrived, Villa Concierge email requesting when we would like our room serviced, we requested between 11am - 1pm.  Four night stay, we NEVER had our room serviced before 4pm, even after repeated calls.  If you can’t deliver the service promise, why ask guests when they want their room serviced? Next, pool service.  One day we had great service, Bri was awesome,
Manager Response: Hello Buckster007,    I apologize for the service missteps you experienced during your visit to Pelican Hill and appreciate you graciously taking the time to share them with us. The challenges you describe don’t reflect the attentive and friendly service we aim to provide for each of our guests, and I understand the disappointment this caused for you and your wife. Please know that I am personally addressing your concerns with our housekeeping and Coliseum Pool & Grill teams, and I’d also like to connect you with our Villas General Manager, so we may personally apologize. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we hope to regain both of your trust for a much-improved return in the future. Summary: This resort is top notch luxury without a doubt!  Beautiful, luxurious villas, grounds and landscaping situated over 500 acres in the  hills overlooking the glorious Newport Coast...perfect location, beauty beyond compare, lovely coastal views!  The Mediterranean themed resort reminded me of wealthy villas in ancient Rome, especially with all the lovely olive trees and architecture.  Our large two bedroom villa w/ kitchen was beautiful and spectacular..even came with our own butler and a fridge filled with beer, San Pelligrino water, some milk, half and half..nice touches. Kitchen was fully stocked w flat wear, glasses, plates, condiments, etc.  Wine, champagne etc was there in mini bar if one wanted to partake for a charge.  The pools, spectacular, service was wonderful, we got
Manager Response: Hello Jan,    Thank you for visiting us at Pelican Hill! I’m so glad that you enjoyed your Villa accommodations and also had the opportunity to explore all of the beautiful beaches and scenery surrounding the Resort. We appreciate you taking the time to share your kind feedback with us on Yelp and Tripadvisor and hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill very soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We were thrilled to have the opportunity to return with our family (me, my wife & our 2 high school aged boys) for a Memorial Weekend vacation.  No schedules for school, sports, kids' part-time jobs, etc....time to RELAX!    Everything has been fantastic -- food, service, resort property facilities, and amazing ocean views!  This is one of our very favorite places to visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill to be a part of your family’s special Memorial Day weekend! I’m glad to read that your time together was relaxing and have shared your thoughtful feedback with the rest of our team as well. We truly appreciate your insight and hope to welcome you back for another special family getaway very soon!   Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Although I was only at Pelican Hill for two nights, I had a very enjoyable business trip.   We hosted a golf event as part of our weekend’s festivities and it went off without a hitch. In addition, the banquet team were fantastic and complemented the quality of the food with their thoughtful service.  Lastly, I would like to thank Zarko, Milos and Linda for their exceptional warmth and hospitality. Pelican Hill is very blessed to have them taking care of their guests. Anticipatory service is always hard to deliver on, and these three do it with ease.  Thank you for a wonderful weekend in paradise. I can’t wait to return!
Manager Response: Hello thetroglodytes,    I’m so glad that your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill and that you enjoyed a wonderful weekend in the Villas. Thank you so much for your thoughtful feedback, and please know I’ve taken this opportunity to share your kind words with our banquets staff and to personally thank Zarko, Milos and Linda for their hospitality. We are proud they are a part of our Pelican Hill team! We truly appreciate your visit and look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I'm currently two nights into a four night stay at an Ocean View villa at Pelican Hill. The experience has been frustrating and disappointing.   Please note that I am not a persnickety person (I hardly write reviews at all, and have never written a negative one), and am a very frequent traveler. For personal trips, I like to stay at luxury hotels: Aman, Four Seasons, St. Regis, Lotte, etc. For business, I'm very happy to stay at Best Western or Holiday Inn Express. What matters to me is a clean room, and service commensurate with the price point and what the hotel advertises.  The experience we've had at Pelican Hill would be disappointing even if it came from a Best Western.   I'm staying here with my husband and my 5 month old daughter. My husband is in the area for work, and
Manager Response: Hello CaliTravelers,  Thank you for sharing your review, and I apologize that your family getaway with us has been so disappointing. Please know that our entire resort team aims to provide exceptional experiences for all of our guests, and I regret that we have fallen short of this standard during your visit. I understand that our rooms director connected with you to address your concerns. In particular, you may now be aware that the resort has a refresh currently underway for the carpet, upholstery and several other aspects of the accommodations. We hope that we'll have a chance to regain your trust and welcome you back to enjoy the enhancements once they're complete. Thank you for taking the time to share your candid feedback.  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I've stayed here multiple times on business-related travel.  I've been lucky enough to stay in the villas.  They are spacious, comfortable, and very "Californian."  They strike a great balance between luxury and cozy.  The beds are amazingly comfortable with great linens.  The villas have a great set up for working guests - with great desk layout, charging stations, and the like.  I love the fireplaces in the rooms and the spacious bathrooms.  I love the bath products, and the water pressure in the shower.  The grounds are gorgeous and exceedingly well-maintained.  I loved being able to walk to and along the beach.  The property is massive as are all of the spaces - the restaurants, conference rooms, etc.  Guests can call for pick ups in golf carts or SUVs which take you to
Manager Response: Hello gemellor,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on our review page and directly with our management team. I’m glad that you enjoy the Bungalows and ease of getting around the resort. I'm following up on our hostess team's approach to seating at Coliseum Pool & Grill to address how we may better accommodate guests who dine with us for business meetings and prefer more privacy away from other tables. Thanks again for sharing your helpful suggestions with us, so we may improve in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The hotel is beautiful and spacious. The bungalows were very well appointed and the service was very good. Only thing was during a busy time you can't get a shuttle to the conferance rooms from your bungalos and it was faster to walk it from your room. Otherwise a great resort.
Manager Response: Hello Gordon,   Thank you for your visit and your kind review! I’m glad to read that you enjoyed the resort, and I will follow up with our management team about the transportation delay you experienced. We look forward to welcoming you back again!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This resort is over 500 acres, just massive.  However, it seems all the rooms (villas) are close to the main building.  However, they have cars and shuttles to move you around to golf and to the restaurants.  The room was very clean and quite large.  Separate sitting area and a private patio.  Most rooms do not have an ocean view.  Golf course is very challenging, not an easy open course.  Staff were very attentive...you will not find better service anywhere.  Food was good for a hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review with us! I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your recent visit to Pelican Hill and am proud to know that our team made your stay that much more memorable. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to share your feedback with the Resort's leadership team, and we hope your travels bring you back to Newport Coast soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: GREAT TIMES @ THE RESORT AT PELICAN HILL W/ GREAT FRIENDS!!
Summary: I traveled to the Pelican from Scottsdale, AZ for a girls weekend & to celebrate my 50th.  My friends surprised me and booked an incredible 2 bedroom residence @ The Resort at Pelican Hill.  We had an awesome weekend & wish we could have stayed longer!!  The staff was awesome and I can't say enough about Karey who waited on us while we were pool side which was pretty much the whole time we were there.  I was impressed by the great service & the professionalism!!  The restaurant service was also exceptional & the food was delish!  We didn't want to leave!! We will definitely be back!!  Until next time, Bobbie Ruth
Manager Response: Happy Birthday, Bobbie Ruth!    Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill to be a part of your milestone celebrations and for taking the time to share your thoughtful review with us. I’m delighted to read that you and your friends enjoyed a wonderful weekend in the Villas, and I’ll be sure to personally thank Karey for making your stay that much more memorable. We appreciate your kind words and hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Pelican Hills Resort was the site for a family friend’s’ wedding weekend and the setting was lovely.  We stayed on property in the Villas, which are self contained units on manicured grounds across the road from the main resort property.  If you have children and / or another couple it is very convenient to have the villa amenities which includes butler services.  Our butler Travis was exemplary.  We were venturing off property during the daytime and found the resort concierge services very helpful, thank you Kyle—  This is a place to hang out in beautiful surroundings with family and friends- it is expensive but it is Southern California 💚
Manager Response: Hello Jeanne,    I’m so glad your friend’s wedding celebrations brought you to Pelican Hill and that you enjoyed a wonderful stay in the Villas! We appreciate your thoughtful feedback, and I’ve taken this opportunity to thank Travis and Kyle for being such a memorable part of your time with us. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort very soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: nice grounds, but really uptight and uppity guests
Summary: If you are a big golfer and want to go shopping or sit at a pool, this is a great place for you.  If you want to have a relaxing vacation around people that aren't pretentious, skip it.  Try the Ritz in Dana Point for views and a beach front setting.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your candid feedback with us. Our goal is to create a friendly and inviting atmosphere for every guest, and I apologize that your stay with us left you disappointed. We appreciate your thoughtful insight and hope to welcome you back for a much-improved visit soon.  Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: In sum, both my husband and I were very disappointed in the service we received at the hotel over the weekend. Our stay started off great with a very pleasant check-in experience. The gentleman at the counter (I think named Zachary?) was very friendly and helpful. He was able to get us an upgraded room that was immediately available (pleasantly surprised since it was only 9 AM). I had called the Wednesday before checking in to request a crib and then also told Zachary we needed crib in the room and he assured us this wasn’t a problem and would be sent up right away. We decided to go have breakfast first and the service was exceptional, food was also great. We got to our room an hour and a half later to find that the crib was not there. We called the front desk and were told it
Manager Response: Hello Mrs. Glass,  I apologize that your stay this weekend left you and your husband disappointed. I understand how much you were looking forward to enjoying a relaxing California getaway, and I regret that we fell so short of the experience we aim to create for each of our guests. I’ve taken this opportunity to address your concerns with our housekeeping, in-room dining and Villa Clubhouse teams, and our Villas Manager would also like the opportunity to connect with you to personally apologize. I’ve shared his direct contact information with you in a private message, and we hope to regain your family’s trust for a much-improved visit in the future.  Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This was our second stay at the resort. Our last stay was about  three years ago. Official check in is 5pm which seems crazy as I've never heard of a check in that late before.  We arrived at 4:30 to check in but were told our room was not ready. They took my cell number and said I would get a text very soon but no later than 5:00 letting me know my room was ready. 5:30 came and I still hadn't received a text. I returned to check-in only to find 12-15 people in line waiting to check in.  After waiting a few minutes I asked a bellman to find a manager. The manager came to speak with me and I told him the situation. After another 20 minutes of waiting I finally got my room (now 6:00). The manager upgraded us from a 2 bedroom villa to a 3 bedroom villa but we were put in the villas
Manager Response: Hello McCormick Family,    I appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback with us and sincerely apologize that your stay at Pelican Hill this weekend fell short of your first visit. I understand your frustration over the check-in delays you experienced and am disappointed that we were unable to recover your family’s experience more graciously. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to address your detailed comments with our Coliseum Pool, valet and housekeeping leadership teams, so we may improve upon the areas you’ve mentioned. I’d also like to connect you with our Director of Rooms, so we may personally apologize and hopefully regain your trust for a much-improved return visit in the future. I’ve shared his details with you in a private message, and we look forward to connecting with you soon.  Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: A little less luster, this time
Summary: This is my second visit to the Villas at Pelican Hill.  This time, vs the previous time 2 years ago, the service was just a bit off.  Nothing terrible, but just down a notch from last time.  Housekeeping that didn't provide additional towels for 2 days in a row, and then finally provided a stack of 8 extras on the last day (way too many).  Pool staff that was consistently a couple of steps behind.  Table service in bar and restaurant that didn't address the table for an extended period of time after seating...enough so that we were looking around for someone to at least greet us and provide water.  Again, it wasn't bad...but last time was SO GOOD.  It's more the level of service I'd expect at a moderately priced property, not the level of luxury that PH can provide.
Manager Response: Hello,    I apologize that your return stay to the Villas fell short of the wonderful first visit you enjoyed. The service delays and missteps you describe don’t reflect the friendly and attentive experience we aim to create during every visit to Pelican Hill, and I’m disappointed that we missed the mark for you. Please know I’ve personally addressed your concerns with our housekeeping and Coliseum Pool & Grill management, and I’d also like to take this opportunity to connect you with our Villas Manager. I’ve shared his direct contact details with you in a private message, and we hope to welcome you back for a much-improved visit soon.   Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Amazing stay at Pelican Hill Villas
Summary: We just returned from a 4 day girls birthday celebration getaway and stayed in a 2 bedroom Villa at the Resort at Pelican Hill. It was absolutely beautiful and had an amazing time. The Villa was top notch and we didn't want for anything. Our butler Travis and the entire butler staff were so accommodating and helpful. The staff even delivered a surprise birthday gift for the birthday girl the day of our arrival. Nice fruit and cheese platter, a bottle of prosecco and ingredients to make margaritas. So very thoughtful, yummy and first class, we truly enjoyed it. We went to the Villas pool several days (so beautiful) and the pool staff was so nice and beyond helpful. Karey Kolina one of the Villa pool attendants stands out above and beyond. He was so professional, helpful, beyond
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating at Pelican Hill! It’s truly an honor to be a part of our guests’ special milestones, and I’m glad to read that you and your friends enjoyed a wonderful getaway in the Villas. Please know I’ve personally thanked Travis, Karey and the rest of our Villa team for making your stay so memorable. We appreciate you taking the time to share such kind feedback with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another vacation - and more pool days! - very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Awesome service.  Not sure the value is there but I live nearby. Maybe if I was in from out of town I would have a greater appreciation for how fantastic this place is. I would recommend if you have an unlimited budget & want to go big.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback on your recent stay at Pelican Hill! We’re proud to welcome some of the world’s most discerning travelers - including our own Orange County neighbors! - and I’m glad to read you enjoyed your time at the Resort. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We went for a short vacation to Pelican Hill with the family.  Our whole family, including our two young girls, had a wonderful time.  Here are the highlights:  - The room is beautiful, with high wood ceilings. Quite possibly, one of the most beautiful rooms in which we’ve ever stayed.    -  Service is not only polite, but genuinely warm.  One night, we took the shuttle to Piccolo, the resort’s guests-only restaurant.  The shuttle bus driver joked with our six year old, and she giggled the whole way there.   -  The food at Piccolo was excellent.  It was a combination of small plates of Western and Asian plates.  Everything was delicious.    -  The kids’ club is excellent.  In some area resorts like Monarch Beach, the kids’ club is a relatively small room.  Here, at Pelican Hill,
Manager Response: Hello BHL Family,    One of our greatest privileges is being a part of our guests’ most special family memories, and I thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your recent vacation. I’m glad to hear that you enjoyed a wonderful time together, and that your daughters were able to explore all the Resort has to offer. We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback with us and hope your family travels bring you back to Pelican Hill very soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Our family stayed at a three bedroom villa on the South Village and had a wonderful time. Their onsite concierge, Dana, helped us put together some items for our stay, and her advice was really helpful. Our days were pretty well filled so we didn’t spend too much time at the resort but from what we did experience were really top rate. A definite “must do” is the huge circular pool at the main hotel complex.  Really enjoyed our stay and wouldn’t hesitate to go back in the future.
Manager Response: Hello Mike,    Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your recent family vacation and sharing your kind feedback on our Resort and Andrea Tripadvisor pages. I’m so glad to hear that you enjoyed your Villa and the Coliseum Pool, and I’ll be sure to personally thank Dana for her great recommendations. We truly appreciate your insight and look forward to welcoming your family back to Pelican Hill in the future!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Recently stayed at ocean view bungalow at Pelican Hill and it was divine. From the time of initial reservation, the concierge immediately contacted us to prepare and personalise the itinerary before our arrival, and once we arrived at the resort the staff was so welcoming, thoughtful, and delightful--we didn't feel just as welcomed guest, but as  residents very much at home.  The bungalow was large, beautiful, well-appointed, bright and airy and felt so healing the minute I walked through the door.  And then I saw the stupendous ocean view and all my worries just melted away.  Even the deep soaking tub in the bathroom had a clear view of the ocean.  I could lounge in the bungalow all day and dine at the patio with full privacy, which is what we did.  The bed was extremely
Manager Response: Hello Pauline,    I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in the Bungalows, and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience in such a kind review. We agree that beautiful accommodations mean nothing without equally excellent service, and I’m proud that the thoughtfulness of our team made your stay so memorable. Thank you again for visiting Pelican Hill, and we look forward to welcoming your family back soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The resort at Pelican Hill is a wonderful place to be. It’s located beautifully in the hills above Newport Beach with a view of the Pacific Ocean to die for. The bungalow villas are very secluded and it’s  a perfect location if you need a couple of days relaxation away from home and work. The quality of the room and view from the patio is amazing. We have slept in many hotel beds across the world but this was one of the most comfortable beds ever.  The only bad experience that we had was the in room dining but that’s more to our high expectations from the general experience. The food wasn’t bad but let’s say that it’s was far from the expectations that the price level gave us.  When it comes to the key question, would we recommend any one to stay at the hotel or if we would come
Manager Response: Hello Mats,    Thank you for spending your Easter holiday at Pelican Hill! I appreciate your thoughtful review as well as your recommendation to friends and family. While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in the Villas, I apologize that your in-room dining meal was anything less than perfect. Please know that I’ve personally addressed your feedback with our culinary team, so we may continue to improve our guests’ overall experience. Thank you again for sharing your valuable insight, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Pelican Hill soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Rustic cabin chic vibe amongst beach serenity🌊!!!
Summary: HOME SWEET HOME!!!  Obviously being a former Newport Coast resident brings back nostalgic sentimental fond memories of Pelican Hill and it's lush tranquil grounds...  I lived right up the hill from Pelican Hill - and this incorporated city has Mello Roos for entire the surrounding newer built construction & development. Yet, that didn't stop me from purchasing in this exclusive town, hehe!  The rustic luxe charm of the villas are to be coveted with its traditional flare. I have been to Pelican Hill countless times, and never ever grow tired of it!  AND DA VIEWS SPEAK FOR ITSELF, ya know?????  And the Pelican Grill and formal dining restaurant have consistently been superb (in experience, presentation & quality of food, service).  There's just something uniquely MAGICAL about
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We’re so proud to call Newport Beach home, and I’m delighted that your travels brought you back to Pelican Hill recently. We appreciate your continued loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort for many more oceanview meals and relaxing visits in the years to come.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Spring Break with Teenagers & everyone was smiling!!
Summary: We rented a villa during our kids spring break vacation for 4 nights.  Our two kids were each allowed to bring a friend along to minimize teenage brooding.  All 4 kids had a great time at the resort and in the Newport area.   When it was time to leave they were all wishing the trip was longer!  We stayed in a 4 bedroom villa and it had amazing views of the ocean and we could see Catalina Island from the patio.  It was a very comfortable space and enough room for 2 adults and 4 teenagers to spread out and not get into each others way.  Some of the furnishings are a little worn, but it looks like they might be doing some renovations (the units next to us was under reno). The space came stocked with some basics (condiments/waters/etc) which was nice.  I had planned ahead and
Manager Response: Hello Rutu,    Thank you for spending spring break at Pelican Hill! I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback and am glad to read you enjoyed exploring all the Resort - and Newport Coast! - has to offer. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to personally thank Ismael for making your stay with us extra memorable, and we look forward to welcoming you all back to the Villas soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I was looking forward to my weekend with wife and two kids, good food, spa, golf.   Room at Villas where outdated, comfortable but late 80’s  Food at the Club was limited, had lunch and breakfast, nothing to write home. Tried ro eat at the Pelican Grill Saturday Night, even though we where staying at hotel was more successful making a reservation via Open Table than by being guest at hotel. Attitude of hostess/greeters was not the best.  Had dinner elsewhere.   Spa was good, service very good, facilities outdated.  Biggest disappointment golf by far. Practice range is super crowded.  You hit from carpet imitating grass, that in itself is huge turnoff Course is in good shape, pretty views, good caddies but $300 per player.  One of them my 7 year old son, asked for some type of
Manager Response: Hello Carlos,    I apologize that your recent stay in the Villas fell so short of the relaxing family getaway that you were looking forward to enjoying. Please know that I’ve personally addressed your concerns regarding Golf, the Villa Clubhouse and Pelican Grill with our leadership team, so we may improve upon the areas you’ve mentioned. I’ve also shared the direct phone number for our Villa General Manager in a private message, so we may apologize personally and hopefully regain your trust for a much-improved visit in the future. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us and look forward to speaking with you soon.     Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights this past week and it was exceptional all around. The bungalow was perfect - bright and airy, amazing shower and bathroom and the most comfortable bed...all with an incredible view of the ocean! The concierge, and contacting them via text, was awesome and each driver was prompt and genuinely polite and attentive. The housekeeping staff was also fantastic, and while an earlier reviewer thought they were intrusive, I thought it was a great touch that they organized all your belongings and tidied them up appropriately. Lastly, the main bar and especially John behind the bar, made the nights that much more enjoyable. John remembered us each night and remembered our drinks and made us feel so welcome! The manager, Joeh, just exemplified the overall excellence
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for sharing your thoughtful review with us! I’m so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay in the Bungalows, and I’ll be sure to personally thank John and Joeh for creating such a friendly atmosphere at Andrea - we're certainly thankful to have them on our team! I truly appreciate your kind feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to Pelican Hill soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: I love this hotel but  it’s time  for  renovations
Summary: One of the finest hotels in the USA . However it’s 10 years old and the bungalows need work . The carpet is worn , the woodworking is chipped and the fabric on chairs and sofas are frayed . He lighting in the bungalows have also been a problem for years . Just a heads up for the new food and beverage manager , the roll ups in the breakfast area never have spoons so you always have to ask . The waitresses don’t understand why the busboys don’t include them
Manager Response: Hello Kojack,    Thank you for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill and for sharing your experience with us. While I’m glad to read that the Resort has become a special destination for you, I apologize that your Bungalow accommodations during your recent stay left you disappointed. Please know that I’ve addressed your concerns with our engineering and rooms teams, so we may improve upon the areas you’ve mentioned. I’d also like to connect you with our Front Desk Manager, so we may personally apologize and discuss your feedback in more detail. I’ve shared his direct phone number in a private message, and we hope to welcome you back for a much-improved stay soon.   Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I stayed in the hotel for 2 days in a sea view suite. The suite was so beautiful and well arranged/ furnished. The bed was so comfy. The property is really breathtaking. Well maintained that you have the feeling that everything is new. The terrace is a very good place to relax and enjoy the property. Location is convenient for everything around. The bathroom is huge,with upscale amenities. Staff are very polite and courteous to help the guests and visitors.( real 5star standard) The hotel is perfect for couples,families and solo travelers. Breakfast at the colesuim is another experience. The price of the hotel is to the high side, however, I believe it worth it.
Manager Response: Hello Rasheed,    I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us! I’m so glad that you enjoyed a relaxing two days in the Bungalows and even more proud to read that the friendliness of our team made your stay that much more memorable. Thank you again for visiting Pelican Hill, and we hope to welcome you back very soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: From the moment you walk inside until the moment you leave you will be in awe of the setting,the vista,the service & the ambience. This is a special place like no other we have been to & well worth a stay. The staff are amazing,attentive without being overbearing. We didn't use the pool as it was too cool but we will be back again during the water months.
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful feedback! I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed Pelican Hill’s panoramic views and relaxing ambience, and I’ve taken this opportunity share your kind words about your service experience with our team as well. We truly appreciate your visit and look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy the Coliseum Pool soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: A beautiful and romantic setting. We enjoyed our bungalow and its private patio with gorgeous view. Car service was very prompt and friendly. Service at the grill was painfully slow. Housekeeping was a bit too intrusive with moving around personal belongings and wrapping up cords. Returned to our room after 9:30 pm two evenings to find someone in our room for turn down service, which seemed rather late to us. Otherwise, a very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback on our Tripadvisor page! I'm glad to read that you enjoyed your overall stay in the Bungalows, and I appreciate you taking the time to bring your service and housekeeping concerns to my attention. Please know it is our pleasure to accommodate your preferred service times for daily housekeeping and turn-down service, and I'd like to take this opportunity to connect you with our Director of Housekeeping, so we may better anticipate your preferences during your next stay at Pelican Hill. I've shared his direct contact information with you in a private message, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another romantic visit soon.  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: From the golf, to the food, the rooms and amenities there is no better place to stay than here. The course is fantastic, the caddies and everything about the entire place couldn't be better. The live music at Andrea restaurant was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We’re honored that Pelican Hill has become a special destination for you and that you’ve had the opportunity to experience all the Resort has to offer. Please know I’ve shared your thoughtful comments with our Golf Club and Andrea teams, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: What a wonderful resirt. The views are amazing. The bungalows are beautiful and very roomy. The food and service are first class!!! The pool looks beautiful but it was too cool for us to use this time. Hopefully we will use during our next visit. You will not regret staying here!
Manager Response: Hello Shelly,    Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We appreciate your kind review and look forward to welcoming you back for another picturesque  visit - and pool day! - very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We stay here 3 to 4 times a year for a Golf/Spa Getaway extended weekend, where we enjoy staying at the resort and enjoy the great food. We have stayed in the bungalows and villas with the villas the most memorable. The views from the villas are awesome and keep us coming back. We often ferry out to Catalina island and enjoy some very fresh seafood at the Lobster Pot, a great place with good food.
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill and for the privilege of sharing such special memories with us! I’m so glad that you’ve enjoyed your recent stays in the Bungalows and Villas and have had the opportunity to explore Catalina Island as well. We appreciate your thoughtful feedback and look forward to welcoming you back for many more relaxing weekend getaways in the future.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We were looking for a quick weekend getaway and found the Resort at Pelican Hill on Tripadvisor.  I need to start by saying that we had to cancel our first reservation two days prior to our planned stay, due to a medical emergency with our child.  I contacted resort staff and they were most kind, banking our room deposit for a later stay, even though we were not entitled to it.  The resort is luxurious in a casual, California manner, which we found relaxing. The bungalows are terraced to allow unobstructed views of the ocean and give a feeling of privacy.  The room was well appointed and serene. Loved the fireplace at the foot of the bed - very romantic.  Room service was excellent and so was the service.  We also had lunch at the golf club and enjoyed it very much.  The spa was
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your weekend getaway and for sharing your kind review with us. I’m delighted to read that your first visit to the Resort was well worth the wait and that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in the Bungalows. We truly appreciate your thoughtful insight and look forward to welcoming you back for your anniversary celebrations next month!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Gated Luxury Hotel With Amazing Views
Summary: I stayed here for 2 nights on a work trip and my husband joined me. The property is gorgeous and our villa/room was very spacious. The room had everything you needed and then some. For example, the room had a toaster - for when you ordered room service, they would toast your bread in your room, so it wouldn't get cold/soggy. Very impressive touch.  All of the staff were very attentive and friendly. We ate at the Coliseum both days and relaxed in the pool. My only complaint would be the food, as it could use some better options. We both had spa treatments and my facial was one of the best I've ever had.  My company had several events at the property over the weekend and each was well organized and successful as well.    I would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Hello,    I’m so glad that your business travels brought you to Pelican Hill, and thank you for sharing your kind feedback with us! Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to share your detailed comments on your room service, dining and spa experiences with our leadership team, and we look forward to welcoming you and your husband back to Pelican Hill soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Our family stayed at Pelican Hill over President’s Day weekend - two oceanfront rooms, very spacious and comfortable with fireplaces, patios, room to spread out a bit. Lovely  linens and bath amenities. We especially enjoyed the pool, the nearby beach, as well as the Andrea Restaurant. Our teenage daughter was celebrating her birthday during our visit and staff were attentive with little complementary treats along the way. A peaceful retreat....
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for spending the President’s Day holiday and your daughter’s birthday at Pelican Hill! It’s truly a privilege to be a part of such special celebrations, and I’ll be sure to share your kind feedback with the Andrea team as well. We look forward to welcoming your family back again soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Nice hotel. Scenic grounds/views. Attentive staff. Spacious room/bathroom. Gated parking right in front of your room. Good gym. Had a great massage in the spa. Nice facilities, including the coliseum pool.
Manager Response: Hi Justin,   Thank you for posting a review of your recent visit. We appreciate your feedback on our accommodations, pool, spa, gym, parking and service staff. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Great Stay. Not Flawless but Almost.
Summary: I recently did a staycation with the family at Pelican Hill. We have stayed in the Villas a number of times but this was our first time on the main property in the bungalows.   The bungalow was great. Great rooms, spacious. Clean. A bit too expensive but it is what it is at Pelican these days and the resort was almost too full.   The only real gripe I have is that the food and the experience at the Colosseum have and continue to suck. There has been tons of turnover at the Colosseum the last few years and I mean a ton, and while some of the wait and bus staff are strong and have been there a time most are new and the desk staff and management are revolving constantly. I never see the same face twice and we are there ALOT.   The menu has been re-done and yet it and the food still
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time review your recent visit. We appreciate your candid feedback about your stay and dining experience at Coliseum Pool & Grill. Please know that I will take this opportunity to address your comments with our service and culinary teams at the restaurant. Also, thanks for posting a review to the Andrea TripAdvisor page. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Visited the Pelican Hill in early February for business meetings. The staff was excellent, the hotel rooms were flawless, the view were spectacular. No need to leave the resort for ANYTHING. Andrea restaurant had amazing homemade pasta and the wait staff couldn’t be any nicer. Will not hesitate to return.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your kind review and your recent visit. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback about your stay and dining experience at Andrea. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Lovely stay at Newport Beach. Walked every day at Crystal Cove Beach. The staff at Pekican Hill is fabulous. shout out to Kerry at the Villa pool. The concierge team butler service, the cleaning staff all professional.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thanks for your recent visit and for this great review! We appreciate you sharing your kind comments about the pool, concierge and butler staff. We'll be sure to thank Kerry for taking good care of you. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: We were treated very well in spectacular Southern California location
Summary: Not my first stay but certainly the best stay so far.  Maybe it was the time of year and lower occupancy or maybe the birthdays we were celebrating but we got a great room and super service.  Not a single hiccup from arrival, stay, spa and departure.  Our accommodations were listed as partial ocean view but aside from some trees and terrain in the distance seemed like a full-on ocean view to me.  Enjoyed a delicious breakfast, a calm spa as well as a professional deep tissue massage.  Check-out wasn't rushed and the whole staff was welcoming.  This is a big property so prepare to walk or use a shuttle.  I've been there when occupancy is high and the vibe becomes a expectedly hectic especially in the common areas.  There's a shuttle to the beach and be sure to ask for a beach bag
Manager Response: Hello,  We appreciate you coming back to stay with us again. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your birthday celebrations and that our staff treated you so well during your stay. We appreciate you choosing Pelican Hill and taking the time to share such a kind review. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We celebrated our 23rd anniversary here.  It was beautiful and the staff was excellent.  They made us feel so welcome.  I loved not having to travel through a lobby and elevators to get to our bungalow!  We drove right up after checking in.  The bedding was luxurious and same with the towels!  The room was spacious and very comfortable and peaceful! LOVED everything about our stay.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. I'm glad to read that the staff made you feel so welcome during your anniversary visit. Congratulations on 23 years, and we hope to have you back again for another visit soon!  Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We heard about The Resort at Pelican Hill from our wonderful banker. She and her family had stayed at Pelican Hill several times. Her eyes lit up every time she talked about it. She pushed me to book a stay at Pelican Hill for my wife and me, but I didn't think she thought I'd go through with it. I did for my wife's an my anniversary. Our banker's eyes really lit up when I told her I did.  Of course my wife and I visited Pelican Hill's website. We reviewed literature Pelican Hill sent us. Still, neither of us were 100 percent certain what to expect. When we arrived after an easy drive from John Wayne Airport (SNA) in Santa Ana, CA and drove through the gates, our minds were blown big time.  Neither of us had ever seen a place like Pelican Hill in our lives! Pelican Hill looks
Manager Response: Hello,  I'm glad to hear that your recent anniversary Bungalow stay was so enjoyable. We appreciate you choosing Pelican Hill for such an important occasion. Thank you for taking the time to share such a thoughtful, detailed review. We look forward to welcoming you back again for a future visit, and we'll be happy to assist with the percolator next time.  Kind regards,   Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Beautiful hotel over a stunning landscape. A round colosseum pool with hot tub, that overlooks a huge golf course. Centrally located.  Amazing little villas with fire place, and patio. This hotel overlooks the ocean.  Great restaurants for breakfast lunch and dinner.  Lots of kids! Dont come if you want a quiet romantic getaway. Spa is clean and peaceful. Villas are clean and beautiful.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for kindly sharing your review about your recent visit. I'm glad to know how much you enjoyed your Villa stay, the spa and our resort restaurants. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Excellent accomodations in a beautiful location
Summary: We stayed in one of the resort's villas and were extremely pleased with the accommodations.  The resort is very large but is made easily accessible with the use of golf cart type vehicles.  There is excellent parking for any of the housing locations.  The on property restaurants, services, and staff are all of high quality.
Manager Response: Hello Jack,    I’m so glad to read that your travels brought you to Pelican Hill and that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in the Villas. I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback on our Resort and Pelican Grill pages, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Spectacular setting and first class service
Summary: I must say - I was impressed with this hotel. The setting is just gorgeous - very well landscaped, beautiful views, tranquil and calming. Pulling off the road and entering this resort is like entering a different world. It’s also perfectly situated to explore OC - being right in the middle of Laguna Beach and Newport Beach.   I love that you can drive your car right to your room and the entrance to the rooms is gated. A real sense of security and exclusivity. The room was very spacious with a lovely view over the ocean and property.   Throughout my stay the service was spectacular! Every single person I interacted with was happy, positive and extremely friendly - constantly addressing me by name and asking how my stay was going.   If there was one downside to the property it
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for sharing your kind feedback on our Tripadvisor page! I’m so glad that Pelican Hill offered a relaxing getaway for you and am proud to know that our friendly team made your visit that much more memorable. I appreciate your thoughtful comments on the design of your guest room, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another ocean-view escape soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The resort at Pelican Hill is a beautiful 5 Star property overlooking the ocean at Newport Beach.  It is perfect for golfers, multi-generational families, couples and business incentives.  The views are stunning.
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your recent weekend getaway! Whether visiting for business or vacation, we’re proud to welcome some of the world’s most discerning travelers - and I’m delighted to read that you enjoyed your time with us. I truly appreciate your kind review, and we look forward to serving you again soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: It was our first time at the resort and we loved everything about it.  We Stayed in a bungalow with great ocean view. Great pool, Short distance from LA but somehow we felt Word away from everyday distractions. Special thanks to Cassidy and rest of the staff  to make our stay enjoyable. Looking forward to coming back.
Manager Response: Hello,    I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed the first of what we hope will be many visits to Pelican Hill. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to personally thank Cassidy for making your stay in the Bungalows extra memorable, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another relaxing getaway from Los Angeles soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I'm always skeptical of 5 star resorts and how pretentious they can be. Not this one. The staff and other guests were kind and authentic. The prices weren't outrageous for drinks on premise. The food and landscape was incredible. Highly recommended and there are beautiful places to walk from the property.
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer,    Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and sharing your thoughtful review with us. We agree that great service should also be friendly and authentic, and I’m glad to read that our team made your visit to Pelican Hill that much more memorable We truly appreciate your insight and hope to welcome you back for drinks and a sunset stroll very soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: One of us stayed at the Pelican Hill Resort for a recent professional meeting. The bungalow was amazing--huge with all the amenities including a fireplace and patio that overlooked one of the golf courses. Nespresso coffee maker, gorgeous bathroom, and the like. There is a certain pretentiousness at the resort, perhaps because they do apparently have a lot of celebs that stay there, but that didn't detract. The scenery is extraordinary as well as shown from the shots of and from the main resort. A very welcome break from the winter in the northeast and will happily return for a vacation!
Manager Response: Hello Bruce and Carol,    I’m so glad that your business travels brought you to sunny Pelican Hill! Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback on your stay in the Bungalows, and we hope to welcome you both back for vacation very soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This is our third time at Pelican Hill Resort and we loved every minute.  We stayed in an ocean front Bungalow suite and it was amazing.  The rooms are exceptional and very well appointed with two tv’s and king bed and two bathrooms.  This place is one of a kind !!!  The staff is very friendly and eager to help out if you need anything at all.  The golf north golf course has spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean.  They have upgraded the golf carts with GPS units.  All in all this resort is not to be missed if you want to have an amazing vacation !!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Norman,    We’re honored that Pelican Hill has become a favorite destination of yours! I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your Bungalow accommodations and golf experience on Ocean North and have personally shared your kind feedback with the rest of our team as well. We sincerely appreciate your insight and look forward to welcoming you back for your fourth stay soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: I love the pool side and relax at their Spa all day
Summary: Pelican Hill is one of my favorite resort when I visit so Cal. Their grand lobby has good bar and a lot of helpful hotel employees around. I always go to their spa and just close my eyes and enjoy the sauna room and extravaganza hot tub (as big as small pool). I definitely recommend for couples!
Manager Response: Hello Chad,    Thank you for your kind review! I’m so glad that your recent travels brought you to Pelican Hill and that you enjoyed a relaxing stay with us. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back soon!    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Beautiful property that nickel and dimes you
Summary: I’ve stayed at this lovely property many times but this stay was less than ideal.  Despite a high room rate and a borderline crazy resort fee of $40 per day they charged me $65 for a land line call to Los Angeles (officially any place more than 2 miles away). Given there is very weak cell service in the area this is not appropriate.  In general at these rates, the property seems more concerned with profit maximization than service.

my husband and i decided to come down last minute yesterday because we found some amazing specials for this property which is usually in the high hundreds to thousand plus per night.  It was on expedia for 452 plus resort fee , so i decided to call the hotel and they will do a price match if you send a screenshot and proof of the price.   I got a ocean view bungalow even thought it was overcast ...  when we arrived up the beautiful arrival driveway and into the grand lobby, it felt just right. Luxury and comfort at its best.  The front desk gentleman whose name escapes me right now was professional, positive and very helpful.  he was efficient and got me checked in quickly which is something i really appreciate.  We drove down to our room because the bungalows have street
Manager Response: Hello Susanna,    I’m delighted to read that you and your husband enjoyed a wonderful getaway to Pelican Hill! We look forward to you having the opportunity to explore more of the Resort and experience our Spa during your next visit. Thank you again for your thoughtful feedback, Susanna!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort - service and food need improvement
Summary: The facilities are beautiful including the view and Golf course. The lack of service and poor food quality (except at the grill at the Golf course) needs significant improvement as this is not 5 star resort. We left this facility and went to another 5 star resort in Del Mar which truly delivered amazing service., food, and environment.
Manager Response: Hello Tracie,    Thank you for taking the time to share your candid feedback with us. Our goal is for guests to enjoy every moment of their time at the Resort, and I apologize that your service and dining experiences during your recent visit left you disappointed. I’d like to take this opportunity to connect you with our Front Desk Manager, so we may personally apologize and better understand the shortcomings of your stay. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to the opportunity to speak with you soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill
