Summary Heading: An amazing marriage rekindling from a crazy work period
Summary: While only two days and one evening, our first and definitely not our last visit to Pelican Hill, made for a lovely time for my wife and and I to get away from Los Angeles, and feel like we were staying at an international five-star resort.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Hello David,    Thank you for your kind feedback! It’s always a privilege to create an environment for our guests to relax and reconnect, and I’m so happy to read that you and your wife enjoyed a memorable getaway together. Please know I’ve shared your kind words with the rest of our team, and we look forward to welcoming you both back soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: These rooms are big, cozy and comfortable.  Hang out on your deck, and appreciate the outdoors!   The views are amazing, and the weather is always perfect.  It is a nice getaway.  The service is great.  Take time to walk around and appreciate the California Coast!
Manager Response: Hello Sondra,    Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! There’s truly nothing quite like watching the sunset from your private terrace, and I’m delighted to read that you enjoyed such a relaxing stay with us. I appreciate your kind review, and we hope to welcome you back for another coastal getaway soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My daughter and daughter in law treated me to dinner and a night at the gorgeous property Pelican Hill Resort.   Will never forget it.  The property is pristine and the accommodations were perfect.  We had a fabulous dinner and the wait staff took care of our every want.  We retired to a beautiful bungalow that was so well appointed.  Balcony with amazing view especially at sunset, fireplace, high vaulted ceilings, and very comfortable beds and deluxe bedding. Can’t say enough to really capture.  Will definitely stay again.  The whole staff was so pleasant and helpful!  Very restful.
Manager Response: Hello Tina,    Thank you so much for your kind review - what a special opportunity to spend quality time with your daughter and daughter-in-law! I’m glad to read that you three enjoyed a relaxing and cozy stay in the Bungalows and that our team made your visit even more memorable. I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback, and we look forward to seeing your family again very soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Our family of three stayed in a 2 bedroom villas in early December.  What we liked: - Service - Excellent and responsive. Almost overbearing. - Villas - Fantastic villas with plenty of room for a very active 2 year old. - Good Home Base - We did not use a ton of the resort facilities, but ended up using our location in Newport to drive up and down the coast. Also went to Disney one day (about a 35-40 minute drive).  What we would do differently: - Stay in the South Villas, if possible. Closer to the villas clubhouse, pool and should have better views. The North Villas overlook a road before the ocean. - Understand that there is a resort fee charged daily. I booked through a third-party site and was not aware of that.
Manager Response: Hello Anoop,    Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your family’s recent vacation to Newport Beach. I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your stay in the Villas and had the opportunity to visit Disneyland as well. The Resort offers great accessibility to so many wonderful destinations within Orange County, and we look forward to welcoming your family back for another memorable vacation soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: A five star resort in a wonderful location. Walk to Crystal Cove Beach (up and down the hill) or take the shuttle.  Two pools,one for the bungalow and the other for the villas.   Both are terrific.   Rooms are spacious in both bungalow and villa. I’ve stayed in both and the main difference is the garage, kitchen and laundry rooms I’m for the villa.  Both are clean and have their own concierge.  You can’t go wrong here with a vacation or side trip.
Manager Response: Hello Lisa,   Thank you for your thoughtful review! I’m glad to read that you’ve enjoyed your recent stays in the Bungalows and Villas, and even had a chance to explore our neighboring Crystal Cove Beach. We appreciate you taking the time to share your kind words and hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill very soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: One word - Wow! We stopped here for 2 nights, in a beach bungalow beautiful uninterrupted views to the ocean.  Bungalow was huge, lovely touches like the fire and well appointed bathroom. The pool is beautiful and the staff very helpful and attentive. One small gripe was that we came back to our room at 4pm and the housekeeping still hadn’t been to replenish towels etc, just thought that was a bit late as most people return to relax and get ready for dining out in the evening.
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for making Pelican Hill a part of your recent travels to California! We're truly proud to call Newport Beach home, and I'm so happy to read that you enjoyed your stay in the Bungalows. I do apologize for the inconvenience caused by the delayed housekeeping service and have personally addressed this feedback with our housekeeping management team. I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind review, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: As a family of 5, we stayed at Pelican Hill Resort and had some of the best experiences ever!!!! I definitely recommend it for all ages. The pools were spectacular (one of the biggest pools ever), the villas were super spacious, and the food was great!
Manager Response: Hello Diana,    Thank you for sharing your kind review with us! I’m so glad that your family enjoyed a wonderful vacation together full of fun (and delicious!) memories. We hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill in 2018 and look forward to serving you again soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Special Family Christmas for Elderly Parents...NOT !!!
Summary: I booked 2 bdrm ocean view villa as a special experience for my 86 and 91 year old parents for Xmas; kids home wake up Xmas AM open gifts etc, etc. The experience was a  disappointment from the start. I was told check in time was 4 pm, when it was 5 pm (which for the price is ridiculous Montage has rolling check in). In the villa no ocean view rather a view of trees and residential areas up PCH; the hotel staff are well aware of the non-ocean view and admit as much...so why are they renting for ocean view prices ? On top of that the sinks were clogged, bath tub stoppers didn't work, there were only 2 towel in each bathroom, the furniture was damaged (doors falling off break front or not closing), mismatched dishes....a far cry from the luxury resort represented.  I don't know
Manager Response: Hello,    I apologize that your family’s visit to Pelican Hill left you so disappointed, especially on an occasion as important as your Christmas vacation. I understand how you were looking forward to a memorable holiday celebration together and apologize that your check-in experience and Villa accommodations tarnished what should have been a luxurious and relaxing time with your family and your parents. I appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback and would like to connect you with our Villa General Manager, so we may personally apologize. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we hope to welcome your family back for a much-improved visit soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I attended a group dinner at the resort in December. Our group was around 15 people and we had a pre set menu.  This should have assured good service at a reasonable pace. Not so. The pace of our service was amazingly slow. Our group became very frustrated and irritated.  It did not seem to matter as no one seemed to care
Manager Response: Hello Bill,    Thank you for sharing your candid feedback on our review page, and I apologize that your recent dinner at Pelican Hill left you disappointed. Our goal is to create not only delicious food, but also an attentive service experience, and I’m sorry that we fell short during your evening with us. Please know I’ve personally addressed your comments with our management team, and we hope to welcome you back for a much-improved dining experience at Pelican Hill in the future.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: 4 ladies stayed in a 3 bed villa, which included a gracious living room and kitchen, as well as a lavish patio overlooking the golf course. The butler service was amazing, prompt, and informative. The pools are gorgeous. We are planning our next trip back ;)
Manager Response: Hello Amanda,    Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your recent getaway and for sharing your thoughtful review with us! I’m so glad to read that you and your friends enjoyed a relaxing stay in the Villas, and we hope your travels bring you back to the Resort in 2018.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Villa for Christmas- disappointed in service
Summary: My family and I returned to Pelican Hill and upgraded to a 2 bd villa to kick off our holiday celebration.  Our arrival was seamless and the main hotel registration staff, villa registration staff, gate staff and Kevin the Butler were  wonderful.  We arrived into our Villa at about 9pm and within minutes heard squeaking to which we discovered 3 mice trapped in a sticky trap under the kitchen stove. The hotel is located on a canyon and there appeared to be construction going on at the building next door so we chalked this up to an unfortunate mishap and called the butler service who sent someone up right away to remove the mice.   The bigger challenge was the smell of mold we discovered in the master bedroom. It was literally so strong we had issues sleeping, not to mention my
Manager Response: Hello Erika,    Thank you for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill and for allowing us to be a part of your family’s holiday celebrations this year. I apologize that your recent stay in the Villas fell so short of the visits you’ve enjoyed over the years and am deeply disappointed that our team didn’t provide a more gracious recovery for the challenges you experienced with housekeeping. Please know I’ve addressed your candid comments with our housekeeping team, and I’d also like to connect you with our Villa General Manager, so we may personally apologize. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we hope to welcome your family back for a much-improved visit very soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Everything was great.  The location is quiet between Newport beach and Laguna beach.  The rooms are very private and nice with high ceiling and fireplace.  The general service is good.  The gym was well equipped.  The spa facility was great and very relaxing.  Wished they had lap pool.  The jacuzzi outside was a bit cool for that day and a bit awkward to get there; had to cross the restaurant where everyone can see.  But what really disappointed us was the food.  We came to this resort expecting a quality and taste that match the quality and service of the facility, but it was very disappointing.  Nothing stood up and the sole I had was overcooked and oversalted.  I can cook better and it was not italian food.  We expected Northern Italian food but it was a typical american food
Manager Response: Hello,    I appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback with us. While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your overall experience at the Resort and Spa, I apologize that your meal at Andrea wasn’t equally outstanding. Our goal is for guests to enjoy every moment of their stay at Pelican Hill, and I’m disappointed that your dining experience fell so short. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to address your feedback on the Dover Sole with our culinary team, and I’d like to connect you with Andrea’s General Manager, so we may personally apologize. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we hope your travels bring you back to Pelican Hill soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: It was just okay and for the money, okay isn't good enough
Summary: This was our first time there so I did not know what to expect.  The campus is very large.  Depending on your room, you will be driving to eat, go to the spa or go to the pool.  Our room was on the outskirts and we had a wonderful view of the parking lot and road.  As a result, we could not use the patio or leave the shutters open.  I am certain there are many lovely rooms at Pelican.  We were not in one and I have never been to a resort that had such a bad room.  We spent a lot of money and that was a bad start.    The restaurants were not busy but the service was extremely slow.  Every meal we ate had slow service .  Not sure if we caught them on a bad weekend but once again, a destination resort should delight and not distract.  That isn't to say that the food was poor as we
Manager Response: Hello,    I appreciate you sharing your experience with us and sincerely apologize that your first visit to Pelican Hill was anything less than perfect. I understand how you were looking forward to a relaxing getaway, and I’m disappointed by the slow service you experienced at the restaurants and your room view falling so short of your expectations. I’d like to connect you with our Front Desk Manager, so we may personally apologize and hopefully regain your trust for a much-improved visit in the future. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to connecting with you soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed here for a couple of days in early December.  What a great resort.  We stayed in a Bungalow overlooking the golf course and I can't say enough about this resort.  The room was very stylish with high ceilings.  It also had a Bose Sound System that was a nice touch.  The grounds were very easy to navigate and the staff was very friendly.  I liked it much more than a similar place in Palos Verdres (you can do the math).  This is a fantastic place for a couples getaway.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Mike,    Thank you for joining us at Pelican Hill this month! I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in the Bungalows and had the opportunity to explore all the Resort has to offer. I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful review with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Newport Beach soon!    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: THEY HAVE THE CHECK IN AT 5 pm and give you the room by 6 PM if you are lucky!! The CHECK OUT IS AT 12 PM. WHAT A JOKE!!  Pay a top price for an Orion view villa and you don’t even get to see the ocean. By the time we got to the room it was already DARK.

Summary Heading: Great Resort but starting to show its age
Summary: This was our 5th time staying at Pelican Hill and this trip we started to see some aging/wear and tear . The cushions on the patio were stained and the couch in the room was looking grungy and starting to sag. Don't get me wrong we still love this resort, the grounds are beautiful and the staff are amazing but with the prices they charge they should not let things deteriorate. One thing to watch for is if your patio has an umbrella,ours did not and you could not sit out during the day as there was no shade. We will stay here again but I do hope they address some of these issues.
Manager Response: Hello John,    I appreciate your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill and thank you for sharing your candid feedback with us. While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your overall stay, I’m disappointed that your guest room was not as pristine as your previous visits with us. I also apologize that your terrace was not outfitted with an umbrella, and I’d like to make a note of this preference, so we may better anticipate your next visit to Pelican Hill. I've shared a private message with you, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back for a much-improved visit soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed for week over Thanksgiving in two bedroom villa. Could have lived in the unit...it had everything and was very well done. Enjoyed the villa clubhouse for breakfast and the pool. Service was perfect...every request was handled promptly and efficiently.  Andrea was great...ate there two times and enjoyed the dover sole special. Pelican Grill was good.  Very quiet and serene place.....its not right on the ocean but the views and serenity of the place more than make up for that. The property is immaculate and the villas and rooms are the best you will find anywhere.  Some of the fixtures (Pool lounges)  are showing some age but that's to be expected.  If you are looking for a quiet get away with everything you need (golf, pool, great food, fitness, spa)...this is a great
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for spending Thanksgiving at Pelican Hill! It’s truly a privilege to be a part of our guests’ special holiday celebrations, and I’m glad to read you enjoyed a relaxing stay in the Villas as well as delicious dining experiences at Pelican Grill and Andrea. I appreciate you taking the time to share such a thoughtful review of your visit, and we hope to welcome you back for another Villa getaway very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: 3-day stay in bungalows over Thanksgiving weekend.   Booked on-line, all charges were clearly explained.   Service was great from check in to check out.  Bungalow was quiet and private, roomier than some apartments with upscale amenities.  Booked golf round, paired with another single and caddy.   Room with ocean view and outdoor patio was amazing.   I would definitely recommend this for a romantic weekend, or pampering experience.   Now I know how the 1% live...
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for celebrating Thanksgiving at Pelican Hill and sharing your kind review with us. Our bungalows are the perfect escape during the busy holiday season, and I’m so glad you enjoyed a relaxing getaway. I appreciate your thoughtful feedback and look forward to welcoming you back for another ocean-view stay soon. Happy holidays!   Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Maybe the best I have ever been to... Maybe
Summary: We stayed here in Sept 2017. I haven't written a T/A review for many years, but this resort is that good i felt i had to. for the last 6 years we have been to the OC every year for our vacation, usually staying in the Ritz in Dana point. The Ritz has always been one of my favourite hotels, so much so it has had me returning year on year.   Every year we have driven past the gates for the Pelican Hill and always asked each other what we think it would be like and that we should drive up to take a look around, but we wouldn't stay there as there was no beach however each year we put it off until it was too late. Wow what a mistake that was!   This year (after a disappointing trip to the ritz last year) we thought we would split the trip across newport, Dana then huntington. From
Manager Response: Hello Steven,    Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill to be a part of your annual vacation to Orange County! I’m delighted to read that you enjoyed a memorable first stay with us and even extended your visit before returning home. I truly appreciate you taking the time to share such kind feedback, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill for another relaxing vacation next fall - if not sooner!   Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: My Home Away from Home....but Needs Some Updating
Summary: I have been staying at The Resort at Pelican Hill for a number of years now, usually opting to stay in a villa which offers a lot of privacy and excellent service.  As was the case during my most recent stay the property is fantastic.  Wonderful views of the ocean, outstanding service, and quiet.  However, the age of the rooms/villas is starting to show.  As an example when I opened the drawer for the AV/MP3 access, the hinges were broke so the entire front panel fell off.  I have experienced some things like this before so I was prepared and luckily caught it before it fell to the floor.  All of this I take in stride and I don't let it detract from all of the other wonderful qualites that the resort has to offer.  Excellent srevice.  Wonderful location.  Privacy.  And quiet.  I
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your feedback on our Tripadvisor page. I apologize that your most recent stay in the Villas fell short of the wonderful visits you’ve enjoyed in the past. Please know that our housekeeping team is delighted to provide hypoallergenic and memory foam pillows upon request, and I’d like to take this opportunity to connect you with our Villa General Manager, so we may personally apologize and better anticipate your preferences during your next visit. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to welcoming you back for a much-improved stay soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The Resort at Pelican Hill is a very lovely resort.  Check in was very professional and timely and we were accompanied to our Villa by our butler.  He offered to provide any service requests and was very friendly.  We only had one request during our stay for transportation,we asked for a ride to the main pool, unfortunately no one ever came. We also asked if they had a coffee maker (the Nespresso provided was not our favorite)  and they were able to locate one for our use. Overall it was a very nice stay.
Manager Response: Hello,    I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful review on our TripAdvisor page. I’m glad to read that you enjoyed a relaxing stay and sincerely apologize that the transportation shortfall you experienced tarnished an otherwise wonderful visit. Please know that I’ve personally addressed your feedback with our guest services team, and we hope to welcome you and your girlfriends back to Pelican Hill very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed with family in the north villa.  The area is just beautiful and so peaceful. The villa came with a garage space which was very convenient.  Staff including our butler service was excellent. Everything you need is right there including a stacked washer and dryer, but no detergent. Small kitchen had stocked fridge with assorted drinks including beer.  There was also a Nespresso machine. Kitchen utensils were available but the frying pan was so old everything stuck to it.   There was shuttle service to the beach and the villa reception area as well as to the main reception.   The things that bothered me about this resort were: The check in time for this resort is at  5:00 PM!!  Housekeeping could definitely be improved. Although the rooms were clean, shampoos were missing,
Manager Response: Hello Ellen,    We’re honored that you chose Pelican Hill to be a part of your family vacation, and I thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback with us. While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your Villa accommodations and butler service, I apologize that your housekeeping service and check-in time left you disappointed. Please know I’ve personally addressed your feedback with our management team, and I’d also like to connect you with our Villas General Manager, in hopes that we may regain your trust for a much-improved visit in the future. I’ve shared his direct phone number in a private message, and we look forward to speaking with you soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Extraordinary Resort Located on the Beautiful Southern California Coast
Summary: From check in to departure the Pelican Hill experience is one not to miss.    The Ocean View Villas are spacious & comfortable; big terrace with a view is worth a thousand words. The pool for villa guests is amazing with plenty of lounge chair space.  Villas have a closed car garage and street parking is available.  Dining and drinking options are excellent and plenty of choice.
Manager Response: Hello Cynthia,    Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and graciously sharing your kind feedback with us! There’s nothing like watching the sunset from your Villa terrace, and I’m glad to read your visit was so wonderful. I appreciate your thoughtful review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel with great dining and golf
Summary: The resort service was excellent, accommodated every single request we had. The view of the Pacific and golf courses is stunning. A great place to rest as there is very little to no outside noise. Both golf courses are challenging but fun to play.
Manager Response: Hello Youri,    Thank you for your kind feedback! I’m so glad you enjoyed a great trip to Pelican Hill and am proud to read that our team made your visit even more memorable. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us and hope to welcome you back to the Resort - and Pelican Hill Golf Club! - very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We loved our stay at Pelican Hill.  The atmosphere was relaxing and our Villa was beyond lovely.  Room service was yummy and presentation was on point.  One suggestion I would offer is to be very specific with the order- can be tricky anywhere.  The spa was nice, but not exceptional.  The people in the spa are very sweet as are most of the others represented in different areas.  Overall, we will visit again.
Manager Response: Hello,    I appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us, and I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in the Villas. I apologize that your experience at the Spa was anything less than perfect and have taken this opportunity to address your feedback with our Spa management. Your insight is incredibly important to our team, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Pelican Hill soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Amazing view of the Pacific Ocean. Service is impeccable, everything we requested came true within an hour or less. I was craving a Don Julio Mule, and they did not fail to provide everything including the copper mugs.   Our concierge booked a last minute excursion to Catalina and we had a wonderful time.  Only stayed a couple of nights, but I will definitely return!
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for sharing your experience with us! I’m so glad that you enjoyed a relaxing few days at Pelican Hill and even had the chance to explore Catalina Island. We hope to welcome you back for another oceanview escape - and Don Julio Mule! - very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The staff is incredibly well trained and coordinated to make the service all about the guest.  The resort is large and so it's often a long walk or short shuttle ride to and from the rooms.  This is perfectly handled by the bell staff who never made me wait more than 5 minutes for a ride.  The common areas are beautiful with sweeping ocean views and tons of light.  The room i stayed in was luxurious and large with modern technology and floor to ceiling windows looking out at the Pacific.  The room also had a large patio with chairs and a chaise lounge.   The bathroom was huge and very comfortable.   It's expensive but it's also easy to see why as there is not a thing I can find that they missed.   Oh, there are also two amazing 18 hole golf courses if you're interested in that.
Manager Response: Hello,    I appreciate you taking the time to share such a thoughtful review! I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed Pelican Hill’s luxurious guest rooms but even more proud that it was our team’s friendly service that made your visit truly memorable. Thank you again for your kind insight, and I hope your travels bring you back to the Resort soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort all the way around
Summary: We had a 2 bedroom villa. It was perfect. The beds were comfy. The living area was cozy. It was a large villa. The concierge went above and beyond to help whenever we needed. I have a broken ankle and the drivers were excellent in every way to make sure I got to and from where I needed to go. The staff was super friendly everywhere we went at the resort. The food was wonderful! I think our favorite was Andrea. YUM!!! The ingredients were very fresh and the flavors were WOW! Our daughter is in college out in California. We have now found our home away from home. We will go back to Pelican Hill every time we go out to visit.
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for making Pelican Hill your home-away-from-home! I’m so glad to read that our team took wonderful care of you throughout your stay, and I’ve taken this opportunity to share your kind feedback with them as well. It’s truly a honor to be a part of our guest’s most special milestones, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Pelican Hill throughout your daughter’s college years.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Luxury personified, although at this price one or two misses demoted it from ‘exceptional’
Summary: This is the best resort I’ve visited on the West Coast bar none.  Stayed in the North Villas fir just over a week.  They are large & beautifully appointed with everything you would need, from the very comfortable beds, bathrooms & plenty of cupboard space to spacious living areas, sunny balcony, Wolf/Subzero appointed kitchen, even your own small garden.  Loads of cupboard space, modern washing machine/tumble dryer, garage for the car & the switch on/off fireplace, etc.  Maid service was exceptional, the place was very clean & maintained so throughout our stay.  The reception, housekeeping & butler service is excellent too, with their Mercedes ML450’s to run you around, nothing appears too much trouble.  Gym is well equipped, clean & in the right location - close to pool - very
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Thoughtful feedback from our guests is incredibly important, so we may continually improve the Pelican Hill experience. While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed an excellent stay in the Villas, I apologize that some parts of your stay were anything less than perfect. Our goal is for guests to enjoy every moment of their time at Pelican Hill, and I’ve taken this opportunity to personally address your concerns on the walkways, fitness center, Coliseum Pool & Grill service and pool floats with our management team. We appreciate your thoughtful insight and hope to welcome you back for another relaxing getaway soon.    Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I apologize in the delay in writing this review, but my opinion about the customer service has not diminished one iota.  I was most pleased to be received at the Villa bar area by Mr. Tim and the Villa pool area by Mr. Karey who both catered to my needs while my room was being prepared for check-in.  They both went considerably above the call of their duties.  As well, on the next day, Mr. Sean (a Colosseum pool employee who has been using a name tag for a Mr. Thomas) and Ms. Katie (the gift shop attendant) were both extremely kind and accommodating, especially since I had trouble finding the shop and getting back to where I needed to be (given the size of the property).  Mr. Karey and Mr. Sean were also considerably jovial, and we had a great conversations which I appreciated.
Manager Response: Hello,    I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind review with us! We believe the memories of your vacation to Pelican Hill should last long after you return home, and I’ve taken this opportunity to personally thank Tim, Karey, Sean and Katie for taking such wonderful care of you during your visit. Thank you again for your thoughtful feedback, and I hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill very soon!    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Stayed at this resort for two weeks in December 2016 during Xmas, and thoroughly enjoyed every minute. The spa, outdoor pool, numerous restaurants and bars,  golf course and the various lounges make this resort stand out. It is an exceptional place to stay and relax. It's within a few miles of shopping malls, restaurants and the Newport and Laguna beaches. It's a 10 minute ride to John Wayne Airport. You will have a memorable stay, especially during Xmas and new year.
Manager Response: Hello Reza,    Thank you for celebrating Christmas at Pelican Hill! It’s always an honor to be a part of our guests’ special family memories, and I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed a wonderful two weeks exploring all the Resort has to offer. I’ll be sure to share your kind words with the rest of our team, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We got to stay at Pelican Hill with some business partners one weekend. During the day we had invited a large group of guests and at one point even guests in the next door villa stopped by - we must have had a hundred people at one point. It was impressive that the villa could spontaneously accommodate such a large group comfortably. It has a large open kitchen, and along with the dining, living and outdoor patio - the villa was designed for entertaining. We got to stay in the master bedroom suite upstairs - I think there were 4 bedrooms in the villa. The garage could accommodate up to 4 cars, btw.  Basically, this was like staying in a large, luxurious private home with a nice view. While not quite as nice as a multi-million dollar estate, it comes pretty close for a resort. If
Manager Response: Hello John,    Thank you for sharing your kind review on our Tripadvisor page! Just like you described, the Villas were designed with the goal of combining all the comforts of home with the luxurious amenities of a Resort, and I’m so glad to read that you and your business partners enjoyed your weekend stay with us. We appreciate your thoughtful insight and hope to welcome you all back for another memorable Pelican Hill getaway soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Class, Elegance and Palladian Architecture in 2000 sq. ft of luxury! Stay here.
Summary: Phenomenal resort, very photo friendly. Palladian architecture (try Andrea for fine dining).Here via many dinners, laughter and learning  I decided to make a date into a long term adventure of loving unconditionally. Butler service included with Villas.  Extensive views of the ocean and breezes with Palladian architecture. Gate guards call you by name and you are looked after.  Villas include slippers, water and a garage (yes really). Notice bidet in guest bath has a large sprayer and  master bedroom is small.  Attention to detail is class and the tiny things do matter most e.g. Golf Club has signature china and shoe attendant. Microwave positioned as to care for patron. Linens are divine and the upgrade and hospitality are most appreciated like the exotic cars and 5 star
Manager Response: Hello India,    Thank you for sharing your experience at Pelican Hill with us! We agree that the little details are what make a vacation so memorable, and I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed your recent stay in the Villas. We appreciate you taking the time to share your kind review with us and we look forward to welcoming you back for another ocean-view getaway soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This is a pricey place, but worth it.  Anywhere you need to go on property they will take you.  All you do is ask.  They check on your needs frequently.  Room service is prompt.  In fact, if you fill out the breakfast card, you can set your watch by the delivery of your food.  There is a terrific pool and the spa has exceptional offerings. Everything here is expensive, but there is no better service in all of California.  This place is on par with the best resorts in the world.
Manager Response: Hello,    I’m so glad that you enjoyed your recent visit to Pelican Hill, and we appreciate you taking the time to leave such thoughtful feedback on our Resort, Andrea, Pelican Grill and Coliseum Pool & Grill Tripadvisor pages. I’m delighted that you had the chance to truly experience all the Resort has to offer but more proud to read that our team is what made your stay that much more memorable. Thank you again for your kind words, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill very soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Overall, our family had a great time at this resort.  The rooms, pool and grounds are all outstanding.  We had a north villa that was perfect for our needs.  The fridge and pantry came thoughtfully stocked which is something too many places don’t do.  And we had a great time at the main pool, which is nicely heated and offers wonderful views.  My only hang up was on small misses on service.  This hotel wants to be in the top echelon of luxury resorts, and to do that, the service has to hit on all cylinders.  During our visit, we didn’t have any significant issues, but most of our interactions came with rough edges.   At check in around noon, the front desk clerk asserted that check in was really 5pm and inferred any earlier was an accommodation to us (it wasn’t - they purport to
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your family vacation! While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your overall stay in the Villas, I regret that some parts of your service experience fell short. I understand your disappointment that we were unable to accommodate an early check-in and apologize that your time at the Villa pool was anything less than perfect. I appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback with us, and I’ve taken this opportunity to personally address your concerns with our management team, so we may continue to improve our guests’ overall experience. Thank you again for your thoughtful review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon!    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Staff kindness makes this place special
Summary: Lovely property, well mantained and with stunning views, traditional and classy.  Restaurant Andrea was delicious for lunch and Room Service Breakfast was very tasty and efficiently served.  The room has all the comforts expected for this category of resort with high quality amenities, enjoyed the chimney a lot and the fact you could turn it on with a single button.   Housekeeping was spotless, thoughtful and friendly.  The staff in general is kind, courteous and amicable.  I was mostly pleasantly surprised by the drivers of the shuttles that take you around, they were delightful.
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your TripAdvisor review! I’m delighted that you enjoyed a wonderful stay at Pelican Hill and even more proud to read that the kind service you experienced made your visit so memorable. Please know that I’ve taken this opportunity to pass along your kind words to our teams at Andrea, In-Room Dining, Housekeeping and Guest Services, and we hope to welcome you back for another relaxing Pelican Hill getaway soon.    Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: If you are a family and can splash some cash the villas are the way to go. You get the moat amazing accommodation. More than one bedroom, 2.5 bathrooms at a minimum,  a huge balcony or terrace or outside space. You get a kitchen , a separate restaurant to done in for breakfast and lunch, a clubhouse and a butler.  The swimming pools are amazing , the views spectacular and service second to none .We have been here 3x. We will go back. You need to have a car, fly into Orange county rather than Los Angeles and eat dinner outside of the hotel. Many come for the golf.  We don't play. We come because it feels like being in Europe with better service . It isn't cheap but it shouldn't be!
Manager Response: Hello Robbie,   Thank you for your thoughtful review and your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill! The Villas are such a special part of our Resort, and I’m glad to read that you’ve enjoyed your recent stays with us. I truly appreciate your feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more sunsets and relaxing pool days in the future.   Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Fantastic resort with brutal poolside wait staff service
Summary: We love going here each year. Pelican Hill is by far one of the best US resorts were ever been to. Love the views and the golf course is second to none. The rooms are spacious and have everything you need. We tend to stay at the resort the whole time we are there and love the food. The sunsets are the best. BUT, the poolside service is some of the worst service we have ever encountered. When you finally do get a wait person to come around you need to order 2 drinks because you're lucky if you see them again in the next half hour. It's the same every year here and this is our 5th year coming here. Don't get me wrong the staff is great and very friendly but they're very under staffed at the pool. We will go back but we always know what to expect from the poolside service.
Manager Response: Hello,   I’m proud to read that Pelican Hill has become a special destination for your family and appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback with us. Our goal is for guests to enjoy every moment of their stay, and I’m disappointed to read that your service experience at the Coliseum Pool has been anything less than perfect. Please know I’ve personally addressed your feedback with Coliseum Pool & Grill’s management team, so we may continue to improve the overall guest experience. I’d also like to connect you with our General Manager, so we may personally apologize and hopefully regain your trust for a much-improved experience soon. I’ve shared her direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Kind regards, Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Nice hotel. Each room is a bungalow, with an individual parking spot in front of the entrance. We had some issues at checking in, since the room that was provided was not ocean view as requested (and paid), but golf course view. They changed the room but ha to clean it and repair the access key knob. The service was quick, though. There are service personnel driving around in Mercedes Benz SUVs and electric cars all over. The pool was certainly nice, the coliseum style architecture was original and conducive to socializing, since guests are close to each other, but in a good manner (not intrusively). The stores and food were a bit pricey, but good quality overall. It is a nice stay if you are traveling that route, luxurious (non extreme, though) but you would certainly have a
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and sharing your review on our Tripadvisor page! I apologize for the disappointing inconvenience you experienced upon checking in to your guest room and am glad to read that you enjoyed a wonderful rest of your stay in the Bungalows. I appreciate your kind feedback on the Coliseum Pool and our on-property restaurants, and we hope to welcome you to Pelican Hill Golf Club the next time your travels bring you to Newport Beach.    Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Everything was great except 1 golf staff
Summary: One of the nicest resorts to stay at.  And given that I golf and my son started golfing, we tend to come here quite a bit.  All of the staff interactions were great as everyone was quite friendly and helpful... except one.  Most of the time, we would book an evening tee time which is 2 hours before sunset to play 9 holes.  And out of all the times that my 10 year old son and I  have played here, if there are spots open, the starter would let us go a bit early.  This time around, the starter was a stickler for rules and insisted that we tee off EXActly at our slot even if there was no one else playing before us.   I asked since we are only playing 9 holes if we can start earlier if no one else was booked in front of us and that request was denied.  Not even 10 minutes before but
Manager Response: Hello,    I’m so glad to read that Pelican Hill has become a special destination for your family and appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback with us. Our goal is to provide guests with personalized and attentive service during every moment of their visit, and I apologize that your experience at tee off tarnished what should have been a relaxing golf evening with your son. Please know I’ve personally addressed your concerns with our General Manager of Golf, so we may continually improve the service experience we create for our guests. Thank you again for your valuable insight, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We had a bungalow , beautiful and impressive accommodations! Every attention is present to the smaller details . We had an amazing dinning experience, imaginative , colorful and full with real flavors served by friendly yet very professional staff. The Resort at Pelican Hill set all the standard for a 5 Stars !
Manager Response: Hello Chantal,    Thank you for sharing your kind review with us! We agree that the little details make all the difference in a vacation, and I’m so glad to read you enjoyed a wonderful stay in the Bungalows. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to share your thoughtful feedback with the rest of our team, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill for another memorable visit soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Great golf, amazing views at a resort that is among the top tier in the country
Summary: We stayed in a bungalow that overlooked the golf course and has beautiful views of the Pacific. The room was spacious and had all the amenities you would need. The food, service, and facilities were outstanding. The staff was really attentive, particularly Gavin Rogers, the concierge. The 2 golf courses are challenging yet fun with a lot of variety. Overall a great experience. Even when there were minor hiccups, the staff was very attentive to resolving the issues.  The Coliseum pool is the best I have seen in the U.S.   We will return and if you like spas, their facility is spiritual, and they have a lot of treatments. The workout facility could use an update(maybe add a few Peloton bikes) but the walking paths at nearby Crystal Cove are much better than working in a gym.
Manager Response: Hello Dale,    Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I’m glad to read that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in the Bungalows, and I’ll be sure to personally thank Gavin for taking such great care of you. I appreciate your feedback on the Spa Fitness Center, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable Southern California getaway soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My family and I live close by and visit the resort as often as possible, typically to make the most of their eateries, beverages, espresso, or just to stroll around the lodging grounds. It is in a delightful setting with amazing perspectives. We stayed as of late in a sea see space for small family getaway. The rooms are extensive, with a chimney, fabulous lavatory, and an expansive deck to unwind and appreciate the view. The staff are continually grinning and supportive. My child and I the following day delighted in the spa offices, wet and dry saunas, and tremendous clean Jacuzzi. Awesome stay once more, and we will be back!!
Manager Response: Hello Virginia,    Thank you for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your thoughtful review! I’m so glad to read that Pelican Hill has become a favorite local destination for your family and that you’ve had the opportunity to experience all the Resort has to offer. I appreciate your kind feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more delicious meals, sunset strolls and family getaways in the future.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This resort really is spectacular. The sunset views are amazing. The bungalows and villas are spacious, clean and have everything you need. Service is awesome. Great attention to details. Very family and children friendly. This last time around, my toddlers and I went to Camp Pelican which is an activity center for children. It includes a children's pool, sand area, splash pad and indoor activity room.
Manager Response: Hello Tina,   Thank you again for taking the time to share such kind reviews on our Tripadvisor and Yelp pages. I’m so glad to read that you had a wonderful stay at Pelican Hill - and that your children enjoyed Camp Pelican! Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to share your thoughtful feedback with the rest of our team, and we hope to welcome your family back to the Resort very soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Great Hotel; Pool Service + Pool Food Mediocre
Summary: This hotel is phenomenal in nearly every single respect. The villas are immaculate, well designed and feel like a place you'd want to move into. For a place that is so spread out, customer service is exceptional. Want a tooth brush? It's there in a matter of minutes, even though they have to drive it out to you. Room service is fantastic and delivered nearly to the minute they quote you, no more estimates.   The biggest issue I have with the resort is at the Coliseum pool. Operationally, it's challenged. Pelican Hill is massively understaffed in both departments that seem to operate there: the recreation department who handles chair covers, towels, etc and the F&B waiters. They need to at least double or triple the staff on hand. It is, frankly, embarrassing at the current
Manager Response: Hello Justin,    I appreciate you taking the time to share your candid feedback with us. While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your overall stay in the Villas, I’m disappointed to read the service you experienced at Coliseum Pool tarnished what would have been an otherwise wonderful visit. Our goal is for our guests to enjoy every moment of their time at Pelican Hill, and I’m sorry that we fell short in this area. Please know I’ve addressed your detailed concerns and recommendations with our management team, and I’d also like to connect you with Coliseum Pool & Grill’s General Manager, so we may personally apologize and discuss your feedback in more detail. I’ve shared her direct phone number with you in a private message, and we hope to welcome you back for a much-improved visit soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Beautiful and impressive accommodations with stunning ocean view.  Friendly, helpful and efficient staff from front desk check in, to valet service, to dining staff.  Luxury service in a spectacular setting!  Highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Hello Christina,    I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed a luxurious visit to Pelican Hill! Thank you for sharing your kind review with us, and we hope to welcome you back for another memorable stay very soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. I accompanied my daughter for a work event, I was the Nanny” to my 7 month old granddaughter. The bungalow was beautiful, clean, well kept furniture and accessories. We requested a crib, which came with an adorable set of bath accessories and a stuffed PELICAN. Everywhere we went, everyone was so kind, and could not have been more helpful. I hope to come back next summer, bring the rest of the family.
Manager Response: Hello Karen,    Thank you for your thoughtful review! It’s always an honor to be a part of our guest’s special family memories, and I’m glad to read that you and your granddaughter enjoyed a wonderful stay during your daughter’s work event. I’ll be sure to personally thank our team for taking such great care of you all, and we look forward to welcoming your family back to Pelican Hill for another getaway next summer!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I absolutely love this hotel! We have been for business and pleasure and it always impresses us! The golf courses, spa and accommodations are amazing! They provide a car to the most amazing mall. Their restaurants are outstanding!
Manager Response: Hello Ronda,    Thank you for sharing your kind reviews on our Resort and Coliseum Pool & Grill pages. I’m so glad to read that Pelican Hill has become a special destination for you and that you’ve had the opportunity to explore Newport Beach as well. We truly appreciate your thoughtful feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to Pelican Hill very soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The Villa is gorgeous.  2 BR, 2.5 bath.  Wolf stove/oven/microwave.  SubZero fridge, 2 freezers.  Dishwasher, washer/dryer combo, your own 1 car garage.  Great views (from our unit).  We have stayed here before and loved it, hence why we come back, again and again.  I would only advise that when you see the amenities, you ask if its "in season".  The Villas Clubhouse (Our trip was 9/16/17-09/24/17) was closed to private pool service, coffee in the am, and many more amenities the website adversities during our stay.  When we visited the Coliseum pool (main hotel area) we were informed by the staff that they close service at "5-5:30pm", that was on a Wednesday.  I fully understand "peak/non-peak" seasons and hours but I just wish that would have been made clear before I booked my
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you so much for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill and taking the time to share such thoughtful feedback on your most recent stay. While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your Villa accommodations and helpful service from our concierge, I’m disappointed that our facade repairs interrupted the relaxing stay you were looking forward to and apologize that we weren’t able to accommodate a room move. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to address your concerns with our management team, so we may prevent any guest inconvenience in the future. I’d also like to connect you with our General Manager of Villas, so we may personally apologize and hopefully regain your trust for a much-improved future visit. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to speaking with you soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My husband and I stayed 5 nights in garden view bungalow. We wanted a laid back vacation and this resort was really good for that.  We enjoyed walking the beautiful grounds and the  building common areas which were timelessly classy with great views.  I loved the unique landscaping with the olive and palm trees and would be interested in knowing how old are some of the trees. We especially enjoyed our bungalow’s private patio and large room with gas fireplace.  If you intend to spend time on the patio and privacy is important be sure to specify…..Some patios are not as private.  The parking was easy at the bungalow and if you needed to drive to the main building/restaurants valet was free and quick.  Our room was relaxing and quiet, and for the most part so were the resort
Manager Response: Hello,    Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your recent vacation! I’m glad to read that you and your husband enjoyed a relaxing five days in the Bungalows and were able to experience our golf courses as well. I apologize that some parts of your visit fell short, including your delayed housekeeping service. Please know that we invite our guests to request housekeeping and turndown service during preferred time windows prior to your arrival, and I’m disappointed that these delays inconvenienced your stay at Pelican Hill. I truly appreciate your feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable couple’s getaway soon!   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My husband and I decided to book two nights in a Bungalow for our 33rd anniversary. We only live a few miles away but we felt like we were transported  across the world.  We arrived before check in time to wonderful news from helpful Cassidy at the front desk -an upgrade to a Bungalow Suite! Wow! While we waited for the room to be prepared we enjoyed a delicious lunch at the Colosseum (sp?)overlooking the pool. After a stroll around the property  it was time for my 3 PM massage.    It was my first time for a  spa treatment there and I was very impressed with the professional and friendly staff, especially Cecelia who gave me a tour and was available for the duration. The amber gold signature massage by Adrienne was very well done! I enjoyed her manner so much and even received a
Manager Response: Hello Eve,   Happy anniversary and congratulations to you and your husband on 33 years of marriage! Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your special celebrations, and I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed a memorable two nights experiencing all the Resort has to offer. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to personally thank Cassidy, Cecilia, Adrienne, Maria and Patrick for taking such wonderful care of you, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon.    Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: One of my favorite luxury hotels.  Amazing property with views, property and restaurants are luxury and not too crowded.  Great live music at night with great happy hour specials.  I look forward to every visit.
Manager Response: Hello Steph,   Thank you for joining us for happy hour and live music in the Great Room Social Lounge! I’m so glad to read that Pelican Hill has become a favorite destination of yours, and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more memorable visits in the future.  Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We had 5 nights in a 2 bedroom Villa (521) and we totally loved it. We received outstanding service, particularly from Patrick in the Villa Clubhouse, Kylee in the Coliseum Pool and Grill and Deb and her team at the Villa pool who all made us feel welcome and that nothing was too much trouble. The Villas have everything a family would want, great kitchen with coffee machine, washing machine and dryer, enormous bathrooms with big baths and the Butler team pre ordered groceries for our family. We ate at a many of the resort restaurants and enjoyed all of our meals, particularly at the Villa Clubhouse. We spent a lot of time at the Villa pool and loved it.
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for sharing your kind feedback with us! I’m so glad to read that your family enjoyed a wonderful stay at the Villas, and I’ll be sure to personally thank Patrick, Kylee and Deb for taking such great care of you. I truly appreciate your thoughtful insight, and we hope to welcome your family back for another memorable Pelican Hill getaway!  Kind regards, Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We just returned from a fabulous trip celebrating my sisters 50th birthday. We stayed in a 3 bedroom villa (705) with 3 couples. The large balcony with amazing views was breathtaking. Beautiful decor with well appointed bathrooms, nice kitchen, living and dining areas. Service was top notch. A private butler is provided to help with anything you desire. The staff was friendly and very helpful-always greeted you with a smile asking how they could help you. Maid service was great. The entire resort was beautiful. Would definitely return. Just a fabulous resort.
Manager Response: Hello Kelly,   We were honored to be a part of your sister’s milestone birthday celebrations! I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback with us and am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Villas. Please know I’ve taken this opportunity to share your kind words with the rest of our team, and we look forward to welcoming you all back to Pelican Hill soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Didn't live here but went there for a lunch. It is a very beautiful hotel with the view of Pacific Ocean. The lobby is very quiet and clean. We are at the great room and the price is ok, about 60 dollars per person. During the weekend, there are also band and pianos in the great room.
Manager Response: Hello Lala,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your thoughtful review with us. I’m glad to read that you enjoyed the live music and ambience of the Great Room Social Lounge, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another ocean-view dining experience soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Pelican Hill is absolutely top drawer
Summary: If you are in Southern California, this is the place to stay.  They have amenities that most places don't have and the service staff are wonderful.  The rooms are clean and well appointed with great beds.  The grounds are beatufiul as well.  Definite destination spot!
Manager Response: Hello Lynne,   I’m delighted to read that you enjoyed a wonderful stay at Pelican Hill! Thank you for taking the time to share your kind feedback about your visit, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: The Resort at Pelican Hill was a truly incredible and unparalleled establishment.  It dominates that true meaning of a luxury experience with high caliber personable top-notch service.  My husband and I stayed at the Villas for six days and five nights after Labor Day and were blown away by the magnificent and remarkable staff throughout the whole property. Every Pelican Hill team member we engaged with during our stay was positive and eager to ensure our experience and needs were met.    The property is magical and stunning at every level.  Our villa was a top floor with a view of the Pacific Ocean and we sat outside every night to watch the stunning sunsets.  Our two-bedroom villa beautiful and well appointed with every detail not overlooked.  The fridge had been stocked with
Manager Response: Hello Karren,   Thank you again for taking the time to share your thoughtful review on our Yelp and TripAdvisor pages. I’m so glad that you and your husband had the opportunity to experience all that Pelican Hill has to offer, and I’m proud to read that the attentive service from our team made your stay truly memorable. I appreciate you choosing the Villas for your Orange County getaway, and I’ll be sure to personally share your kind feedback with the rest of our team. We look forward to welcoming you both back to Pelican Hill very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Best Happy Hour for wine lovers!
Summary: Don't miss dining here. Come Mon-Thurs for happy hour. All wines are 1/2 off and the choices are top notch. Rombauer chardonnay, BV Tapestry Meritage, Cakebread, Newton, etc. appetizers are good as are the entrees. Service was outstanding and the view is gorgeous!!
Manager Response: Hello Milsie,   Thank you for visiting Coliseum Pool & Grill for happy hour! I’m so glad that you enjoyed your visit, and we hope to welcome you back for another sunset evening soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Make a great vacation even better
Summary: Just spent 4 spectacular days at Pelican Hill.  Grounds are beautiful and service is superb.  Staff is super friendly and helpful.  Room is super clean and comfortable. Look forward to going back. Just 2 comments to raise the experience one notch. First, ask to see your room before you move in.  Often there is more than one room available at your price level and they will allow you to see a couple of them before choosing yours.  This is important for two reasons.  Not all rooms have the same view.  Although listed as "Ocean View" some have only partial ocean views because of obstructions or the ocean can be viewed only looking to the side.  If you see it first, you can get the view you really like. Also, the degree of privacy that you get on your terrace varies.  Although there
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for visiting Pelican Hill! I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful insight with us, and I’m so glad that you enjoyed the ambiance and friendly service you experienced at the Resort. We look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay in the Bungalows very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: What an amazing resort. The staff is very friendly and attentive. The resort itself is absolutely gorgeous. Fantastic views of the ocean. The golf course is pretty challenging, but a fun play. Our bungalow was incredibly comfortable. The resort itself is conveniently located between Newport Beach and Laguna Beach, with frequent shuttles to both locations for world class shopping.
Manager Response: Hello Mavery,   I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful review with us! I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your recent stay in the Bungalows and had the opportunity to explore our Newport Beach and Laguna Beach neighborhoods as well. Thank you again for your feedback, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon!  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: This is our third time staying at Pelican Hill. The hotel and grounds are just amazing! The rooms are huge as is the bathroom and the beds and pillows are very comfortable. Nice size patio off the rooms. The customer service was even better this time (which was hard to beat). Everyone is just so friendly and nice. They truly aim to please. I would recommend the restaurant Piccolo at the villas if you like sushi. Some of the best sushi and sashimi I have ever tasted. It was very fresh! And I think their sushi rice is better than Sugarfish. That's just me though! The manager Deb was very accommodating and let us know that our server was new. Ritchie did an amazing job and was very friendly. Whoever is training their staff in all departments should be congratulated. We stayed Labor
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for your spending the Labor Day holiday at Pelican Hill and sharing your thoughtful feedback. We truly appreciate your continued loyalty, and I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your third visit to the Resort. I’ll be sure to pass along your kind words to Piccolo’s culinary team and personally thank Deb and Ritchie for taking such great care if you. It was a pleasure to welcome you back to Pelican Hill, and we hope to see you again very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: Pelican Hill transports you to another realm.  Our bungalow with sweeping terrace and view felt like a luxury home.  This room does not feel like a hotel room but makes you feel like a guest at an Italian villa.  The service was incredible and always delivered with a smile   The golf course is unbelievable but humbling.  Glenn is a great golf pro and helped my game.  There are many restaurants to choose from at this resort from a quick bite at the Italian Market (also with incredible views of the ocean and golf course) to the elegant Andreas.  I enjoyed watching the game on the big screen at the Pelican Grill.  Their wood oven pizzas are delicious.  The breakfast buffet and lunch at the Coliseum restaurant by the pool are a delight.  Jean Pierre -the head chef could not be
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughtful review with us. We’re proud to welcome some of the world’s most discerning travelers to Pelican Hill, and I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed experiencing all that the Resort has to offer during your recent visit. Please know I’ve shared your kind comments with the rest of our team, and I’ll be sure to thank Glenn and Chef Jean-Pierre for making your stay even more special. I truly appreciate your insight and hope to welcome your family back very soon.  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: My wife and I stayed in a 1BR King/Oceanview Bungalow over Labor Day weekend (4 nights).  We were celebrating a family reunion, and although it was clear the resort was booked to capacity, every single request was met with a "can-do" attitude and friendly smile by the exceptional staff.  The food is exceptional at all venues, and the property is immaculately maintained.  If you want a 5-Star experience with unmatched service and stunning views at every turn, look no further.  Special thanks to Carly and Andrew (Concierge), Paul (GM Pelican Grill), and our superb waiter Kevin (Pelican Grill) who personally ensured an unforgettable experience for me and my family.  You are an exceptional team!
Manager Response: Hello Brad,   Thank you for spending your Labor Day weekend at Pelican Hill and taking the time to share your kind feedback with us. I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed a wonderful family reunion, and I’ll be sure to personally thank Carly, Andrew, Paul and Kevin for making your trip that much more memorable. It was an honor to welcome you and your wife for this milestone trip, and we hope to see you again soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: We came to Pelican Hill for a surprise golf trip for my husband. He played both courses and loved both. The staff at the clubhouse were outstanding. The bungalows are huge. They have a private patio, inside fireplace, comfy beds, large bathrooms and parking outside your villa. The grounds are stunning with gorgeous flowers. You need to be able to walk up hills through the Tuscan inspired design. The pool is large, but got crowded so early. It is very family friendly, as there were kids everywhere. The pool service was great. All servers were so polite. The shuttle takes you to the beach. We had a delicious dinner at the Pelican Grill. We loved this resort and highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Hello Sisqo,   Thank you for choosing Pelican Hill for your husband’s golf trip. It sounds like you had a wonderful time together, and I’m glad to read that you had the opportunity to enjoy Coliseum Pool and Pelican Grill during your visit. I appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback with us, and we hope to welcome you both back for another relaxing getaway soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: If you want a super quiet, ultra-private luxury stay in Newport Beach --- this is your place.  I stayed in a bungalow with a gorgeous view overlooking the pristine golf course and ocean.  What more needs to be said?  This is luxury living, with personalized service.  Everything from the room quality to the linens to the restaurant is first-class.  Of course, I cannot end this review without acknowledging Maureen at check-in.  Being my first time on the property, she took extra time to explain the property and amenities and provided the kind of insights and guidance I'd expect from a concierge.  I subsequently bumped into her a handful of times during my stay and she made a special point of offering help, each time.  All-in-all, a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Hello Jay,   Thank you for taking the time to share your kind feedback with us. I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed the Bungalows, and I'll be sure to personally thank Maureen for taking such wonderful care of you throughout your stay. We appreciate you choosing Pelican Hill for your visit to Newport Beach, and we hope to welcome you back for another relaxing getaway very soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Has gone down hill - pool disgusting and filthy
Summary: We have stayed here many times during the past several years. This place has gone down hill. Not as beautiful and serene. Pool is disgusting and cloudy. I wonder why ? Why on earth would they allow anyone to eat while in the pool. See for yourself. How can this even be sanitary ?
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill over the past several years, and I apologize that your most recent visit fell short of the positive visits you’ve enjoyed in the past. Please know that our guests’ safety is of the utmost importance, and we regularly monitor and test our saltwater pools to ensure a comfortable swimming environment. I’m disappointed that you weren’t able to enjoy the serene stay you were looking forward to, and I’d like to connect you with our Director of Guest Services, so we may personally apologize and hopefully regain your trust for a much improved future visit. I’ve shared his direct phone number with you in a private message, and we look forward to speaking with you soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: One of the most beautiful places in southern California with gorgeous views of the Pacific Ocean. The staff is exceptional, extremely polite and very accomodating. The spa is worth going to. I had a massage and my friend had a facial. Both were excellent.   Cute things to buy at the gift shop too, although they were out of stock (for a year apparently) of beach towels with the resort's insignia.   My only complaint is that there were too many children at the pool. They have a children's pool, but no one seems to use it. As a result, kids of all ages, with and without diapers were in the pool. I don't know about you, but when I go to a five star resort, I don't want to swim in a pool with kids wearing diapers.   There are 2 magnificent golf courses there as well. They only give a
Manager Response: Hello Lorraine,   Thank you for taking the time to share your candid feedback with us. While I’m glad to read that you enjoyed your overall visit to the Resort and Spa, I’m disappointed that your time at the Coliseum Pool fell so short of your expectations. As a family-friendly Resort, our goal is to provide an exceptional experience to guests of all ages, and I apologize that you weren’t able to enjoy the quiet pool day you were looking forward to. Please know I’ve personally addressed your concerns with our management team, so we may continue to improve the overall guest experience. I truly appreciate your honest insight, and we hope to welcome you back to Pelican Hill soon.   Kind regards,  Tom Donovan  Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary Heading: Service has gone downhill this past year
Summary: I come to Pelican Hill 1-2 times per year for the last 8 years. I even got married here. Generally speaking the service level has been impeccable with minor tweaks here and there, but my trip this last weekend has shown that there have been major changes to the resort and the service level was just terrible.    First, the good - the resort is still beautiful, and the rooms are still comfortable.  The pool is nice as always.  The bad - the most obvious change is the telephone answering system.  You used to be able to get a human on the phone almost immediately.  Every time I tried to call the butler or housekeeping or spa, the phone would ring 8-10 times, it would get re-directed to an operator who wouldn't be able to help you, and then they would put you one hold for 5 minutes
Manager Response: Hello Kokiri,  I apologize that your recent say in the Villas left you disappointed. The delays and miscommunications you experienced don’t reflect the attentive service we aim to provide, and I’m sorry that we fell so short of the positive visits you’ve enjoyed over the past eight years. Please know that I’ve addressed your feedback on the Resort’s phone answering system with our management team, so we may continue to improve our guests’ overall experience. I’ve also shared the direct phone number of our Guest Services Manager in a private message, so we may personally apologize and hopefully regain your trust for a future stay. I truly appreciate your continued loyalty to Pelican Hill, and we look forward to connecting with you.  Kind regards,  Tom Donovan Managing Director, The Resort at Pelican Hill

Summary: I have always wanted to stay here after staying at the Montage and Monarch Beach.  I expected this to be nice but it far exceeded my expectations.  This is my absolute favorite hotel in the area.  The grounds are stunning.  The pool is the nicest that I have ever seen.  Most importantly the service and the people are so kind and accommodating.   We had the best night at this resort.  The pool stays open all night and there is music everywhere.  The food is exceptional and the rooms are the best in the area.  I can not say enough great things about this place.  Hunter Warkentien contacted me to make sure my stay was great and was extremely helpful,  The pool service at the pool was the fastest and best I have experienced.  We will be back here within the next month for sure.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for sharing your kind feedback on your recent visit to Pelican Hill! I’m so glad to read that you enjoyed your first stay with us, and I’ll be sure to personally thank Hunter for taking such great care of you.
